review_text: Just incredible service and food, loved every minute of this. Buonissimo! üá¨üá™ üá∫üá¶
excellent atmosphere and service! Staff was super attentive and even brought colouring pencils and paper to our toddler. Food so good it warms your heart in a cold wet day!
Dilas - Anton he is very kind and cheerful person, who is hosted us with warm hands and high quality service üëè
Anton( Dilas) is super-friendly and pleasant! Top-rated service!
Anton Dilas serves perfectly well, and super-friendly. Thank you!
Thank you for your dishes and service. I'll be back!

Nice place is comfortable, plates good  test, prices are ok about 15 dollar breakfast plus tips. Inside there is some kind of park in summer I think it will be nice to take outside the service and if you wish drink alchohol it will be more expansive. They should to have menu in English and short description about.
Have been to a wedding celebration in it, it was great for this purpose, but I didn't like the loud sound of machines from the highway.
All good, but two WC cabins for the whole place are not enough
Very tasty food, cooked fresh.

I fell in love with this space completely unexpectedly üí´
This is not just a coworking space - it's a real oasis of peace and comfort, located just a 7-minute walk from the Nyvky metro station, and also next to a park üå≥

üîπ You can do everything here:
‚Äî work in silence,
‚Äî rent an office,
‚Äî hold a business meeting or event,
‚Äî even rent a terrace for a birthday celebration or a private event.

üìå There is a room with a projector - spacious, ideal for presentations or lectures.
üìå There are even closed booths for Zoom/Skype calls - I was sincerely impressed, because you rarely find this anywhere. Inside - silence, no one bothers you, and you yourself do not bother anyone.

üçΩ And the restaurant - a separate love in general.
Own confectionery, delicious Ukrainian cuisine, generous portions, very pleasant serving.
Borsch with lard and donuts - like in childhood.
Kiev-style cutlet is perfect: crispy crust and juicy meat with fragrant butter inside.

üåø A special atmosphere on the summer terrace downstairs, where you can calmly eat or hold a meeting in the fresh air.
And there is also a terrace on the top floor (it seems to be on the 3rd or 4th floor) - it can be rented for a holiday or a closed event.

üí° Very convenient location, there is parking, Wi-Fi, everything is thought out to the smallest detail.
A place where you want to return.
I recommend üôÇ delicious cuisine, high level of service üòé great space for work and rest. We ordered a cake - it's incredibly delicious ü•∞
My wife and I usually order lunches and everything is always super delicious, and since we live nearby, it's also fast. Maybe we'll visit sometime when we're not too lazy :)
I liked the cheesecakes and pancakes delivered. But the beef stroganoff with mashed potatoes arrives looking more like slop, sorry. Something needs to be done about it.

The order was made through Glovo on February 8. The first time I saw about this establishment was in Glovo, there was also a -20% discount, it was nice.
Yes, I was also surprised that it was not Glovo that delivers, but the restaurant's own delivery, well, as it turned out, it's no big deal. I called the restaurant myself, they politely confirmed my order, said that they have started cooking, everything will be delivered on time, so don't worry. And, indeed, everything was delivered on time. A special big thank you to the courier with a bright smile and a positive attitude!
As for the dishes, all the dishes looked like the photos on the restaurant's website. We ordered a Workit breakfast, a meat club sandwich, a chicken fillet steak with baked vegetables.
Very tasty, healthy and light meals!
Workit breakfast - appetizing, tasty, incredible!
I liked everything, I recommend this institution.
Great experience! Tasty food, friendly staff and great atmosphere! Vegan options available
Great place to dine in. Food was delicious and quickly served, coffee was great too. Solid 5 out of 5.

I liked the institution, a pleasant unobtrusive, interesting format. As for the food, I liked the borscht, and the mashed drumstick had something in the sauce, I don't know. It doesn't taste bad, but it's my subjective opinion that some ingredient in the sauce didn't go well with the chicken. In general, I was satisfied with my visit to this institution

Cozy cafe. A glass of water is served immediately. I ordered breakfast, it took quite a long time to prepare, although there were not many visitors. Served barely warm. The kitchen is noisy - very audible in the hall. There is room for improvement.

A rather atmospheric establishment. Prices are average. Very tasty dish with Kiev-style cutlet, 10/10, puree is unreal with truffle, unreal tasty, never could have thought that puree could be so delicate and tasty with a wide range of flavors and all this in combination with cheese and vegetables, very tasty. And the chicken and vegetable broth is mediocre, at 5/10, not worth paying attention to. The brioche bun that came with it is delicious! I advise you to visit this place.

Unexpectedly find such a good restaurant right next to the subway. Three big rooms for different purposes (dinner with friends, lunch with coworkers). Tasty food, good service. Love seasonal menus. This gives you the opportunity to eat not just a classic Caesar salad

Excellent food. Excellent service. Very cozy and comfortable place.
It's a roadside eatery and i came with very low expectations but they surpassed all with flying colours!!
Melt in your mouth salmon, tasty salad.
*****MUST TRY*****
Strawberry soup dessert. Yes soup!
Surprisingly awesome place! Our visit was great. Carbonara was just amazing. Thanks.

The salad was good, but the beef was not,
The beef was over coocked and it wasnt the part that is used for medalions
The mash potatos were good.
I heard a lot of good things about this place, so it was my first visit and I really enjoyed atmosphere, service ( thanks to Tatyana ) and delicious dishes. Thanks.
Delicious food, amazing staff, perfect ambience! I was amazed with the taste of food and prices! I recommend the restaurant for people who appreciate really tasty food and higher standard service.
The Basque Cheesecake is perfect!
Truly the BEST place in Kyiv as for now!! The great Team is working regarding this project. Delicious food and wonderful atmosphere!!! Highly recommended!!
unfortunately, it was mediocre at best, fr the price was higher than the actual quality of the foods. Not recommended

We visited "Dumka na gaz" for the first time on Sunday morning - and we will definitely come back again. The atmosphere is very pleasant: quiet, cozy, ideal for a leisurely breakfast.
The interior is stylish, thought out to the smallest detail. The food is delicious, the portions are generous, the presentation is beautiful. The service is at a high level - unobtrusive, attentive, sincere.
We were with a child - we liked everything, we felt at home. Thank you to the team for a wonderful experience!

I believe that park was renovated in the last few years, it looks great and beautiful now. Its is kept clean by the city.

There is a small ‚Äúlake‚Äù in the middle close to the place where children can play.

Next to that is a place for outdoor exercise.
Very nice!
We like the hotel. 10 km to city center  but we have a  rented car ao its very easy to us. The rooms are new large and very clean. The price is reasonable
Popular park for kids and dogs lovers. Clean and green exept lake - it's always dirty. Overall good place especially in working hours
Delicious food at the restaurant, good variety of dishes. Clean and comfortable suite. Very friendly team! Recommended for any event.
Quiet, clean and comfortable. Slightly outside the centre. Ideal if you have your own transport.

Wonderful experience at Vino e Cucina! ‚ú® The atmosphere impresses you from the very first moments ‚Äî cozy, stylish, and calm. Our waiter Anton was extremely professional: knowledgeable, attentive, and pleasant to talk to. His recommendations were absolutely spot-on üëå

The dishes were a true delight:
üçÖ Panzanella with tomatoes and anchovies ‚Äî fresh and vibrant, a perfect start.
ü•ó Salad with goat cheese ‚Äî light and well-balanced.
üçù Spaghetti with octopus, tomatoes, and capers ‚Äî an explosion of flavor!
ü•© Braised beef cheeks with potato gnocchi ‚Äî true Italian-style comfort food.

We didn‚Äôt order dessert ‚Äî simply had no room left because everything else was so filling and delicious üòÖ The prices match the quality. We‚Äôll definitely come back again! üíØ It would be amazing to see this level of restaurant culture more often in other cities too.

Highly recommended! ‚ù§Ô∏è

You won't be disappointed by the service or taste. Could be considered the best Italian restaurant in Kyiv. You can order risotto in cheese wheel or awesome pasta. Seafood is always fresh and well cooked. Very good either for a business meeting or romantic date. Also, the wine list is exceptional. The staff is polite and attentive.

Very tasty picas, especialy four cheese, i asked put on the top truffels, so it was very my taste.
Zuccini pancakes were normal.
Very kind and plesure staff.
Just restroom is very far away from outside terrace.

Best mea we have had in Ukraine. Wonderful, friendly service. We started with the hurrays sampler for two. Then had chicken with sun dried tomatoes, scallops and asparagus. We had sparking water and Coke Zero. Loved the entire experience. The place is beautiful. Highly recommended. We will go back next time in Kiev.

I really want to thank you for helping make my end of semester class party a big success. Food was perfect. Delicious. Not to much or too little. Fabulous wine selection. Beautiful design. Friendly service. Pricey, but well worth it. It was not my first time in your restaurant and it will not be the last!

One of my absolute favorite spots in Kyiv.
‚ÄúUlyublenyi Dyadya‚Äù combines elegance with a cozy, welcoming vibe that makes you feel instantly at home. The service is always warm, attentive, and never intrusive, just the way it should be.

And the food? Absolutely stunning.
Special mention goes to their borsch with prunes. Easily one of the most refined and memorable versions I‚Äôve tried in Kyiv. Rich, deep flavor, perfectly balanced sweetness from the prunes, and that comforting homemade feel. A true must-try.
Perfect for both a quiet dinner and a special night out.
Highly recommend! This place never disappoints.

Ill show you 2 photos of the same steak: 1 - their reality, 2-from their menu. I ordered American steak, medium rare, its 1 of the most expensive dishes in the menu, but my steak was burnt, unfortunately. Administrator tried to solve this problem, she and waiters were good, but the cook did not want to admit his mistake, although he burned the meat, it was burnt on all sides, cinders in the mouth. He wanted to justify this by saying that he cooked the steak on a stone, however, in the menu the photo of the dish and the description were about the grill, and what difference does it make, a steak on a stone should not be burnt. They made a discount on the steak, but did not exclude it, although it was almost not eaten. It's time to refresh the interior.
Nice place with tasty food and kind staff. First time there i was 4 years ago, and after such years still the same good quality food.

I really love this place. It‚Äôs warm, inviting, and always feels comfortable inside. The hummus with vegetables is my go-to‚ÄîI find myself happily ordering it every time I visit. The drinks are delicious, and the seating is cozy enough to settle in for a while. A consistently pleasant spot that never disappoints.

My favorite place for breakfast in Kiev. It's costly but worth it, believe me. Food is awesome, service is perfect, not annoying and really caring staff. They brought us complimentary sandwiches when found out that we have a flight. It was very sweet and the sandwiches were tasty. Interior is very nice, home vibes with a layer of intelligence. Coffee is really good, not over roasted (but f you prefer a dark roast, maybe it will be not bitter enough for you). Desserts: Anna Pavlova and Napoleon. But be aware that desserts are huge! Breakfast: shakshuka and set for two (with sparkling wine), hash browns with salmon is also good. Ask not to mix jam with sour cream if you order ‚Äùsirniki‚Äù for breakfast. Let them bring it in separate bowls so you could mix it according to your taste.

Quiche with salmon was good, warm and tasty, but quite small. The portion of Snails contained only 6 individuals,-) Nice and friendly service.
Good rose vine from Ukraine.

I went there for my wife's birthday with her family. We were twelve people total and we had a blast.

Unforgettable experience, seriously. First if all, set up; nicely arranged and everyone were able to sit comfortably.

Food; oh boy was it good? Just amazing, from starters, salads, cheese platters, hot appetizers, main dishes and desserts.

Service; every single time we came here, the staff is remarkable. This time Dimitri "Dima', was no exception. He was outstanding and very attentive through all evening (abput 3.5 hrs)

I can only recommend this restaurant for every different occasion that you might need.

very stylish and cozy place. They have cocktail üç∏ like Emily in Paris)
And even the same lamps

Beautiful little restaurant, very cozy. The staff is very friendly and many of them speak good English. The waitresses are super nice with children, besides giving out the usual coloring kits, they have books and little toys and also interact with the little ones, playing or talking a little. The food is delicious and presented beautifully. We were all very happy with the whole experience. It's a great place to visit!

A bit expensive but the atmosphere is amazing. They have several rooms I know about two there is the Garden and the library. They have a breakfast menu and a brunch menu and special menus as far as I understood the change and also one main menu for everything they regularly have.

I‚Äôve heard they have the best croissants but I will have to try it next time since the branch I ordered was very filling. The staff is very nice they say bonjour in French which creates the perfect atmosphere. Upon leaving you can also buy cheese which they have a great variety of and take it home to enjoy your memories of the wonderful outing.

A recommendation brought me here, I hope my recommendation will bring you too.
Not usually a big fan of fish but the waitress said it was a favourite of the chefs and I think were it not for the great choice on the menue I would have it again. I chose the king size tiger prawn starter and salmon on spinach, followed by a really tasty tiramisu.
Really excellent restaurant.

Wonderful atmosphere. I haven't tried the food, only came for drinks. 3 stars based on my experience because the waitress wasn't as attentive and I had to get up and ask for another round every time. If I'm paying premium for drinks, I expect to be waited on properly
Stopped for coffee and dessert and had the best chocolate fondant EVER. Delicious coffee, perfect service and lovely outdoor seating in an area of town that isn't too flash. Highly recommended!

Very bad and unqualified manager and personnel in general. Be ready that you will receive meals in wrong order / officiants some times with nozzles during the winter time / your booking for the birthday celebration will be not available because of personal that forgot to add the booking to their journal. Very unfriendly and low qualified personnel. You should definitely replace all of them.
It is a cozy and relaxing place.  Coffee and tea are relatively tasty.  Friendly staff.  However, the food taste is not generally satisfactory compared to the good atmosphere.
This is simply a treasure, not a place ‚Äî the ‚ÄúThoughts of an Emigrant‚Äù set (incredible borscht and traditional 50g) is worth the visit and time!
A good institution of local importance!
management does not know how to communicate
Atmospheric place, diverse cuisine
Very atmospheric and tasty)

Update: yesterday tried beef sandwich from a breakfast menu and it was amazing üòç
Year ago: Cozy atmosphere, amazing green wall, tasty food and the best tiramisu ever! Flowers in cocktails. Definitely recommended üëå
Food is delicious here. Very special tiramisu - tasty and not traditional at all, but would surprise you.  Awesome steaks and seafood.   Oysters are very fresh and greatly served. Highly recommended.

You know, I am supposed to like it, but there is something about atmosphere that I don't like. It's kinda uneasy and I would say posh. We came for lunch and the food was OK, the salmon was nice, but eel roll - one of the worst, because the eel was rubberish so you had to chew it for a long time. I didn't expect it in such place.

I can say they have a good service, the design of the place is not for everyone, but the atmosphere...

One of the best Asian restaurants I ever visited. The interior is so nice, furnitures, lamps, paintings and the wall of living plants. You need to visit the toilet, the sink is covered with grass. Food excellent, fresh fish, spicy soups and great service. This is a must when in Kiev

A restaurant that positions itself as an Asian steakhouse. You can find here anything from classic WOK dishes, rolls and sushi, to burgers with lobster, crab dishes, oysters and desserts.  Fish and seafood are fresh, the aquarium with crabs and lobsters is located right at the entrance. Trained staff as in fine dining restaurants, interesting interior and reasonable prices. It‚Äôs a good choice for both Sunday brunch or business lunch in the middle of the week.

It would be more correct to call this place ‚ÄúTime Machine‚Äù. Once you cross the threshold, it‚Äôs as if you‚Äôve stepped into 1999-2000 ‚Äî and this feeling accompanies everything: the interior design, the toilets, the paper menus, the loud and annoying live music with color music.

We went in on a Saturday evening. The hall was almost empty, only two tables with people celebrating birthdays or corporate events. For a Saturday evening in Kyiv, this is already an alarming sign. But there was a person in our company who insisted on this place.

Now about the most important thing ‚Äî the food:
‚Ä¢ The shashlik was clearly prepared in advance and simply reheated before serving.
‚Ä¢ Kubdari with meat and cheese was disappointing ‚Äî in some places there was meat, in others there wasn‚Äôt, and the taste was completely bland.
‚Ä¢ The potatoes on the plate were floating in oil, as if they had been cooked at home without much effort.
‚Ä¢ The frying pan with veal ‚Äî rubbery meat, not juicy at all. There is no taste, and the prices are just out of this world. For comparison: it is more expensive here than in ‚ÄúGogi‚Äù, but the quality of the food is much worse.

+15% is included in the bill without warning.

Perhaps the only thing that raises questions is the high ratings in the reviews. People, are you serious? Did you really like everything? Or did you just not go to other places?

The place is not recommended!
The shashlik smells like boar, the order is taken by a very unfriendly old man, from whom you have to extract the necessary information. A year ago everything was great. They've gone bad

I recently moved and visited the "Sevan" restaurant with my whole family, I want to share my impressions of this establishment. From the menu, we ordered kebabs, khachapuri, salads, by the way, the kebab was very juicy and tasty, the khachapuri was juicy and just melted on the lips, the salads we ordered were also very tasty, and everything else in our selection was very tasty. I was very satisfied with this restaurant, that you can sit comfortably and eat deliciously. We will visit this establishment again and again to relax, because everyone is very satisfied with this establishment, I recommend you to visit and also try the menu they offer.üòä

I visited your establishment and left a very pleasant impression! The atmosphere is cozy, the staff is friendly and attentive. The food was extremely tasty, I especially liked the khachapuri, it was unbeatable

I would like to thank you separately for the fast service - everything was served on time

I will definitely come back again and will recommend it to my friends!

Thank you for a wonderful evening

We really like coming here with our family.
Always delicious, polite staff, special "Thank you" to the owner, always asks if everything was good, always glad to see us.

We've started with carpatio, which was with interesting flavors, and fish soup.
The salmon main dish was very beautiful but was not as tasty as it's presentation. The chop steak, was nice.
All in all, nice resturant with supreme service.

If you are looking for the most amazing Italian restaurant in Kyiv Ukraine, this is the place. I came here with my friend and his date. We enjoyed the food, the vibe, and the staff were on point! Beautiful restaurant, and Beautiful people. I hope to visit again in the future.

Many times passed by and could not imagine this place was so nice and cozy. Finally we stoped by for a late dinner and we would  never regret. Among all delicious one should try Eggplant cream soup with smoked cherries, aged gouda cheese and almond and Cauliflower steak with walnut sauce - something amazingly different from what you may get elsewhere in town. Creative and delicious, bravo to Chef.

Salad with chicken and strawberries was literally unforgettable.
Portion was quite small but it was worth to try!
Friendly and helpful staff. Our waiter was extremely nice and polite to us. We really appreciate it.
Under Wonder could offer great meeting facilities.
Highly recommend Under Wonder Restaurant to all of you!

Interesting and one of the relatively old establishments in the center of Kiev.  Beautiful interior and original presentation of dishes.
Outwardly, this is a European-style restaurant.  But this is only outwardly.  The service is similar to that of the old canteen of the USSR or the 1990s after its collapse.  The waiters are not friendly, not polite.  They don't communicate tactfully.  When buying food to go (ice cream), they do not offer to sit down to wait for an order at a table, and if they have water or a drink in their hands, they even prohibit taking a place while waiting, even on the street.  Despite the fact that it can be late evening when there are few visitors.
I wish there was no such bad service and terrible communication of the waiters.
I give one star for service and attitude.
A separate topic is their ice cream.  This is the worst ice cream (gorgonzola) I've ever eaten.  It looks like a cloudy frozen block of ice.  With no pronounced taste and an unpleasant obsessive aftertaste of the synthetic aroma of coconut oil.
I really do not recommend spending money here and spending your holidays.
It is a pity that there is no dislike function here, since this place does not even deserve one star.

restaurant_name: 11 Mirrors Restaurant & Bar by FACE the Service
review_text:
Amazing experience at the restaurant.
The asparagus cream was delicious and the duck was one of the best I had in a long time.
The music was a little too loud for my taste.
Thanks from France!

restaurant_name: 11 Mirrors Restaurant & Bar by FACE the Service
review_text: The rooftop is definitely the highlight‚Äîthe view is absolutely gorgeous, and it‚Äôs the ideal spot to spend a sunny, warm afternoon with friends or just unwind solo. The cocktails are super tasty and well-made, and the service has always been friendly and attentive. It‚Äôs one of those places that instantly puts you in a good mood. Highly recommend if you're looking for a great drink with a view!

restaurant_name: 11 Mirrors Restaurant & Bar by FACE the Service
review_text: Highly recommend you to visit this restaurant in Kyiv! Excellent service and delicious foodüíôüíõ

restaurant_name: 11 Mirrors Restaurant & Bar by FACE the Service
review_text: Great atmosphere, great views, excellent food, and the staff was incredible.   Went for a date, and was truly impressed.  While it was somewhat expensive, it was certainly not overly-priced considering the level of services and overall quality.  If you're looking for an upper-scale dining experience in Kyiv, this is a must-see.

restaurant_name: 11 Mirrors Restaurant & Bar by FACE the Service
review_text:
I‚Äôve had the pleasure of visiting 11 Mirror Rooftop Bar and Restaurant in Kyiv on several occasions, and each visit has been truly exceptional üåüüç¥. The service here is unmatched, with attentive and friendly staff who go above and beyond to ensure a wonderful dining experience ü§µüíº. The atmosphere is always buzzing with energy, yet it feels intimate enough for both romantic dinners and casual gatherings with friends ü•Çüë´.

The menu offers a fantastic selection of dishes, each prepared with care and presented beautifully üç≤üé®. Whether you‚Äôre here for a hearty dinner or light bites, the quality is consistently excellent. And, of course, the views from the rooftop are simply breathtaking, overlooking Kyiv‚Äôs vibrant cityscape üåá‚ú®.

I first visited this place before the war, and it quickly became one of my favorites in the city. Despite the challenging times, I look forward to the day I can return and relive the wonderful experiences. To anyone considering a visit, 11 Mirror is a gem that promises an unforgettable evening out in Kyiv üåπüåç.

Really a very beautiful place (the garden around), food is good (but not gastronomy), service is correct (even if not luxury in my opinion)
Just disappointed by the booking service: they over-promise compared to reality when you arrive (table choice, etc.)

Nice, comfortable and very cozy place. Polite and very helpful staff.
Good place for family meeting.
Very nice restaurant with a garden and lake to spend a beautiful day and romantic evening.
Beautiful place surrounded by magnificent park. An expensive restaurant with delicious food, good service, great music and cost interior.

Place is beautiful, but behavior of administrator.
Sorry, not place for couples, probably for escorts(read lower and understand).
Judge me like escort even I was with husband and we have 3 years diff.
My husband is foreigner and I am her nation. Never more, there many other beautiful places üòâ
Sad that women allowed to act like that one, I can image what is the atmosphere there with waiters and kitchen
A quality lunch spot in the middle of the working day

An incredibly cozy place, impresses with its warm and hospitable atmosphere. Delicious food, atmospheric dishes and a great selection of drinks create a great mood! The prices are very nice, which makes it even more attractive for frequent visits! I recommend this restaurant for those who want to enjoy delicious food in a comfortable environment!

We celebrated our birthday in the family circle, we are very pleased that we chose this establishment. Delicious food, friendly staff (thank you Olga) and just a wonderful view from the window of the evening city! I recommend

I really liked the establishment)))) we celebrated my birthday)))) the kitchen and service are top notch, very tasty, the staff is friendly) all the guests liked everything) thank you very much for the wonderful emotions and a wonderful evening)

I ordered borscht for takeout, it was prepared very quickly, the price is good
The taste of borscht is top-notch, there is a lot of meat, lard is also very tasty)
I recommend!
Excellent presentation and tasty food, cozy room and lot of space

Disappointed. If you don't mind eating borsch every second day and rice with chicken every day - you'll survive. Otherwise it's a mistake to eat here. Moreover, it's a good place to lose some weight, because portions are small like for kids. And breakfast? It was sometimes hard to get some milk for the coffee. One, huge joke. I am really happy to go back home and eat like I should.
Fantastic, great staff, clean, food excellent , value for money , no complaints at all
Awesome place
Super. Cute place.

We visited this restaurant on recommendation from our friends. It looks pretty from the outside and has nice cozy interior. The service was friendly but food was a little disappointing. All dishes tasted just Ok, but not as one could expect from the authentic Ukrainian cuisine. They have all the traditional Ukrainian dishes on the menu and we tried only few classics like borsch and golubtci and both were not the best.

It was recommended to us by a friend and we were very happy.  Nice to look at from the outside, close to the park, and also made to be typical of the country inside.  Food was very good, lots of choice of starters, main courses and bedside tables.  And it was cheap too.  Waitresses very friendly.  Gladly again and to be recommended.

Wow! The food is amazing! I had small grilled fish (roasted crucians carps with crispy crust) and some roasted home-made potato with salo (bacon fat) and roasted onions. That with beer (Perscha pryvatna brovarania Bochkove) was the best meal in Kiev on these sommer days!

I recently dined at Taras and was deeply disappointed with the experience. I ordered a kebab, which was listed on the menu with a specific weight and price. However, without any request from me, they served a portion that was three times the stated weight, and subsequently charged me triple the price I was expecting to pay. This lack of transparency and disregard for customer consent left a bad taste in my mouth, overshadowing the quality of the food. I cannot recommend Taras to anyone looking for a fair and enjoyable dining experience.
Its a very nice ambient but waiters are very slow and they don‚Äôt speak English. Prices are reasonable and food was tasty.

We found this place by accident and visiting it became a highlight of our day! Thanks to the owner for his sincere hospitality, smiling and delicious big dishes! Really recommend this place for unique and tasty experience. Ask the owner to try his Turkish tea and original belgium waffle, it‚Äôs the best!

Thank you so much for the pleasant evening.  I recommend everyone to visit Rabbit Hole Cafe. The atmosphere, service and food were on the high level. Wafles are the best from all I have ever tasted before

Every time I walk in the center and pass this place, I stop in to get a coffee! The staff is always friendly and sincere, today the owner himself made me coffee. Very friendly and sincere man, I advise everyone to come here

Amazing place with great hosts - Olena and Tailan. They are so hospitable and attentive to their clients. Everything is so delicious and the atmosphere is cosy. The music is nice. I loved this placeü•∞
Will come back here with friends

The owner was amazing and so kind. He was very attentive and made sure we were taken care of with coffee. The food was delicious, the coffee was perfect. Very quick service and absolutely no complaints. We can‚Äôt wait to come back again!
Lower than average prices, friendly atmosphere and tasty coffee. Love to visit this place!
Great coffee, good service, a balcony to sit on :)
Small business offering perfect value for money; good service in the area.
Good place to take coffee
Good type of coffee

Can recommend this place.
Here you can have a rest with a cup of smth, a lunch with your family or celebrate some date with friends.
Really tasty food (recommend trying their new eggplant soup!), helpful staff. Everything for your children (room,menu, toilet etc.)
One minus: a bit long waiting for your meal, especially in rush hours.

Great food! Loved the happy hour. Prices vs. quality great as well. Only issue was the air conditioning system causes a draft all over the first floor. But definitely worth the visit if you are in the area. Very family oriented.
Came with the family for lunch, had to wait for my order more than 45 minutes.My wife's grilled vegetables were very oily, children enjoyed kids menu though.  The waitress was very kind and friendly

It's controversial place for me. This place has nice reviews, but there were just few times then I tried really something tasty - baked chicken breast and homemade cake. Nice coffee. Because it's close to me I visit it time to time, but can't say that I enjoy it. )
As a vegetarian, I was very pleased with my experience. I think I had a pasta arrabiata. It was delicious! The staff were very friendly - really nice people!

Fast, high quality, tasty
The staff girls are great
Thanks for the service

And you can leave the zeros. They profit from human misery. They take 600 UAH per person. The fixed dishes are not the freshest. Most likely, they are warmed up. Barbara is an institution where you want to return for coziness, taste and sincerity. The display case with desserts is simply a magnet for the eye (and appetite), and inside there is light, warmth and an atmosphere in which it is pleasant to sit with friends and work alone. We had a coconut cappuccino (very smooth!) and immediately dived into the menu. Rice with shrimp is large, fragrant, real home warmth in a plate. Shavukha Spicy is a new level of street food: light, bright, with a cool balance of flavors. And Barbara's set with three different roles is a complete gastronomic pleasure, especially the one with eel ü§§ And, of course, sweet - here it is not just a dessert, but a separate reason to come: the monastery hut and Buck's cheesecake melt in your mouth. The service is pleasant and unobtrusive, and the prices are just a gift. If you are looking for a place with a soulful atmosphere and delicious cuisine, this is the place for you.

Even on our first dates, my husband took me to this establishment, when the menu consisted only of drinks and croissants. My favorite was the chicken and mushrooms. It was very tasty and unexpected for a coffee shop in a residential area. We have not betrayed Barbara for more than 5 years, because they are constantly developing, expanding the menu and always cooking amazingly. And also fantastically fast. The service is great!
I recommend tasting sushi, bowls, miso soups, croissants almost Caesar or with salmon, pistachio napoleon, capo orange.
There are vegetarian dishes, sweets without sugar.
Your children and pets will always be happy!
Also, I am especially grateful to the owners for the constant fees for the needs of the armed forces, for supporting the country's economy in such a difficult time and making so much effort for quality service!

Client dining Vs delivery orders.

I‚Äôve been a regular customer here, coming once or twice a week, together with colleagues, because the food is genuinely good and it‚Äôs conveniently close to my workplace. Unfortunately, after today‚Äôs experience, I‚Äôve decided not to return.
I was told I would need to wait 40 minutes for a salad because the kitchen was busy with a large delivery order. I find it hard to understand how a guest who is sitting at a table, whether a regular who tips consistently or even a first-time visitor, can be asked to wait that long for a simple dish, just because of delivery operations.
In every country I‚Äôve lived in, one basic principle has always held true: clients dining in the restaurant are given priority over delivery orders. That‚Äôs not just good service, it‚Äôs common sense. The people who are present, seated, and engaging directly with your staff deserve timely attention. In this case, my small order wasn‚Äôt even something that would delay delivery preparation, yet I was made to feel like an afterthought.
To be fair, this isn‚Äôt the first time this has happened. I experienced a similar situation last year, took a break from visiting for a few months, and only recently decided to give the place a second chance. Sadly, that chance was wasted today.
I‚Äôm not sure whether this is a policy set by the owner or simply a decision made by the staff, but either way, it shows a clear lack of respect for customers who choose to dine in. It‚Äôs disappointing, and I truly hope the management reflects on how this impacts loyal clients and the overall dining experience.

Amazing place!
A classy top restaurant well known amongst locals. Not very known amongst tourists this is a true hidden gem. The local cuisine is fully represented. We had a few different Vareniki for starters. Kiev is lnown for its Salo, a kind of fat distantly resembling bacon, and this dish was a must-have on our table. A tranche of duck liver pate rounded off the starters. They have their own grill and make a fantastic shashlik and beef medaillons. The chicken Kiev is a true miracle! Chicken Kiev is a dish made from chicken minced meat, often styled in cordon-blue type fashion, stuffed with a Dill/Butter mixture. When cooled the mixture melts inside the meat and escapes to form a sauce once the meat is cut. Here they style the chicken to look like a chicken leg/ drumstick. They even add a little chicken bone to make it look like a real chicken leg. The spare ribs are good, but the sauce and flavor is not like the typical US Babyback ribs. A vodka room with over 80(!) individual vodkas is overwhelming and one might leave it to the staff to provide excellent suggestions. Contrary to what you might think, vodka is an excellent accompaniment to the food and does not need to be slammed down in a shot like manner. The restaurant offers a ‚Äúvodka tree‚Äù with a selection of vodkas that can be shared with friends. Absolutely necessary to reserve in weekends.

Discovering this Ukrainian gem was a culinary revelation! Tucked in a quiet street in the City Center in front of a little park, this traditional restaurant is a treasure trove of flavors and hospitality. Step into its Ukranian interior, where colourful and rich decor transport you to a world of warmth and tranquility Ukrainian culture. Our server's friendly smile and expert guidance made navigating the extensive menu a breeze. And what a menu! From the velvety borscht to the tender vareniky, every dish was a masterclass in traditional Ukrainian cuisine. The background LIVE music added a lively yet intimate ambiance, making it perfect for date nights or special occasions. What truly sets this restaurant apart is its dedication to authenticity and quality. Every detail, from the beautifully presented dishes to the warm hospitality, shines through. If you're a foodie or just looking for a unique Ukranian dining experience, this hidden gem is a must-visit. Five stars and highly recommended ‚Äì I'll be back for more of that Ukrainian love in my next trip to beautiful Kyiv!

The service was exceptional ‚Äì our server was friendly, attentive, and happy to guide us through the extensive menu. And what a menu it is! The restaurant specializes in traditional Ukrainian cuisine, and the variety of dishes on offer was staggering. From hearty borscht to delicious pierogies, every bite was a flavor explosion. The background music added to the ambiance, creating a lively yet intimate atmosphere. Every detail, from the beautifully presented dishes to the warm hospitality, screams quality. If you're looking to try traditional Ukrainian cuisine in a stylish atmosphere , look no further. This restaurant is a must-visit for anyone who loves good food, great atmosphere, and exceptional service. Five stars and highly recommended ‚Äì I'll be back for sure in my next trip to beautiful Kyiv

A unique place with its history. The atmosphere is amazing and very cozy, and the service is just wonderful. If it's your first time, ask for a tour of the place. All that, plus amazing local food, makes it one of the best places to visit in Kyiv.

My first time here. The reviews were good. Took me a while to find, had to ask a couple of people. Part of the fun is finding it as it‚Äôs very well hidden! Worth finding though. It‚Äôs quirky. Good good and drink for a very reasonable price. Service initially slow. We were tucked away and got forgotten. Once I‚Äôd ordered, service flowed better. Had to send side of veg back as cold although main was hot and tasty. Worth a visit if you‚Äôre in Kyiv. Do take the time to look for it!

Absolutely incredible restaurant/bar right underneath the Maidan. Stylish design, friendly staff, no non-sense menu...
Great local cocktails (no need to be afraid they don't serve the "classics"). Collection of memorabilia of the past several decades decorates the walls.

It is a very unique place with a rich history and philosophy of existence behind. We enjoyed their cheap menu and quite specifically served.
You can find a variety of Ukrainian modern cuisine  served in very specific dishes.
The design is very special and it impresses you leaving you with a lasting impact on what it means to locals. It is kind of difficult to find it being underground, you need to use a lift to get to it and use their password to get access. The password it is written almost everywhere there as a motto. Take a try being in Kiev! You cannot miss this place!
Amazing experience to see the traditional village, performance of folk singers and the show of Kozaks with whipes plus you can eat and drink traditional local food/drinks.

Good food. Tasty and styled as an old style.
A bit cold inside in winter day. The only available heaters were electrical and they not helped a lot.
I'm giving three stars as the palace don't accept credit cards and don't proper explain to visitors all their rules upfront. You will need to pay parks' entrance fee before visiting this restaurant. Please notice that you will get shortened food and drinks menu this winter and have to add entrance fee to the planned check.

Nicely located in the garden, village style  I like as well ...but ! worse place I ever visited - because No service, stuff very rude - when we showed that food was burn out , they just start to argue and explain - no simply say" sorry" . Even tea they cant make - was taste of water ...I even do not want tell  about "sucking pig" - do not be surprise if  it will be in your age, but it was possible to eat - anyway meat and some vegetables , over over roasted,  but if you are hungry its ok  - as said waiter , if you ate , nothing talk that was not that good...
The personnel is kind. The food is decent for the price.
You have to wait your order almost one hour.

Kanapa Restaurant is a fantastic spot right on Andriivsky Descent, perfect for a traditional Ukrainian lunch. The food is made with love, and the borscht‚Äîserved in a cabbage head‚Äîis a real highlight. The atmosphere is cozy with a touch of vintage charm, making it a great place to relax and enjoy an authentic meal. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

Had the tasters menu + oysters. Really good choice - warmly recommended! The tasters is a very nice assortment that exposes you to a variety of Ukrainian dishes and customs. And the place looks good too. Priced affordable relative to western Europe.

Actually good. We tried Kiev chicken and grilled beef, some tomato salad and herring... Bill came at nearly 1000 hrn, so probably not super affordable, but... Location is nice, the place itself is very nice, service is good, and the bill itself felt kind of reasonable, not shocking, as sometimes is the case here... If you have tourist guests and need to take them to a place with good Ukrainian food, this one might be it. I would probably like more simple Ukrainian dishes on the menu, like the chicken Kiev was, but overall good.

We were shown to a table immediately because we had pre-booked days in advance for 6pm. The menu is online so we used our phones at the table. While we were selecting our meal we ordered drinks. Water and coffee arrived quickly, but I‚Äôd ordered fresh orange juice which didn‚Äôt arrive.
We then ordered our food, I chose rabbit borscht. My partner chose vareniki.

The waiting time was good and when our food arrived I was hungry and looking forward to tasting it. However what I received was a bowl of slightly warm brown water. Half a quails egg, 2 tiny fragments of potato less then 2cm cubed and a huge amount of dill. It was almost cold and there was zero meat. Nothing. Just water and dill.

My partner ate less than half of her vareniki because it was dry, but she said it was very tasty. When we were finished the waitress returned and asked if we wanted desert. No thanks. But where is my orange juice? She said it was being prepared and then gave me the bill. Only then did I get my orange juice that I‚Äôd ordered when we‚Äôd arrived around 90 minutes before.

You know when you order drinks before a meal they are supposed to arrive BEFORE the meal and not after you pay the bill‚Ä¶

It was supposed to be a special day for us. My partner is Ukrainian. I‚Äôm English and speak Russian. Perhaps the waitress was offended when I spoke Russian to her, and maybe this is why I received warm water and not borscht. This was the reason we did not order desert and left quickly.

It completely ruined our special day together.

My favourite restaurant in Kiev! I went here twice, and both times the meal was incredible and the service was so accommodating, nice and attentive. Can highly recommend the root salad (it doesn't sound like much but it is incredible and the cheese topping makes for a smoky show), and cherry dumplings for dessert!
Love this adorable restaurant! Very calm and relaxing atmosphere. Great service. Fantastic food. Great WiFi. Really nice place to linger for a working lunch.
These guys seem to like experimenting and the dishes may surprise you. In addition to a warm vibe, good not overwhelming music and very attentive service it‚Äôs a great experience.

Each food choice is always a match, leaving me and my partner longing for more and taking some extras to enjoy at home. We`ve been to this place for a couple of times and frankly, I`m sitting on  the fence: to recommend this place means our favourite table next to the window might need to be booked well in advance ) But the place deserves each and every recommendation, especially for those looking for Ukrainian cuisine in modern interpretation. Our favourite picks: Aberdeen veal tartare, eggplant salad, chebureks, Popcorn (both cauliflower and shrimp), honey cake, varenyky with cherry & cheese doughnuts. Great service, urban jungle atmosphere with antique mirror glasses, perfect spot for both business and dates.

Honestly one of the best, modern takes on Ukrainian food I've had in years in this city. Both very familiar yet trying something new. Very flavorful with an impressive focus on local ingredients. Not super fancy inside, but still nice and cozy, and that fits the food great. Impressive and looking forward to returning
Best syrniky in the city ü•ûü´êüçì‚òïÔ∏èüòã‚ù§Ô∏è Highly recommend this place! Good service and nice atmosphere üëåüèªüåüüåüüåüüåüüåü
Great Ukrainian comfort food. We spent about $70 for 2 people and ordered tons of food and drinks. Portions are huge. Everything was delicious as well. Definitely recommend.

Stylish and up to date restaurant, where you can find both Ukrainian traditional options and modern food such as salads with duck or salmon. Varenyky with forest blueberries were great, there are not so many places where you can try such a dish. Portions are just perfectly sized. I was having a lunch with a friend, so we shared two salads and a portion of varenyky. There was also a good choice of tea.
Minimalistic design restaurant with delicious food and amazing service.

This restaurant offers a very solid level of hospitality and a great level of food quality.
Ukrainian food specialization, typical one.
Modern, fresh and clean.
Do not expect a lightning speed of service though, it can take 30 minutes for main course on the busy evenings. But restaurant allows you to order ahead.
Bookings are recommended.
Amazing food amazing atmosphere, but the service was beyond amazing. The food came in a steady pace as if they were sitting on table with us. Amazing Ukraine food.

Good experience. High-quality food and drink. The special patiented nut soup is interesting, but I am not sure I will try it again. The cheese platter was excellent. And the homemade compot is fabulous.

Just the cutest place ever at one of the most beautiful corners in the old town of Kyiv. On weekends two old men play live music in front of the restaurant ºs patio and it makes everything just so much more romantic. The style of the restaurant is unique and refers to the times of the movie (name of the restaurant). This became my most favorite place so far in Kyiv.

Absolutely outstanding place! Loved everything about it! Gorgeous inside! Whoever came up with the designs did amazing job! Food was very delicious. Stayed in Kiev for 3 weeks and visited tons of restaurants and this one is my top favorite!
Our waitress was Anna. Such a sweetheart! Very polite, positive and hard working girl. She was super busy but she gave us plenty of time explaining about dishes and answered all of the questions.
Wish we had such amazing restaurants in USA. I will miss it.

P.S. The lady that standing outside inviting people in is so awesome and funny with good English. She made us laugh hard. She is the best human!!!! :)

The terrace on the cliff edge over looking St Andrews Church. Opposite is the resturant and toilets, which is well decorated. Worth a visit.
I tried the dumplings and Kiev cake with cherry tincture and tea to wash it down.
Amazing experience! The waitress gave us a tour of the restaurant, explaining its history, decor and many other details. The food was delicious and prices are reasonable. Highly recommend!

Defiantly fancy but worth it. The food is modern and artsy with multicoloured dough for vareniki and sometimes over the top presentation. But man is it good! The borscht was wonderful and the boar and wild mushroom stuffed cabbage rolls with cream sauce were a real dream. The cocktails are also the best I‚Äôve had in Kyiv! They were perfect. Staff was super.

Delicious! Highly recommend! Every dish was absolutely exceptional! Traditional ukranian borsch- fantastic! So were the selection of the 2 kinds of pate. The coctails a little too sweet, (don't remember the name of it unfortunately) but it were served so beautifully. Highly highly recommend. The waiter was a lovely helpful guy too.

Delicious place, cocktail are amazing! (Thanks Helena). I had deer carpaccio and wild boar! It was exquisite!
Really recommend this place! I actually came back for breakfast and had to the Kiev cake! Delicious!

Very nice experience. The green Bortsch, the Burger and the barvy cake are really good! Waiter was very friendly. 3 courses, two drinks and Tip about 21,50‚Ç¨. Very modern and cozy atmosphere. The meals where all above standard. The potatoes with a light truffle taste the brioche from burger was very tasty but not good for a burger. That‚Äôs maybe why they hand out plastic gloves for eating. The Barvy cake was outstanding tasty. Wit a lot hazelnuts. I think a real calories bomb! I can recommend this restaurant 100%

The place is very nice and cool, although it is quite expensive. Prices are a little bit higher than average. Cuisine is very nice and delicious. One thing that confused me is the new of the fish and a drink below it. At first, I thought that it should be served together, but no, I was wrong. Waiters are super nice and polite. Location is also very nice because it is very close to the city center.
Nice place! Comfortable and friendly, pretty good Italian cuisine. Great location and interior.

The prices we ok.  Their lagger beer tasted bad and the pizza was one of the worst I've ever tasted, or should I say (no taste).  Servers are hard to find.  The breakfast was pretty good and the only thing worth having at this establishment.
I've visited this place twice so far. Delicious pizza, adequate prices and great almost invisible service üíú
Tasty cocktails and great variety of italian dishes
The food was bland and tasteless, the steak is very sad, tough and without flavor,  poor quality,  but the location is awesome

It's been a year since I've had the pleasure of dining here, and I still talk about it all the time. Absolutely on par with the best Italian you'll find in the world, even Italy. The Bruschetta is phenomenal -- my favorite dish from anywhere, ever. The food was clearly made with love and perfection in mind.

And the staff are fantastic people. They treated me with warmth and kindness. I will be back!

In my opinion Piccolono is the best Italian restaurant in Kyiv. We had my birthday celebration here and everything was EXCELLENT! The food was fantastic, the service was obliging, the atmosphere was amazing. Highly recommend this place and we will be back for sure.

An excellent Italian restaurant! A true corner of Italy in our city. Every time I dine here, I feel like I'm in a cozy trattoria somewhere in Tuscany.

The food is simply outstanding! The pasta is fresh and incredibly delicious, the sauces are perfectly balanced, and the thin-crust pizza with aromatic toppings is absolutely heartwarming. I must also mention the desserts‚Äî the tiramisu here is simply divine.

A special thanks to the staff‚Äîthey are very welcoming and attentive, always ready to help with menu choices or explain the ingredients. The atmosphere in the restaurant is warm and friendly, making it perfect for both a romantic dinner and a gathering with friends.

I highly recommend this place to all lovers of Italian cuisine. Thank you for your hard work, and I will definitely return again!

Very nice place on Bohdana Khmelnitshogo street, close to Opera hotel. Perfect food, high level stuff very friendly and professional. We're happy to get table without reservation. Pasta sea food was very tasty, appetisers are also good. Was surprised about dessert. Nice. Highly recommended
Lovely Italian restaurant with romantic atmosphere and friendly staff. Pet friendly! Delicious food! Don't expect pizza and your usual pasta fare. They treat food seriously here.

One of the favorite restaurants ‚ù§Ô∏è So cozy,classy and relaxing summer patio. Always delicious food. Pizza Pear and Gorgonzola is the must! Staff members are friendly and welcoming, always paying attention to the smallest details.
Coming here with my husband to celebrate our small anniversaries ‚ù§Ô∏è

We came here for a business dinner with ~10 people. A very nice classy restaurant. Not too loud, you can comfortably talk. Service was quite fast, staff speaks English (at least to some extent), food is very good quality. Cheese plate with truffle honey and a board of mozzarella were especially amazing.

Just ideal!
Amazing linguini & pistachio tiramisu to die for.
Lovely surroundings with perfect service.
Well done üëåüèª A place to come back.

Very Vero is a well attended Italian Restaurant. One in a family of other decent Italian and international ones.
With a food&wine cheque may exceed $100, it is expensive and has a respectful visitors.
Everything is very well served and prepared.  Very decent wine selection as well as digestives and other spirits; not a vast choice, but you get mid to top selection.
Still it is good for occasional visit and for groups of ten.
Food and drinks were tasty. Cheerful and polite staff.
Yeah, quite good! Had lunch, I recommend the deserts
Quiet and clean place, good for breakfast. Delicious cheese pancakes!

And one more Italian restaurant in Kyiv. And from start they take high place in my own rating of Italian restaurants in Kyiv, especially  in pizza makers rating. This restaurant is in the three leaders on my opinion. But really what  they don't have enough is the place for more quantity of tables to serve even more guests. Then I give only four stars.

Good service, delicious food and not expensive prices
Waiters very polite
I enjoyed
small, but cozy place with good selection of Italian cuisine and nice service

Ate here on two separate occasions. The pizza was quite alright but the carbonara was made with cream which isn‚Äôt authentic. The risotto was weird because they didn‚Äôt let broth get absorbed more into the cannoli. Unfortunately it was still quite bland and only tastes wine since they did that step wrong in the process unfortunately. Like I said, I do recommend their pizza and the waiters were really friendly! Great service

We went here for Saint valentine's day, they accommodated us with a table even though we called really at the last minute. The place is really warm and cozy and the personnel is super friendly, professional and makes you feel very welcomed. We've been given a table with the warn that we would have had just one hour available due to the obvious full booking considering the day,we thought it was more than understandable considering the situation and we agreed, a bit worried about the timings. Well, I can say that the order was super fast to arrive. I asked and, as professionals do, considering the day they've called extra cooks and kitchen personnel to avoid slowdowns. I believe this should be copied by many restaurants, even pricier ones, because we really received our order in 7-10 minutes with the restaurant full.
We've been greeted with a welcome limoncello and grissini that were really tasty, considering I'm Italian I might suggest to either buy it or make it with more alcohol though.
I ordered a pizza and a pasta with truffle and porcini mushrooms, both amazing, the portion on the pasta should be bigger though, but in general it was ok, the quality of both the homemade pasta and the pizza was top notch, I just gave my advice to put the oregano inside the tomato sauce instead of on top and more salt in the pelati. Besides that i was surprised. I'm not in Italy after all.
My wife took gnocchi and we both enjoyed a nice Valpolicella and prosecco brought with the grissini at the beginning. The atmosphere was calm relaxed and cozy. Perfect for very age and every occasion, from birthdays to romantic evenings to work lunch with clients. The dessert was super good, cannoli from Sicily with ricotta were super nice, I would add pistachios, much more.
Coffee was great.
The only thing I would say if I may consider it something "to check and fix" is the bathroom. The bathroom is clean and nice however the water doesn't have the mixer, is open or closed. If you leave it on for more then ten seconds the water goes to +60 degrees and you guarantee burn yourself. Maybe it was just that day, but yeah, looking quickly at the exposed tubes it seems like there was just the hot water coming with no mixer to regulate it for the client. Not really a problem, again, everything was excellent.

Where here 2 times.
The second time was disgusting.

First of all, we waited more than 35min for the pizza, but it's not that critical of course, but then I was even more shocked when I asked the administration for my order, then they brought us a pizza that was extra cold and again I asked the administration why it was happening and only after 5 more minutes they proposed to warm up the pizza and after + 5 min pizza again was cold.

We paid the full bill.

For the price of the restaurant such situations are unacceptable and completely disappointing.
Very polite and friendly staff. Nice Italian food and not so big choices of Italian wine. They wellcome you with grisini and limoncello, which is nice touch to the atmosphere.
A cozy Italian-style restaurant with tasty food. They offer unlimited prosseco just for 135UAH except for the holidays.

One approaches the act of dining with a degree of hope, perhaps even a frisson of anticipation - especially when the establishment in question presents itself with the self-assurance of a culinary destination. Alas, dear reader, hope, like a badly poached egg, was swiftly dashed upon arrival.

The food arrived in a state I can only describe as gastronomically dishevelled: a chaotic jumble of ingredients, each jostling for attention like uninvited guests at a wake. The seasoning was an aggressive muddle - an overzealous attempt at flair that left the palate not tickled but thoroughly traumatised. Spices, bless them, were flung about with such reckless abandon that one began to suspect the chef had been mugged by a spice rack.

As for presentation - if one may use that term with indulgent charity - it bore the forlorn appearance of a dish assembled during a minor earthquake. There was no elegance, no balance, no trace of the sacred geometry one associates with thoughtful plating. Instead, what arrived was a culinary car crash: messy, incoherent, and alarmingly indifferent to taste or tradition.

To liken it to Chelentano or street food would be a grave insult to the noble vendors who ply their trade with pride and precision on pavements the world over. No, this was not street food - it was alleyway food, and not a particularly reputable alley at that.

And the prices! One would think, given the audacity of the fare, that the menu had been transcribed directly from Versailles. For what was served, one might have expected at least a complimentary apology or a voucher for psychiatric support.

In sum, to dine here is to be cast into a peculiar food hell: a purgatory where flavour is misunderstood, aesthetics are criminally neglected, and your wallet weeps silent, salty tears into the void.

Magnificent! Top notch! Absolutely amazing food. Simply go for anything that catches your attention and your taste buds will be stunned. More over they have great service. Daria, our waiter kept a cheerful friendly conversation with us during the whole time and with ease split the bill for 3 people (this is a gem find in Ukraine). Totally worth a visit. (Our visit was in March 2019).

The restaurant was one of my highlights during my last Kyiv trip! We had the soup of the day which was EXCEPTIONAL!!!! As well as the pasta with spinach and salmon, which was super tasty too. The tiramisu for dessert was great & eaten up so quickly, that I didn't even manage to take a photo of it üòÅTo top of it all, the interior is really one of a kind, I'd be decided to go back there the next time I visit & try some of their other dishes. Make sure to give them a call & reserve a table though, as they tend to be quite full.
An absolutely amazing experience, the food was off the chart, the staff was amazing, they are extremely friendly to those with whom Ukrainian is not your native language. A little gem!

Edit: Coming here for 2.5 years.nkw.qnd still amazing. The staff is fantastic!

Certainly one of my favorite places in Kiev, regardless for breakfast, lunch or dinner!

The menu is very diverse, traditional dishes come with a dish and I keep find new things on the menu.    You can feel that the chef must love his or her job to the fullest.

Besides the food, the service is fantastic and the interior is as creative and cozy as the menu!

Definitely a must try if you are around.
One of the best restaurants in Ukraine. For 3 years we are travelling up and down the country and ate in many restaurants. But this one is really amazing. Not cheap, but it's worth ist..

Gorgeous place with elegant interior. Restaurant consists of two floors. Kitchen is open. Tasty italian cuisine. Great  list of wines. Waiters are highly professional and polite. On weekends you can enjoy live music!

Amazing food! Expect the kitchen to take some time. Fine dining (not fast food) :) I loved the food and will definitely be back. Seven of us went there for dinner and it the dining experience took two hours.

This italian restaurant is a gem! I have been many many time with friends and we have always been impressed by the quality of products mostly imported. The chef has revisited the italian classic with maestro: tonnato dela casa, simple eggs with truffle and parmigiano or beef carpaccio ... impressive. Nice deco with open kitchen.

My favourite Italian restaurant in Ukraine. Best choice for people who appreciate high quality, fabulous atmosphere and fantastic taste of dishes...
Big love...

Nothing special, simple and overpriced dishes.
I‚Äôm not trying to say that place is bad, restaurant is quite nice. Romantic atmosphere in combination with Italian decor. Polite and helpful staff. Attentive service.
But I was frustrated with dishes and costs, basically because it‚Äôs not worth it at all.
Small portions, with simple dishes that you can find in any other place around Kiev.

Nice restaurant but with average kind of food, pizza margarita for the kids was not ok, tasty.
Soup of the day with ravioli 3 from 5.
Lasagna with carbonara sauce was with no salt at all.
Not recommended but ok.

I absolutely love this place! It offers a warm, cozy, and welcoming atmosphere that feels just like home. The food is simply delicious, it is authentic, flavorful, and clearly made with care. It‚Äôs the perfect spot for anyone craving genuine Italian cuisine in a lovely setting üòâ

Stingy restaurant. I posted a photo of the little ravioli they served me, and the price was not cheap. On top of that, they served me a basket with bread and there were only a couple of slices of it. And also it was confusing to pay with card, because I had two pay two separate bills despite I was eating alone, the waiter said one bill was for the bar (I only drank sparking water). Also I didnt like the service the waiter provided. The taste of the food was o.k., it doesnt compensate all the negative aspects of this restaurant.
Love this place. Good food and fantastic staff. Excellent service every time.
This restaurant located in 3rd floor of Podol Inn. They have breakfast, lunch and dinner. We got Shakshuka and Omelette here and I really loved Shakshuka. Recommend it!

A dairy restaurant located in the Podol Inn hotel building, absolutely excellent and exceptional.
Excellent and delicious Italian and Asian dishes. Highly recommend, I was pleasantly surprised in all respects, and the prices are really not expensive, highly recommend!

Highly recommend
Now a new Hanukkah menu
The falafel really reminded me of Mahane Yehuda
And the pizza in Italy reminded me how much I miss Laser's pizza
So you're in for a treatüòã

A place with an amazing atmosphere, a rich menu with perfect staff and service
The most delicious pizza I've ever eaten in my life. It's a shame that it doesn't work in Israel because I would eat there at least once a week. If you're in Kiev, I highly recommend stopping by to visit.

A great kosher dairy restaurant in the Pedol hotel
Good and tasty food, fast and courteous service
Thanks to the dear manager Eliezer...
Small conceptual Italian restaurant

Great place. I liked everything: from the service, to the friendly waiters - and ending with the food.
I especially liked the small details: hair ties so that your hair doesn't get in the way while eating; a "bib" so that you don't get wet when you order a long pastaü•π; chewing gum that comes with the bill. This shows that the establishment cares about the comfort of its visitors.
Very atmospheric: the pasta here is prepared by hand, and you can see it all with your own eyes.

first time visiting and getting to know the establishment. impressions after the visit are pleasant. cozy atmosphere inside, staff is pleasant and attentive to guests.ü•∞it was especially interesting to hear the history of the establishment and dishes. üçãüçù the dishes themselves are very satisfying and delicious. the most delicious pasta I've ever tasted in my life! the wait was worth itüòâ we will definitely come back to enjoy other items on the menu‚ù§Ô∏è

I give it a 5. Food, service at a high level. For this reason, it is not difficult to wait 15-20 minutes in line. But a small minus. Aperol and Negroni could be better if they prepare it, not buy ready-made cocktails from the store. This is a small wish for the future. Thank you. I really liked it and will come again and will recommend it to friends

Came on the opening day and again after
I liked the service, the food was tasty and not standard
The waiting time was quite ordinary (10-18 minutes), although the hall was completely full, and the prices themselves for such dishes are decent
The only thing is that in Alfredo for me there were coarsely chopped mushrooms with a slight bitterness, but I think my friend said that they fixed it
I want to note the carbonara, it really tastes like the real thing, classic without cream, and they made it unusually green, I found out that they added a little spinach for color (it was not felt)
It seems that they also had a trick to treat you to prosecco if you were or are standing in line (but this is not certain)
The kitchen is open, the design is beautiful with a bunch of references to iconic Italy

This is a very solid upscale restaurant in the fanciest Kyiv neighborhood.
You can fully trust that you will get one of the best food quality, service and atmosphere.

Our service was just a bit slow. But this was due to too many people on Saturday night.
Excellent food, good service (almost perfect, hence can be better). Cheese pizza, salmon dishes and medallion are very much recommended. Wines are overpriced though

Definitelly in TOP 5 of BEST PLACE IN KIEV !!!
Amazing & cozy place for dinner with a family or a couple. Outstanding service and great food !

It was Christmas holidays 2019with my girlfriend!
Bigoli is one of the best Italian restaurant with hospitality in Kiev! My house was just in front off. So every time I couldn‚Äôt stop myself without having dinner together!
Cuisines were very delicious with speciality!!!!!!
Unforgettable experience
very tasty, pleasant atmosphere üëç

Rude service. I sit and they came and said table is reserved. Although initially they said table is available. Lying and rude customer service. I left without ordering anything. They said it is reserved at 6 and some random people came within 5 seconds after I sat, around 5.46 pm. Also there was no reserved sign. No honor, no shame, lying business. I never trust my food with lying shady businesses.

Highly recommended this place! Awesome view to the cathedral, very cozy, nice terrace, amazing relaxing atmosphere, tasty and good looking food and really warm service! I‚Äôve never been still in restaurant part, but saying about dessert üçÆ part is perfect üëå just try it) good choice for dating, negotiation or showing the city üåÉ
I really like this place! We had a breakfast with my wife and were very happy with the food and service

Very beautiful place but the service turned out to be awful. We waited for our breakfast way too long. The pasta with parmesan turned out to contain eggplant and zero to no taste of parmesan itself. Moreover it was more of a lasagna than pasta. The avocado and salmon toast was hard to slice with a knife - the bread was way too hard :(
And last but not least we were made to wait for our bill long again and then the waiter brought only half of our bill.. so we waited again.
Do not recommend.
A place for breakfast with a fantastic view, that opens early enough. Nice service, great coctails.

Excellent place with good food made from fresh ingredients. Good interior, nice music and perfect service. Also at the end with the bill they gave natural flower that also make you feel that you attend very quality place. In my opinion, it‚Äôs a perfect place to emotionally relief and eat very tasty food. I can guarantee that you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Faboulous place to eat real italian food in Kyiv.
The wine card is extremely versatile and the food is just delicious.
All in all a very beautiful restaurant.
It's a true gem in Kyiv! Wonderful food. Great  taste & service. Warm interior. Your burnt cheesecake with white truffles is out of this world! Missing it already :)

I have visited this restaurant and all dishes I have tasted were delicious

Really talented chefs behind those dishes as well as very kind staff and well services

Good Italian restaurant. The staff is friendly and helpful, great level of service. Food taste and quality was fairly good rather outstanding. Limited menu options, but the menu is well balanced. The restaurant is quite expensive, prices are reasonable. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend for a casual lunch, but for a cozy dinner in a good and warm atmosphere.
Good service and nice atmosphere and comfortable seating, excellent seafood soup that you have to try and tasty veal salad, I must come again!

This was the first time I visited this restaurant. The food was excellent. There were 4 of us, and the waiter separated our checks. The spaghetti was cooked aldente. The Pino Grigio was excellent.

I definitely recommend this place.

My all time favorite in Kiev. It was conveniently located right by my house and my family and I used to come here every Sunday. Tasty food, cozy atmosphere, babysitter on premises during weekend. Excellent! Highly recommend their pizza, pasta, kotleta bolognese and deserts. Julietta on the drink menu is fabulous.

Good place to have a business meeting. Nothing spectacular or "wow". Food is of good quality and tasty (tried first dishes as well as main courses). A bit overpriced though. Location and access by car (especially parking) is poor. Service is well above average in Kyiv.

Very good restaurant. Everything is deliciously cooked. Everything is quickly served by the waiter.
I recommend!

Very tasty and elegant!

To have a dinner there was a fast option, as it was close to us, and we haven't been there yet. We checked the place online, and it seemed quite nice, so we booked a table.

It was a discovery! Everything was on a high level, from when we entered till when we left.
+Nice ambience, calm, romantic.
+We were in the room with live music, really pleasing to the ear!
+Very attentive service, very polite.
+The food was delicious, especially the chocolate mouse, salad with tuna and the lasagne, Yummy!
+The bathroom was very neat.

Suggestion: The mushroom soup was ok, but a bit too simple, maybe add some crunchy bread on top.

One of the best restaurants I have visited.

Tasty Italian restaurent in the heart of Kyiv serving great steak, piazza and respectable desserts.
Thre mushroom pizza was delicious and the ribeye steak was amazing, well cooked and a generous portion. The sides were also very well cooked with a good eye for presentation.
Finally the desserts were well prepared, tasted good and well presented. I especially liked the homage dark chocolate Italian ice cream coated with little fine crushed chocolate for extra texture and crunch. Well done!!
Very nice napolitana pizza

4.4 nice cozy place: the inside interior is a slightly outdated, so it‚Äôs much better in summer, when outside veranda is available; food is decent and well-priced; friendly staff, but a bit slow; great selection of wine

Good spot for breakfast, lunch or maybe even a dinner.

Stuff is very friendly.

üí≤Prices are very affordable! For most people portion sizes will be sufficient. But, if you need more and you order two dishes price will still be around average for the whole meal.

üç≥Food is good.

An authentic Italian osteria in the heart of Kyiv, with a stunning view of the Golden Gates.

No tourist-trap mozzarella bar or Instagram bait here‚Äîjust proper, soulful Italian cooking. You‚Äôll find some of the usual suspects‚Äîcarpaccio, bruschetta‚Äîalongside long-time favorites like tagliatelle with bone marrow and truffle or baby squid stuffed with shrimp, a hit for over 15 years. Specials change often, so regulars rarely eat the same thing twice.

The wine cellar? A real trove, built over 30 years. Expect bottles you won‚Äôt see in local shops‚Äîaged Barolo, Chianti, and gems from less obvious regions and producers. There‚Äôs a sommelier on the floor‚Äîask, and you‚Äôll drink well without overpaying.

This is Italian food the way it should be: authentic, deliberate, and hard to forget.

Facing the Golden Gate, the entrance of the restaurant opens into a vestibule, which splits into two dining areas, each featuring its own bar.¬† This unique layout contributes to an intriguing dining experience.¬† I visited the restaurant twice‚Äîonce for lunch and once for dinner‚Äîand found it pleasantly uncrowded both times.¬† Normally, I enjoy a quiet meal, but the combination of dim lighting and dark wooden furniture, reminiscent of an old English pub, cast a somewhat somber mood.¬† Nevertheless, the service and food were good.

a now historic restaurant in Kiev that I used to frequent when I lived in those parts, for work, and that I found and tried again with pleasure in the summer of 2020. high quality cuisine and dishes that respect ancient traditions of some Italian regions. a place that I have in my heart and that I hope to be able to find again as soon as these bad times end
Quick service, meals taste very good and look appetizing. Extensive Italian wine menu. Worth the a bit higher than average price.

Amazing food and service, worth visiting. Not the cheapest place though.

Also great location, terrace is located away from road and in the shadow of the building so it's pretty chill.

This place is a total gem. The food is absolutely delicious, and you can really taste the freshness of the ingredients. I had the grilled chicken with rosemary potatoes ‚Äî everything was seasoned perfectly. The staff was kind and attentive without being pushy. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

Very tasty pizza, great dough, option to choose spicy/non-spicy. Casa Lora is a wonderful restaurant with its own history. However, there is still room for improvement in the service: I would like more attention to detail, to the atmosphere that emphasizes the philosophy of the establishment. üòå

Overall, the impression is good, so I hope it will only get better with each visit! üòÅ

An incredible place with a wonderful atmosphere and wonderful people ü§çwe were happy to spend our special day at Laura's house!
From the first meeting we were surrounded by attention and care by the charming girls administrators and the waiter Vadim, everything went very well and comfortably, it was delicious and cozy ‚ú®
For us now this is the place where our family was created, which we are so happy to return to! Thank you very much ‚ù§Ô∏è

Casa Lora is a wonderful establishment that is definitely worth your attention! We ordered home delivery, and everything arrived very quickly, the dishes were warm and incredibly tasty. It is clear that they care about quality and service here.

I have also visited the establishment itself several times - the atmosphere is pleasant, the staff is friendly, and the service is at the highest level. I especially want to note the Cinque Formaggi pizza - it is simply perfect, as well as cocktails and risotto with mushrooms, which left only the best impressions.

I would like to separately note that Casa Lora is not only a wonderful kitchen, but also an atmosphere that you want to return to. The design of the space - every corner is thought out to the smallest detail. The interior of the establishment creates a feeling of coziness and harmony.
In general, Casa Lora is a place where delicious food is combined with aesthetics and real comfort, a place where you want to return! I recommend it to everyone who appreciates quality food and good service.

A very cool restaurant of Italian cuisine! We ordered ravioli with crab and shrimp, Caesar salad with shrimp, strawberry basil lemonade, and creme brulee for dessert. Everything is very tasty, I would visit this restaurant more than once!

36Po is a very beautiful restaurant with a unique and stylish atmosphere. The interior is stunning, with a huge aquarium and lots of greenery, making it a special place to dine.
