We tried Borsh, and it was absolutely amazing‚Äîrich, flavorful, and perfectly made. A great spot to enjoy delicious food in Lviv!

This restaurant offers a delightful experience with its stunning view and delicious, flavorful dishes. The ambiance is enhanced by beautiful decorations, including a large aquarium. Located in Lviv's central square, it boasts a lovely terrace overlooking the city. Perfect for enjoying both the scenery and a satisfying meal. Food is very yummy!!!

Too pricey for such mediocre food.
None of the dishes was remarkable or special or simply reasonable, just something pretending to be high cuisine. Wine was good, but this is the only positive memory from the visit.
A lot of money was spent on restaurant's place in the very center of old town, design, advertising and so on, and it's a pity how it feels only a year after it was opened: dust here and there, hair in food, lack of English menu, you name it.
Also,  –±–æ–≥—Ä–∞—á isn't that spicy as it should be and as you can get in a restaurant few buildings away.

This place has an amazing interior but at the same very relaxing and cozy. We had a wonderful time on the terrace with an amazing view. The food has been delivered relatively quickly, and waiters have very nice embroidered t-shirts and dresses!

The nicest restaurant you can find in the area.  It's in the top 3 in my opinion.  The quality and service of the place is at the highest level.  In the menu, you can find some world cuisines as well as local delicacies.  It is a very suitable place for its quality.  Thank you very much to Alex for his help and interest.  He was very interested and helpful with our group.
The pizza and shrimp were tasty and presentation was good. We had wine Riesling wine, it was a bit plain. Staff is friendly and helpful, atmosphere is cost, feels like at home

Food was delicious, pasta and soup taste homemade and are filling but still with restaurant sophistication. Service very friendly and good but also fast paced. Which is understandable given place is always busy and tables often have to be reserved. Overall very good place worth the price, silverware and oven in classic Lviv style is a very nice touch.

Came for the pizza the first time and then it became my favorite place for cheesecake. That says a lot in Lviv, because the cheesecake in this city is insane, but Marevo wears the main crown in my opinion.

Not a big fan of the QR code heavy service, but that is me and these are modern times, so I should suck it up.

Staff has always been super friendly.

Recommended for sure!!!

Amazing place in the heart of Lviv with the best pizza in the city. Each time I visit Lviv I go there with my friends :) Choose any pizza with buffalo‚Äôs burrata and this choice will be perfect. Another point which I appreciate is a great variety of Ukrainian craft wines of a good quality. Apart from pizza I also tried risotto with Carpathian mushrooms - delicious. Overall, highly recommend.
A very special way to serve their pasta. Burrata is highly recommended. Prices are very nice. Also I would recommend to try Ukrainian white wines. And enjoy your meal

The restaurant is located in the inside patio of old market in Lviv. Very atmospheric place with old furniture and vintage vibe. The food is moderately fine , but not delicious unfortunately. We‚Äôve had cheese and mushroom pizza and pasta with seafood. Pizza dough wasn‚Äôt fluffy and not well-baked. Gorgonzola Cheese was served on the top of the pizza similar like the herbal batter is served on the top of the stake. Seafood pasta was good, but only with one shrimp and without any mussels which was a bit disappointing. We recommend the mulled wine with spices - was delicious! The service is attentive but not too pushy , which we value a lot.

Very beautiful and historical building
The pizza is great! Authentic flavor and great sauce. They also have fine draft beer. We have been here twice in two days and maybe tomorrow a third! üòä
Very cozy place, kind waiters, I like the atmosphere inside, tasty pizza, the salad was just amazing something new, very good experience, I defeated recommend, thank you

Good pizza. Friendly staff, but they don't come to see you very often. Once you got your food, you are on your own :). Would definitely recommend this place though. But sit only on the ground level, because if you go down, it has a strange smell down there and it's quite cold. Maybe in the summer it gets better.
Such a cozy spot with incredible food, wine, and service. We had pizza & veggie salads. Both were amazing

The staff is friendly and fast. Oysters were very tasty but none of them were cut loose. The octopus was very well made, the same goes for the meat. Dessert was good too, Ukranian strawberries are so much better than Dutch ones.

Only downside might be is that the portions are on the smaller size. Still better to have quality>quantity.

It doesn't show on the menu but they also have red wine.

I loved the veloute ravioli with snails. Lemon tart was also excellent. However the onion soup was too oily for my companion. Overall a pleasant experience. Not the best for vegetarians but can survive.

Amazing!!! Great sea food, drinks and everything we ordered. Came as a big group and all food was delicious!
service was very kind

Especially recommend: fresh oysters, scallops, Pear salad.

Such a lovely place, pleasant interior with cute little details. The prices are very moderate, there are meny different things on the manu. There is a lot of options of sauces for escargot, I would recommend the truffle one. Friendly staff, though I wish they had some uniform and weren't dressed like people from the street. The onion soup wasn't the best one. The menu had a food mark from previous visitors on it.

Most of all it was a disappointment, they did not have the ingredient for what you would expect to be signature dishes. The two dishes containing frog is still on the menu, but they informed that frog legs have been out of stock for more than two months. On top of that the waiter was very arrogant and seem uninteresting in giving any service. The starter had a got cheese which was very good, this saved the whole thing from being a total disaster. The price was way to high for the little we got.

"Good People" - the restaurant fully justifies its name! The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, the interior is thought out to the smallest detail, the style is exquisite, and therefore comfort is guaranteed!
Special thanks to the staff ‚Äî attentive, pleasant, sincere. Really nice people who love and do what they do. The Good People restaurant in Lviv offers a wide range of services: a children's playroom with an animator on weekends, live music, as well as a takeaway and delivery service.
Dishes are a separate story. Delicious, beautifully presented, everything is fresh. In addition to meat, fish and seafood dishes, the establishment also offers a lean menu.
I recommend booking a table in advance, especially on weekends.

So, I went to lunch with my friends and ordered the following dishes: salami pizza, spicy tofu with shrimp and lentils, dumplings with tuna and river trout roe, onion soup. Portions at "Good People" are not about quantity, but about quality, aesthetics and refinement. Everything is served here as in a real restaurant: with attention to detail, finely thought-out composition and beautiful presentation.
Yes, the portions are not large, but that is their charm. This is an ideal option for those who appreciate not just satiety, but an emotion from food.
All in all, "Good People" made a great impression, and the visit left a pleasant aftertaste - and not only a culinary one.

I will definitely come back again! :)

Tasty, cozy, spacious
A large menu and a large establishment) you can order banquets
There is a children's room)
The only remark - they ordered shakshuka, which should be spicy, but it was not even spicyüò¢ and the bread in the photo was dark, but they brought light
Everything else is wonderful)

We were guests of your establishment and were disappointed. We ordered a ribeye steak of a certain degree of doneness, but it was not as ordered. We asked to fry the same piece of meat, it was taken to the kitchen and returned with the desired degree.

An unpleasant surprise was that we were charged 370 UAH on the check for frying our own meat. At the same time, no one warned us about such an additional payment. I consider such a practice to be absolutely unjustified and unfair towards the guests. If the chef did not cook it as ordered, then the correction of the error should be at the expense of the establishment, and if an additional payment is still provided, the guests must be warned about this before the service is performed. The point is not in the money, but in communication.

Unfortunately, this situation spoiled the impression of visiting your establishment. I really hope that you will pay attention to this situation and review your approach to service so that other guests do not experience the same disappointment.

Every time we return from this establishment with pleasant impressions, the staff is pleasant, the dishes are very tasty, live music complements the atmosphere of the establishment 100%
I also want to note that the establishment is pet friendly, that sometimes they bring a bed and water, for this is a special plus ü´∂üèº

The overall impression was mixed. It is worth paying attention to the quality of the dishes - in particular, the mashed potatoes were completely tasteless, watery, as were the dumplings and ribs with mashed potatoes, which had an excess of moisture, rather than a rich taste.

Unfortunately, the prices are quite high, and do not justify the level of preparation. It would be good to review the recipes and presentation - the institution has potential.

I do not know why this establishment is categorized as cheap on Google Maps. This is not a complaint at the establishment, but a complaint at the categorization. ;-) For the exact prices you can check the published menu; the prices are accurate at the time of this review. Overall it is definitely worth the money. I had a good time; even the toilets are super clean. The waiters all speak English fluently. Nothing to complain about. Thank you! Edit: I just realised, the prices are actually not correct, my strudel was in fact billed uah 10 more than on the menu. :(

I really liked it
Very atmospheric, very tasty
The location is just perfectü©∂
The only nuance is there is no option for lactose-free or plant-based milk for coffeeüò¢

I ordered tomato soup with seafood and a bread plate - it was divinely delicious! I've probably never had a more delicious soup) and the combination with a fresh baguette and butter with sun-dried tomatoes added to the pleasure. I highly recommend it!
A cool place with a soul! Delicious coffee, cozy vintage interior and very friendly staff. I want to come back here again and again üíõ

Great place if you want to taste the real Ukrainian/Polish food! Borsch here is so good üëè
My next time here I‚Äôm ordering  the whole duck, it is cooked for 90 min, we couldn‚Äôt stay long enough this time, but and I‚Äôm already excited about my next visit :)
Also, the interior design inside is great!
The waiter was super friendly and told us the life story of Mr. Baczewski and the restaurants development.
Oh, and the cherry campot was üî•
Amazing place in the heart of Lviv! Beautiful atmosphere, delicious Galician cuisine, and great service. The indoor garden with live music is a lovely touch. Highly recommended!
Very nice Galician specialties. Food and drink quality excellent. Service could have been a bit more attentive and timely....missed my shot at poppy cheesecake as the kitchen " closed"

Let yourself indulge in taste. This is a must-go-restaurant in Lviv. We loved everything: the quality, look and the taste of food, quick and attentive waiters, cozy interior design, singing live birds and soothing live piano music. Will keep coming back.

Fist time at this restaurant was a pleasure. But today I pay more because I'm a foreigner.
The prices wasn't the same on the menu and on the bill. The waiter explains me that it was because the meat was "by weight" but even the price of the wine was diferent... And also, I pay an aditional price for the service the first time but not the second time......  The prices are flexible on the day? On their mood?? I could have come every day during my stay but I won't, it's a shame.

I wish to give it 5*, but unfortunately our experience was way different.
Nice interior and posh atmosphere.
Manu has big enough selection.
We tried their delicious salmon toasts and pate.
Their meat dumplings were ok, slightly overpriced.
Speaking about their duck - it tasted old, dry and wined pear was cold and it didn't pair well. When the waitress noticed that I'm no longer eating, she asked if I didn't like it, to what I replied - yes; then she just took the plate away without saying anything. We still paid for the meal that was terrible.
We visited this place on September 17th.
I highly recommend this place with outstanding atmosphere. But I wish portions would be slightly bigger to match the price.

Awesome atmosphere, friendly staff and delicious food. We tried a lot of different meals, the food was great. Especially I liked fish soup, chicken wings, and Irish coffee. Highly recommend this place!

We had our wedding party at this restaurant !!Big thank you to administrator Andriy who made everything so easy and enjoyable! Big respect to waitresses who were extremely professional! Food was very delicious for affordable price
Very cozy place and nice staff. The sommelier works in the establishment

This is a place that surprises with both the menu (Ukrainian haute cuisine) and the execution and tastes. It's so delicious that you want to come back again and again until you've tried the whole menu. The restaurant is located on the same line as famous Lviv restaurants on Rynok Square. But here is something that you will not find in places with good marketing - well-known places. The price is plus or minus the same as in the most popular restaurants, but the emotions from the delicious food exceeded our expectations. Thanks to the Chef for the menu and the team for the service!
We have already tried a warm salad with grilled chicken, health salad with avocado and green peas, green salad with quinoa, Leonsky onion soup, chicken fillet, oxtails with potato sauce, goose liver pate with plum and fig marmalade, apple dessert - everything was incomparably delicious!

Professional service, elegant presentation, and refined flavors. Every detail‚Äîfrom the attentive staff to the beautifully plated dishes‚Äîreflects a high standard. A place where quality speaks for itself.

God bless this place and people are working here.
Had two unexpected but in the same time pleasant meetings here.
Best wishes to Andri and Marta ü´∂üèªü´∂üèª
Quite unique and extraordinary menu and presentation. You will not find this interpretation of dishes anywhere else. Exquisite taste!

The service is terrible. I waited for 1 hour behind the door to the hotel before they let me in. I still don't quite understand how it works,  if receptionist or the security was sleeping, seems both. While knoking on the door, the police stopped me and checked my ID because of curfew in Ukraine. Thank got I had a booking on me and they left me alone. Won't recommend, avoid this place at all cost (pun intended as the hotel is one of the most expensive there, you will save some money, don't. Don't even consider this one

It was definitely one of the best restaurants I've ever been to and I travel a lot. The food was exquisite, Ukrainian cuisine at its best! Waiters were very kind and attentive, handled always proactive! It's one of the reasons I would love to get back to Lviv as soon as possible!

This is by far the best food we had in Lviv. Everything is prepared very quickly and served beautifully. Each dish was extremely tasty and had the restaurants own twist added. The staff are professional, kind and attentive. Could not recommend this place enough.

Who needs a menu in English when you have incredible servers like the one I had?

Incredible food, place and customer service, thank god I speak some polish - the staff is the real deal here. I loved the food and the espresso (finally a good espresso, sincerely an Italian man).

Fully recommend though bring someone who speaks or understands Ukrainian even if this incredible place needs no translation!
Very tasty, very friendly! I highly recommend this restaurant. Thank you!
Non-pretentious and modern casual restaurant featuring traditional regional Ukrainian food. Great service, very helpful with deciphering the menu. Wonderful place!

It was a wonderful, atmospheric Christmas eve, when we decided to end it with an amazing dinner at this restaurant. But NO!!!! We reserved a table 30 minutes prior for our favorite seats and were ~10 minutes late without any notice of staff, that we will need to call again to extend reservations and lost our chosen table right in front of our noses without a chance to get it back. On top of that, the waiter we talked to, gave off a very arrogant and ignorant attitude that made me feel disrespected as a customer and as a human. Unfortunately we did not know his name, since he did not wear any badge. He was tall, with short and dark hair and a fade cut. Additionally after getting another table, they told us about a waiting time of 30-35, which turned out to be 50 and even my lemonade was not delivered after 20-30 minutes, which in itself is already a disaster. I am a customer from Germany who came here, because I had very pleasant experiences last time in summer, but the way I got treated this time, makes me consider to make this my last.

We ordered duck with truffle potatoes and salad with tuna. Both dishes were insanely amazing!!! I can‚Äôt recommend enough the duck, it‚Äôs mind blowing tasty ü§§. The service was fast and waiter super attentive

such a cozy and stylish place! üí´
Biblioteka RestoBar has a lovely vibe ‚Äî warm lights, beautiful interior, and a calm, relaxing atmosphere.

definitely coming back! üíõ

Pizza was excellent!

BUT we ordered two meals.
I got my Pizza, ate it, and finished.

My wife waited more than one hour (70 minutes) after ordering (waiter said it will take 20 minutes) but didn't get her food.

It wasn't full.

Super disappointing!
This is a fantastic place with tasty food and unique cocktails. The staff is friendly, and Taras is a professional!

Really nice restaurant! Have a variety of salads, meats, and pastas plus much more.
Waiters very professional and friendly! Located in Lyviv and joins the Swiss Hotel.

I would really like to thank the staff for their kindness. The gentleman out side the door was cary helpful. He helped us getting our baby stroller all the way in.
The rest of the staff were very helpful too.
For the food I ordered the Arrabbiata pasta which sadly wasn‚Äôt like what I expected. Just spicy tomato bits and was not saucy at all.

The veal salad was very delicious! I liked it.

The mushroom soup was warm and flavorful! You can never go wrong ordering it!

Finally and sadly I don‚Äôt have a pic for was the Quattro formaggio pizza which was tasty!

I really recommend this nice restaurant if you ever visit Lviv!

Great service, delicious food. I would highly recommend this restaurant.  Amazing service, our waitress was Maria and sommelier Vladislav did a great job,  their employer should be proud of their employees.  I would highly recommend Valentino as it is the best restaurant with a Terrace in town, with delicious food,  great service and a spectacular view!
One of the best restaurants in Lviv. Visit it and enjoy their yummy steak! They have an arabic menu and you can see a panoramic view of Lviv
Everything is very clean and fancy. Staff is very pleasant. Food is good and a bit overpriced. They have a terrace on the 7-th floor opened in warm period of the year.

I had a Borsch and chicken with vegetables+ a beer. Everything was amazing. The location, the atmosphere quiet and cozy and the food were simply perfect.
Oleg followed our lunch and he was super available, really kind and communicative. Really thanks to him for this experience, when i‚Äôll come back i‚Äôll now for sure where to go to eat :)

If you want to feel real old Lviv City atmosphere go to Underground Kindrat ( –ü—ñ–¥–ø—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∏–π –ö—ñ–Ω–¥—Ä–∞—Ç), little charming restaurant in the heart of city center! Great food, tasty homemade drinks, wonderful servers! Special thanks our server Oleg for perfect recommendations!
Loved the place and the food.  Our waiter Oleg was a star, advised delicious food and made quite a presentation in preparation one of it. Definitely recommend visiting
Had a really good Borscht for an extremely good price. The server Oleg was great too, was able to cater with the language barrier, brilliant service. Thanks Oleg.

This place is unique for me. I haven't eaten here, just tried few of their homemade drinks. Two of them worth mentioning: white mama&black papa. These are made with royal jelly and taste incredible. White is more sweet and black is hot like pepper. But be aware, alcohol percentage on  those are around 68%. I've tried 4 other drinks and didn't like them much. However for these two, I highly recommend this restaurant!
Great atmosphere, friendly waiters, delicious food!

Very average to below average sushi, if you can call it sushi, because it is mainly oversauced, low fish fusion something with mostly rice and cheap ingredients and same grade of Japanese as a Hamburger. Practically no fish except salmon.
Tried the worms, yes, which was at least funny.
Service also had not her best day and seemed a bit unfriendly.
Heavily overpriced for the offering, that's why I give 2 instead of 3 stars.
At least the restaurant itself looked cool. Maybe the non-sushi food is better.

I was in Ukraine for some time in March. I visited this restaurant twice. The sushi was immaculate and the service was really great. It‚Äôs the best sushi restaurant I‚Äôve been to. I‚Äôve been to many sushi restaurants in various cities such as Prague, Krakow, Warsaw, Florence and London. Mamenori was the best. I‚Äôll be back soonüòä

If you're looking for sushi, it's a place to visit. It was difficult to choose, as everything looks interesting. I went for mamenory with salmon and prawns. It was a masterpiece. The taste is full, with wonderful flavours.
They also serve non-alcoholic wine besides all the variety of cocktails and wines.
The atmosphere is very modern, you get the feeling that owners wanted to create a modern and a bit of a luxury feeling. I felt very welcomed by the waiters, the service was very fast and with a smile.
I definitely recommend Mamenory. Hope to visit it again soon

One of my favorite restaurants in Lviv. The soup Tom Yam is very flavorful, in my opinion the best in the town. The sushi rolls are so delicious and fresh. The ambiance is amazing. Highly recommend everyone to visit.

The food was amazing!!! They had one of the best Philadelphias I‚Äôve had, definitely try the cola chicken and the ramen! A special shout-out to the lady who showed us how they alter chopsticks to make them accessible for first timers - will try and teach my friends the same way ü§£

I came to Bernardyn on my last night in Lviv with my aunt. From the minute we entered, we were warmly greeted by the bartender and then wonderfully taken care of by our waitress.

I loved the atmosphere at Bernardyn. From the beautiful original paintings to the arched windows overlooking the church square.

We were treated to an amuse bouche from the chef: slices of dark bread and Ukrainian salo for dipping. It was just enough to hold us over before our entrees came out. For our entrees, we picked the salmon, a potato puree side, and the lamb with vegetables and couscous. I loved my salmon and the mashed potatoes as my side. I tried my aunt‚Äôs lamb, and I now know what I‚Äôm ordering next time I‚Äôm back at Bernardyn.

Friends, Ber Nar Dyn is exceptional! It‚Äôs my new favorite restaurant, in Lviv and all of Ukraine. If you appreciate flavorful, healthy, culinary delights, outstanding service, high quality beverages, peaceful ambience, and great value, Ber Nar Dyn awaits you.

During my most recent visit to Lviv, friends and I discovered this magnificent restaurant. We enjoyed and highly recommend: Filet mignon with roasted eggplant and rosemary sauce (rare to medium rare); Rack of veal with porcini mushrooms (rare to medium rare);  Grilled chicken fillet in adjika; Veal medallions with grilled vegetables and spicy sauce (rare to medium rare); Grilled dorado with vegetables; Lamb stewed with vegetables and couscous; Beer platter, Greek Salad; Caprese salad;  Margaritas; Wonderful wines; and Coffee. We look forward to indulging in the desserts, during our next visit.

A very special  ‚Äúthank you‚Äù to Arina and Sofia for their world-class table service. When in Lviv, don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to dine at this exceptional restaurant.

Such a fantastic experience.  Amazing views, incredible food, and wonderful service.  It's hitting on all marks!  Be sure to take a walk around and check out the incredible artwork adorning the walls.
Beautiful interior and view. Went here for lunch and the food was very good. Staff is friendly, and prices are reasonable. What more could you want from a restaurant?

Honestly, this is the best service I've ever experienced in Lviv. Everything was amazing and friendly. If it's your first time in Lviv, I highly recommend it. The waiters were particularly attentive and provided excellent service.

Enjoyed a meal here with good service. The beef cheek was an absolute standout ‚Äì so tender and flavorful! The fish was decent (8 out of 10), served in a fun edible container. Desserts were solid. Highly recommend the beef cheek.

A nice and cozy restaurant with a local Galician style of cuisine. It is off centred but is worth a detour. The cuisine, very delicious, can yet be improved. The service was quick and friendly and our waiter (Serhiy) was very attentive and of good advice for meals. The prices of wine are very reasonable, and there is a nice choice of Ukrainian and other European wines. A menu for kids has many good and delicious options.
One of the best restaurants in lviv. I visited three times in a week. A variety of food for selections. Excellent taste of bread with mushroom soup, highly recommended.

22.9.2020 very pleasant surprise,nice summer garden, delicious banosch and mushroom soop,top consultation by waiter(was completely unexpected and pleasant), beer of them however is rather thin...Tsypa is more rich..but this is an individual taste,of course.

Ukrainian cuisine from the Galitza district(?)...The hot borscht with beet roots, beef, and onions were fantastic! Polenta very tasty, nicely garnished. Pickled mushrooms, salmon and white fish interesting, Facility traditionally decorated, has a gift house with preserves and other condiments and sweets. Reasonably priced, easy parking, bring the kids. Pork chops were meh. Have to edit this review from 4 to 5 stars. After my first trip to Lviv and Ukraine, Hungry Mykola had the BEST borscht of all the places sampled for this national dish. Well Done HM!

It was an awesome experience. The staff was accommodating, especially Serhii and Anna. We had some oysters and I decided to go for the snow crabs. All of which were sooo tasty. Definitely a recommendation from me!
Absolutely high quality sea food for good price. Oysters are fresh and decent, shrimps are very fresh and served well. We loved spending family time there.

The Interior design is marvelous, I felt like I was down the deck of an old ship. The Dishes are great, we tried the baked scallops, which was amazing with the cheesy thousand Island sauce, accompanied by very tasty and fresh oysters and had a chance to experience two of their vodkas: organic Saima & the cheapest one, haha.  We also tried the Beer mushly, it is not extremely special but it is a great companion for seefood.

First of all, I would like to say, Lviv isn‚Äôt that place where you should try the seafood.
The restaurant has nice and cozy atmosphere. It‚Äôs rather small and you feel like at real sea restaurant. The food was well cooked, but seafood feels frozen.
It‚Äôs good to come for brunch. Drink Prosecco or Cava and eat oysters.

Lviv is amazing place. Nowadays there are variety of restaurants but I wanted to try the seafood ü¶û one. And to be honest, I was quite disappointed. Ok, if you know how seafood should be cooked and served, you would see from my photos that expectations and reality are very different . Let me start from scallops, it was impossible to eat ‚Ä¶ Over-salted, too much garlic üßÑ and to be honest I got the feeling that it was digested by smb before, sorry to describe like that‚Ä¶But it is what it is. Warm salad: I got a feeling that a palm of seafood was just topped my cream , no taste at all. We didn‚Äôt finish our meal ‚Ä¶Please, review the way you cook it and serve it!

If you want to feel like you‚Äôre in dining in medieval times with monks. This is the spot. I was really amazed by it, since it was a very spontaneous find. The food is very good. For drinks we took elexir which is basically a make it yourself cocktail. With an ancient recipeüòç Don‚Äôt miss this out!! And ask for the story of the place, the service is incredible there!

Probably my favourite spot to eat in Lviv. Food is fresh and extremely tasty, portions are big, atmosphere is immaculate. Will come back! Suggest to try all the menu each time in a different selection

A great meat feast awaits you!  I have eaten four times and love this place. The chicken spike is super juicy and falls off the skewer. The pork spike is just the right amount of spicy.  The Turkey salad is the perfect size for an appetizer and the Beef Wellington is delicious. So come and check out this place, you will be happy you did

The food was delicious, the service was top-notch, and the atmosphere felt like stepping back in time. What made it even more special was the warmth of the local Ukrainians‚Äîwe were welcomed with open arms and felt incredibly safe, cared for, and loved. A must-visit if you‚Äôre in the area!

Atmosphere is epic! I‚Äôm a medieval style lover, so I highly enjoyed! Food and drinks are also served in the medieval style. Atmosphere is the best! Food portions are quite small for those prices, so I can say it‚Äôs expensive. Come here if you want to enjoy atmosphere. After lunch here we went to buy more food elsewhere. In general I enjoyed.

This place has an amazing menu. Simply delicious and the themed rooms are marvellous. Start with having to give a password to get in and then you are led from a 1920s 1 bed apartment, through a door into something super extravagant. Highly recommended üëå üëç

Great food and an interesting idea for the hidden entrance. We had a game and mushroom pasta and duck leg with risotto, which was delicious too (although pickled cornels and coriander didn't fit the dish in my opinion).
If you don't remember to ask for the 90% discount, you'll get it anyway :)

The historic center of Lviv is filled with restaurants and cafes for every taste. This restaurant is hidden away and not easy to find. Information about it is passed by word of mouth. I am telling you: be sure to come here. When you knock on the door, a man in an old robe will open you and let you into his apartment, where his pets live. And if his rabbit accepts you, he will allow you to open the old door. You will find yourself in a chic restaurant with great music. You will be greeted as a dear guest. When we received our food and drinks, we realized that people who are in love with their work work here. Thanks to all the restaurant staff, we are in love with this place.

If you go to one nice restaurant when you come to Lviv come here. The food is shockingly inexpensive and delicious.  I posted several pictures of the Masonic themed interior which reminded me of my fraternity chapter room.  Definitely worth visiting when you come to Lviv

A very interesting restaurants at the center of Lviv old town. Don't be surprised with the price tag on the menu, as they purposely put the price up by 10 times and will offer you 90% discount. Although it's a very touristy restaurant, food and service were surprisingly good.

Had breakfast here this morning and it was lovely.  Just off the Ploscha Rynok by half a block, you walk down a hallway to the cafe in a lovely courtyard.  Here it is quiet and serene away from the hustle bustle of the city.  Delicious coffee was followed by two excellent breakfast dishes with veggies, avocado and eggs which were super fresh, well prepared, presented, and tasty.

Highly recommended.

We will be back tomorrow for more!

We had two breakfasts at this place staying with my friend . Food is very well prepared and served . Variety of options to chose . Delicious coffee. Very friendly staff and very pets friendly place - menu for dogs as well available . Pleasant atmosphere and cozy place . Outdoor terrace opened in a good weather to rest outside at fresh air. Highly recommended !

Popped in for a drink and for a small dinner. First I got the raspberry drink which was delicious. Then, for dinner, I sat in and got the potato pancakes with mushroom sauce and it was absolutely fantastic.

Service was great, I don't remember his name but one of the staff spoke great English and was very friendly. You can get a 20% discount ticket here if you stay at the Dream Hostel.
Friends Cafe is my go-to in Lviv! The syrnyky are heavenly, the chicken melt is perfection, and the cozy vibe plus friendly service seals the deal. I‚Äôll always come back here!
We had a wonderful breakfast here, nice places outside in the inner courtyard. English menu via QR code, friendly and quick service, good coffee, great beef sandwich and chicken wirh poached eggs.

I only came here for a quick after-lunch dessert.  The service providers speak English, some better than others. ;-) The cheesecake with chocolate sauce was good, the cappuccino a bit on the sweet side, if only just a hint. The toilets are decent, apart from the heavily stained mirror. Overall a recommendation in this price range

It‚Äôs Lviv‚Äôs hidden gem. Located in one of back alleys of Rynok Square is right in the center of everything, yet hidden from the crowds.

They serve great selection of coffee. Everything you might want to try, they have it.

Surprisingly it‚Äôs a very nice place to get some work done. It‚Äôs quite with excellent interior. Comfortable tables and chairs.
Was told this is the best coffee shop in Lviv, and indeed it is. The only thing is they don‚Äôt have variety of sandwiches.. though the chicken sandwich is really good.
Really sweet and nice cafe with lots of coffee alternatives for everyone. Cold, hot or with different aromas.
Has the most ridiculous coffee menu I've ever seen and all options are very tasty (coffee and condensed milk is a match made in heaven). Romantic atmosphere inside üëå

A very cosy place to have something tasty, to have some good meals.

Beatifully decorated with decorative stoves.

I enjoy it's atmosphere, delicious cheesecake and ristretto

That is real syrnyk. Cheesecake ( in English)

A perfect place to dream and to ponder of nothing.....
Another great Lviv restaurant. Delicious fresh food, friendly service, and an atmospheric space in the basement. What more could you ask for?

Lovely little restaurant (with caf√© options) that we visited three times whilst in Lviv. Attentive staff who speak English, delicious food, and a nice collection of fresh and crisp local beers. Recommended.

A little gem! lovely decor and absolutely delicious Ukrainian food. We have been here a few times, have tried all the soups - all great, solyanka is the best, the bread one not so (though beautifully served :) Can highly recommend liver and tongue dishes. We are going to visit this place again and again during our stay.
Nice, quiet place. They have good coffee. Breakfast was tasty but a portions was too small for us

Historical Cafe which has it's existence for almost 200 years. Has been moved once from it's original location.

Walnut cake is to die for and the coffee is great. Has an old school look and the present owner is been running this for the last 15 years now. Love the ambiance and music. Old school artifacts and photographs on the walls. Warm and welcome staff. It's a must visit when you visit Lviv.

Very cosy and nicely decorated cafe with a friendly and welcoming lady behind the counter who offered us a table as soon as we came through the door. The place had quite an intellectual vibe. Although we were there for a short time I tried the Honey cake which was exquisitely tasty. It was moist and just the right amount of sweetness. I'd love to come back and try the other beautiful looking cakes.

It is a small cute shop which is decorated with old photos and wooden tables with wooden chairs. They have variety of desert choices. I really recommend the cake with the blueberries and raspberries, it was very delicious. ƒ∞f you like the liquor taste and chocolate, the chocolate cake is for you. The mochas very also delicious, especially the whipped cream on top. They have a lot of different tea options which is cool. The only problem was nobody can speak English and we had hard time communicating.

Great vintage coffee shop a bit off the city center. I had double americano and loved it! The atmosphere is like you've suddenly appeared in the 19th century. A perfect quiet spot for reading and enjoying a cup of coffee. Highly recommend!

The holdest cafeteria from Lviv
Tasty cappuccino served with warm service and sweetness
Confortable and relaxing Ambiente with smooth jazz or blues
Intreresting representation of zodiac signs with dolls
Recommended first place to go on the morning in order to start a great day
And get inspired

I feel so good here! It's a cozy place, there are many, but now I have my favourite cozy place in Lviv.
The liquors are truly good, and also the decaffeinated coffee is!

Very nice cafe! They have tables inside and outside. Great place to enjoys excellent coffee prepared on the sand and watch people passing by. They have good pastries too. Oh, and you can get ‚Äúnalivka‚Äù local liquors of many different kinds.

Very popular place. Difficult to find a seat during weekend however worth to enjoy Georgian coffee from the hot sand batch and local sweets. Nice choice of liqueurs with the famous cherry. Must visit during stay in Lviv

Delicious chou cake and "nut" cake, good coffee, nice ambience.
Self-service
This place is the one place I want to come back every day if only I could. Their coffee is AMAZING!! they have the best turkish coffee I have had in my life. Their food items are delicious!
Nice coffee shop. Good prices, fast WiFi, and family friendly spot with kids play area. Recommended

Great caf√© fantastic coffee and fresh cakes, great host super friendly and always welcoming, free wifi üôÇ this is our favourite place to stop and sit for a while.
Five plus stars ü§©üòÄ
Decent place with a hospitable owner from Turkey
Very cozy and nice :) friendly service and delicious beverages

A great place to eat quickly and tasty!
The service is super fast, the girls are great, like bees!
The food...mmm, delicious, filling, large portions, a good selection of side dishes and meat dishes, a large portion of salad.
We were satisfied, I recommend it!

I sincerely thank the owner and staff for such a location.
Incredibly delicious! Everything is fast. For 200 UAH you get a choice of a first, second course with a large portion and compote)
I ate in famous restaurants in Lviv.
Sorry, but they don't reach you))

A simple breakfast that you can put together yourself. It usually includes an egg of your choice (omelet or simply fried), a little salad, bread and compote. In addition, they also took potatoes, which, like breakfast, were very plentiful.

Tasty, fast, not expensive, large portions - everything is great

Probably the best alternative to Puzatka. The selection is small, but everything is tasty, fast and most importantly - inexpensive. And I don't know if I was lucky or it's always like this here, but I got a glass of compote and 5 slices of bread (which in the same Puzatka they charge 15 UAH each). In general, I can recommend it to everyoneüëç
I really liked the place: delicious and interesting dishes, good and fast service, a pleasant and cozy interior, and the tiles in the toilet are a separate masterpiece!

Popped by Te Amo on a Sunday night for a glass of wine. I love the relaxing atmosphere. Everything is clean and white. Classical music playing in the background. Prices are reasonable. Wine does the trick. I tried the Chardonnay (95uah). Snacks are delicious. I recommend the cheese plate (145uah).
Very interesting concept of coffee on one side, and beer in the other! Nice looking pastries, sweet and savory, and excellent service!
Super tasty coffee with a nice and thorough service. All the recent trends in coffemaking! I sugget  having their espresso tonic, it's marvelous.

We got creative meet up here. U know, Sunday Evening Pajama Pparty in comfortable home clothes üåÜ I‚Äôd enjoyed the best sea ‚Äã‚Äãbuckthorn tea ever! And table games! It was cool. And Te Amo opened till 22:00 üïô
Vibing coffee shop with great service, good drinks, and healthy, fresh food. All served up in a clean and clear atmosphere. Art, music, books, and food, what more does a man need?

Trendy specialty coffee roastery and cafe featuring single-origin Black Honey coffee beans, artisan pastries, gourmet desserts including macarons and layered cakes, with industrial-chic design and outdoor terrace seating. Perfect for third-wave coffee culture, laptop-friendly workspace with free wifi, premium coffee tasting, Instagram-worthy plant-filled interior, and sophisticated atmosphere ideal for coffee enthusiasts seeking quality roasted beans and professional barista service in stylish urban location.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã

Visited your caf√© recently and had a mixed experience. I initially wanted to order a matcha orange drink and a sandwich, but I was told the wait time would be up to 35 minutes. I decided not to proceed with the order because I couldn‚Äôt wait that long.

However, my sister placed a similar order right after me ‚Äì a shrimp muffin and a lemonade. Surprisingly, her lemonade was prepared in just 2 minutes, and the muffin was served within 18 minutes of ordering.

This inconsistency was confusing and a bit frustrating. If the wait time can vary so much between customers and similar orders, it would be helpful to clarify that in advance. I hope this feedback helps improve the communication and service flow for future guests.

Well, we tried to have breakfast here, but they told us we would have to wait 30 minutes, there was no service at the table, the single dude at the counter was very busy, bit overwhelmed at this moment and kind of rude to us and other guests. We took a coffee and left, coffee was very good and strong though.

Great little coffee shop away from the tourist area selling hand own roasted coffee. They take real care in making the best coffee and there cold brew is amazing. It's more of a place for locals so if you want to escape the tourist trap then this is the place for you.

Cute little caf√© in the heart of Lviv. My favorite part about it was their selection of plant based milk. They have one of every taste! The coffee itself was very tasty as well and the outside view was a big plus. I would definitely make a stop here again.

Gasova Lampa is a unique and beautiful restaurant with a cool historical theme. The place is filled with old gas lamps, and the atmosphere is very cozy. We enjoyed the food, and the drinks served in test tubes were a fun touch. The view from the top floor was also amazing. A great spot to visit in Lviv!

The food was a bit greasy but overall fine. The infused drinks were delicious ‚Äì I even bought some for myself. I particularly liked the apple-cinnamon and coffee flavors. The service was excellent, with very attentive and friendly staff. I recommend this place for those who appreciate tasty drinks and great service!

Unique atmosphere, friendly staff and interesting way of serving, especially drinks. Food nice, but in the menu beside some dishes should be 'banana for a scale".
Anyway, nice experience, and I'll be back with friends, when they stop to worry about war. Don't take me wrong - there IS war, but not in the Lviv.

Awesome place.  Great history and great collection. I like the lamps and their theme. It was a little dark at first but it was quite fun to look at all the lamps.

The service was very polite with decent English. There were a few pauses but nothing that would hinder our experience.

We ordered fish but apparently it was too mushy so they made another one. (I thought both were delicious)

We ordered sizzled chicken but there was no kitchen so they again, prepared another dish to make up for it. We ended up eating a lot more than planned.

Everything tasted amazing nonetheless. I especially liked their deep fried lavash with cheese and their chicken wings. All of the sauced were very well balanced, not too milky and not too thick. Just perfect.

Amazing space and history involved with this place.  Inside it‚Äôs like Alice in wonderland with hundreds of gas lamps and potions around every corner.  Outside you‚Äôve got a nice patio on a beautiful cobblestone street.

The service must be hit or miss here though. For us it was a huge miss, which is a shame since we planned to come here to celebrate a birthday.  But not bringing out a drink after 3 orders, bringing out ice cold varenyki was the nail in the coffin.

They do make some great instagram worthy presentations and cocktails.

We have great experience. Thank you Iryna for all your service and all stories about coffee, rostering and coffee shop assortment. You are amazing. We were there on a quiet day and had personally altered experience and coffee tasting.

The strudel wasn't really my taste. Everything is served in small sizes. It is really dark in the cafe. The atmosphere doesn't go well with the menu , I find. And they unfortunately only serve sweets to eat. ( that was the only menu given to us. )
There was a really unpleasant smell....
But:
The waiter was really nice. And they decorated everything nicely. The decoration is really something to check out.
The coffee and cake is nicely served on the plates. Looks good.

BAD experience. The place is cool but just for a quick lookaround. Went in, the waitresses were having their nails done on a table. We ordered a creme brule√© which we disliked (had a strong lemon taste which was not clarified anywhere). We asked for another dessert and they refused, blowing us off. We then said we would not pay for the dessert and they started acting in an intimidating way. Therefore, we decided to leave. One of the waitresses eventually chased us on the street filming with her phone threatening to call the police.
Probably one of the best coffee spots in Lviv.
A great place for coffee lovers.

The first thing that catches your eye is the interesting interior and cozy atmosphere. The location is of course also great. The presentation of dishes is original, interesting. The main course, salmon, was a little overcooked in my opinion, but everything else was very tasty. There is a large selection, and the desserts even have their own history. When you walk to the restroom, you can also see the beautiful interior. You definitely want to come back here again.
We had the breakfast for 9‚Ç¨. It was served on an etagere. There is a big choice of cakes, tarts and different types of sweets. Wonderful views over the rynek. Friendly and fast waiters. Djakuju
Lovely caf√© in the center of Lviv! Great atmosphere, tasty food, and friendly service. Perfect spot for breakfast or coffee with a view of Rynok Square. Highly recommended!

Situated in the historic building of town hall with amazing interior and huge amount of historic pictures and furniture.
On the first day I ordered granola with fruits, omelette and few pieces of chicken roulette which was slightly salty, but ok. Zephyr on dessert- soft, fresh, tasty, not very sweet. On the third plate I had great combination of blueberry jam with fresh chicken paste on the crispy toast. Second time I had breakfast consisted from becon, crumble eggs on the piece of fresh white bread and fresh young sprouts of pea plant. Glass of proseco and teapot of fragrant carpathian tea nicely supplemented the meal.
The price varied between 8 and 10 eur per person.
All breakfast dishes were served on the special tray.

If you watch this movie The Grand Budapest Hotel (2014) You will feel the atmosphere which is very similar to this movie. Very good dessert and very good decorations... Don't miss this place if you are in Lvov.
Super cool place! The atmosphere is amazing. You can have coffee here and also head downstairs to the so-called 'coffee mine.' The concept is simply brilliant‚Äîdefinitely a must-visit spot in Lviv!

It‚Äôs a must see spot when visiting Lviv Ukraine.  My walking tour guide pointed it out and I said let‚Äôs get a coffee!  From the outside it does not look like much much, but it has a large area for dinning, a shop and extensive underground very storage and cavern-like areas that are worth the visit in itself. I had the flaming coffee and it entails a using a flaming torch thst makes the sprinkling of sugar on top of the coffee froth. The short show involves the table on fire and a final melting browning of the sugar to create to shell you tap through to get to the coffee!  Lots of fun for a cup of coffee!!!

Such a fun find! I love the flames that they use to finish off drinks at the table. Must check it out when in Lviv. I wish I could have gone again! Great selection of coffee and coffee themed items in the store.
Spectacular, delicious coffee with a wide choice. Very kind staff, they also provide a free jug of water with lemon slices at each table. The helmet tour of the underground mine is very interesting

Lviv Coffee Mine is a must-visit place for coffee lovers! The atmosphere is unique, with an underground "mine" where they "extract" coffee. It was fun to explore, and the whole place had a cozy and historic feel. We tried their coffee, and it was really good‚Äîrich, strong, and full of flavor. A great spot to enjoy a cup of coffee in Lviv!
The dishes are top, the prices are top, the bonus is a very pleasant interior, which you definitely do not expect from a bistro ‚ù§Ô∏è

The food is sooooo delicious!! Really, like mom's! Everything is always hot, tasty, and it's very budget-friendly to have lunch)
But the service is a minus, the employees in the hall behave rudely, silently take away the dishes, even if you may not have finished eating yet... and then loudly discuss the visitors in the kitchen... the food is very tasty, but the aftertaste from the service was terrible...(

We constantly order at work. It's quite tasty and the prices are very affordable. At first we went to the cafe, and with the strengthening of quarantine we make orders for self-delivery. The menu is not repeated every day, there is always a choice of dishes. It happened that they could mess something up with the order: they didn't add croutons, then some dish, but they always responded promptly, delivered the food or minused the next day.
I recommend) simple homemade food at an affordable price!)

As always, everything is very tasty, high quality, comfortable, with care for customers üíö

And the humidifiers on the ceiling of the balcony (loggia?) in such heat are üíò

High-quality food, many local parents feed their children here, pleasant atmosphere, high-quality materials in the interior decoration (not like a cheap, dirty run-in), very clean. Full lunch for 1 person. in December 2023 ~200 UAH (without alcohol)
I fell in love with their chill vibe and nice music. Stuff is very nice. We ate lasagna with vine and were pleased with our food.

A lovely retreat to have a meal or just a drink. Very convivial, which a French Bistro vibe to it. English spoken thank you ladies. I found it very pleasing and restful, the food and drink I had was very good, It suited my tastes, and was pleased. I shall visit again, when next in Lviv.

Good selection of food and beverages, suits for a quick bytes as well as for a full dinner. Decorations and music are very nice.

We got pate, camembert, and braced veal cheeks. All delicious and bell presented.

We have coupled it with two local craft beers, hot chocolate, and late.

There is certain luck of spaces and they unlikely to be able accommodating a large company.

PS: and their vintage restroom is very cool.
Fantastic place. It‚Äôs so nice and cozy. The food is great and not expensive. It‚Äôs cool that you can listening music but it does not bother you or your company.

As I am addicted to the cool breakfast and tea, the Papi is my favorite place now! They have breakfast all day and very tasty beverages. And atmosphere is amazing! The owners took a lot of efforts to make this place special! What is more, Papi has only 8-9 tables, so it comfortable for eating in calm and silence, which a lot of big cafes can‚Äôt offer. The staff is very polite and smiled, what is a great bonus)
Recommend this place!

Excellent cafe with a mono product in the form of cheesecake. Good service and cozy interior. Location in the very center, all accessible attractions nearby. It was very tasty, we took some home with us.
It‚Äôs quite different from the usual cheesecake in Europe but definitely worth a try!Great coffee and service, too.
Probably the best cheesecake I have had
Good place, with atmosphere and very delicious food, but guys who work it's 100001/10
Warm and welcoming service! The best cheesecake ever, I bet ü´∂üèª

This is an excellent Ukrainian restaurant. Good fresh authentic food, super-efficient service, and a wonderful atmospheric interior in an old building full of wood panelling, stone pillars and knights' portraits on the walls. The prices are not the cheapest, but it's not expensive - and it's definitely worth it. The significant downside is that every main dish contains meat - only some salads and one soup were vegetarian. They should really offer a couple more vegetarian main dishes...

Vibey restaurant in the middle of all the action in Lviv. The interior has a lot of classic-looking structure and decor which was cool. I ordered salmon toast and a brownie with ice cream. Both were fantastic: no notes. Highly recommend. Hope to come back for dinner. Service was good as well.

I like itüòÅüòäüòâ
Dmytro is the best waiterüëç

I liked the place very much for its wide spaces and wooden interiors with weak light making whole place quite intimate and really comfortable to catch the feeling of time freeze. Cuisine are mostly traditional Polish dishes, not bad but also not astonishing and this is disadvantage because whole place is a restaurant first and only then place with magical atmosphere....nevertheless i really enjoyed one of my Winter evenings there .

It is a beautiful place. Affordable prices and tasty food. This syrnyk (cheesecake) is the tastiest one I ever tried. Highly recommend it. The waiters are polite.
Nowadays during the pandemic waiters always wear masks, gloves and clean the tables with antiseptics. That‚Äôs great
Great pizza place! If you think that only Italy has great pizza, this restaurant proves you wrong. People working there are lovely and friendly, definitely recommend!
It is delicious! The pizzas are very well filled and crispy

I ordered the Lahidna, Myasna and Chotyri Griba pizzas. Due to the birthday promotion, the pizzas were doubled in price.

The dough is delicious and thin, the only thing is that the sides of these pizzas are drier and harder than usual. I liked the Myasna the most, the taste is very pronounced due to the combination of ingredients. Lahidna is second in my rating, it is generally more tender. Chotyri Griba is also good, but I always prefer meat pizzas, but it is worth paying attention if you like mushrooms.

Waiting time 45 minutes, ordered at approximately 7 pm.

Pizza is my favorite fast food. If you're depressed, eat a RoVero pizza and you'll realize that life is awesome! And if you choose an establishment that has the tastiest pizza and sushi, then this is the place for you ‚òùÔ∏è

Yesterday I celebrated my birthday and ordered a pizza. This is something‚ô•Ô∏è The staff is extremely friendly, the order was fulfilled very quickly, just great! My sincere recommendation, because every RoVero pizza has more than just ingredients, it contains love, care and professionalism of the baker!

Our family always has a wonderful experience at Emily. The music is not too loud (very important for us and sometimes hard to find!) and the food is amazing. Our go-to order is the Brooklyn Pepperoni pizza and the fried tiger shrimp. Extra tomato-Parmesan sauce to dip our pizza crust in. Always perfection! Service is great. Today, Alina waited on us and was very helpful, patient, and conscientious.

Amazing place! Meals are delecious, the waiters are wonderful and attentive.
Thanks to Alina for making our experience in this restaurant so great!
Cold food. Dishes are not exactly as they‚Äôre supposed to according to menu.
The food was very delicious and especially Ms. Alina's approach, smiling face and energy were great.
Nice food and the waitress Angelina was very nice and simple.
super!

The pizza is delicious, but the bakery in the same building closes after 8 pm, which causes some discomfort. I don't know if it's the same owners or different ones, but if you can't enter a certain area, you should put up barriers. I think this restriction is incorrect.

As a regular customer of this establishment, I recommend it, here you will find pizza and boxes for every taste, everything is very tasty and fast, the team works well together, the employees are always friendly and will help you with your order. I definitely haven't tasted a tastier pizza in Lviv!!!

In general, everything is okay, delicious food, friendly staff... But there is no restroom, not to go as needed, but simply even to wash your hands.
The staff does not know where it can be done in the building where the institution is located.

Cashier Ulyana is very friendly
The pizza is very tasty, I recommend it
Always take and always satisfied

Big size Caesar we ordered. It was okay. Very thin dough was good but ingredients were not added that much so it is not tasty as we expected.
Huge issue to find a place to sit outside.
Waiters do not care as always be restaurants in Ukraine
Do not expect to find lots of beer types, they just have a couple option

The pizza was delicious but the service can be better.
It took 15 minutes for them to come and give us the menu and the pizza came in after 30 mins so if you are ready to wait 30-45 mins for your order you can go here.
The quality is absolutely the best in Lviv.. the pizza was baked perfect.

I want to share my extremely pleasant impressions from visiting the IQ pizzeria. This is not just a food establishment - it's a place where you want to return again and again!

The service is at the highest level. The staff is friendly, attentive, and sincerely interested in ensuring that each guest is satisfied. Orders are taken quickly, everything is served on time, and most importantly - with a smile.
And now about the main thing - pizza. It's something incredible! The dough is perfect: thin, crispy, aromatic. The filling is generous, the products are fresh, the combination of flavors is impeccable. The prices are absolutely justified by the quality.
We sincerely thank the IQ team for the delicious moments, professionalism, and love for their work. This is exactly the case when service and cuisine are harmoniously combined. Without a doubt, we recommend it to everyone!

This pizza is a real work of culinary creativity! It has a dense golden crust, well-baked cheese and an appetizing appearance. The most interesting thing is the unusual use of triangles of processed cheese that resemble pieces of American cheddar. They are chaotically laid out, but this is what gives the pizza a special character. There's also a light sauce‚Äîperhaps tomato or chili‚Äîthat adds color and probably a savory flavor. And flax seeds (or other similar spices) add texture and goodness. Definitely a non-standard, but interesting interpretation of the classic pizza - for those who like experiments!

I visited Osama Sushi for the first time and was very satisfied! The atmosphere is pleasant, the staff is friendly and attentive. The order was brought quickly, everything was fresh and very tasty. I especially liked the salmon rolls and Philadelphia - tender, with the right balance of taste.

My to go place when craving Asian cuisineüçúüç± Their Pad Thai noodles with chicken and shrimp are my favourite. Portions are big and sushi rolls that I‚Äôve ordered - always freshüôÇ Definitely recommendüëçüèª

If you have been missing Ukrainian food then come here.
The Borscht your grandma used to make. If you aren't Ukrainian then the Borscht you wish your grandmother made.

They have amazing service and a delightful chilled atmosphere, and a little background music.

Oh, and the service is delightful theatre at it's best, but understated.
The menu is in English, and you are perfectly welcome to bowl in and sit yourself drinking tankards of beer. There is no need to dress up as this is casual dining at it's best.

Come here, eat, enjoy and grin with pleasure. The food, the service and the furniture seems to come from a rose tinted yesteryear with a little sprinkling of magic, a love of Ukraine and a little dill.
Probably the best –ë–æ–≥—Ä–∞—á we‚Äôve ever had, the taste of the soup is so good‚Ä¶ nothing compared to other ukrainian food restaurants, definitely coming back!
Really tasty borscht and possibly the best lard I've ever tried! atmosphere, service is also top notch
Beautiful place, the food is amazing, the service was great. They have gluten free options and they were very helpful to help me find out what I could eat. The food was delicious
Great recommendation to those who are on a short visit in the city. The place will satisfy your craving for both national atmosphere and quite decent cuisine.
The place is very nice, with friendly staff, a cozy atmosphere, and delicious Ukrainian cuisine. I enjoyed every moment there. Highly recommend it in Lviv.
Hidden delicious restaurant with typical Ukrainian cuisine. Love it and visit it every time when in Lviv

The place is cozy, food was tasty, staff was friendly. Can't ask for anything more.
P.S. Pate was my favorite
A celebration of Ukrainian food and drinks. Refined, elegant and, yet, accessible. A treat. Stylish decor; intimate and romantic. I think I had the best borscht in L‚Äôviv!
Very lovely experience, great traditional food in Lviv, definitely the best Napoleon cake I ever had.

Great place to try traditional Ukrainian food, though it is a little bit difficult to get to. There is a bus stop relatively nearby, though. We tried the Borshch and the potato pancakes, both were delicious and came quickly. We had one of the popular –ø—Ä–∞–≤–¥–∞ beers to go along with our meal. The wait staff was very kind and helpful, and the prices were fair.
Great place to visit specialy by warm months of the year. Service is pretty slow though but still worth a visit. Tasty cousine.
Very pleasant waiting staff, and the food is excellent and priced in moderation. Highly recommend.
It was really good dinner!
Traditional Hutsulska atmosphere and food. Very tasty Varenyky. Almost perfect. Had to take one star off because they forgot our Borscht.

I came here to  explore native Ukrainian tastes, and while mead-based alcohols were good - I have small problem with the food.
Trout on the vegetables was delicious but served just 5 minutes after the soup, so I was still eating soup while trout was getting colder every minute.
Have the staff had basic understanding or training? Or just I strutted to serve ASAP. (BTW. when I was at the restaurant it was almost empty...)
As I said, trout was really good, but soup - nope. It was flat, battery, even after adding ful bowl of condiment it was served with.
Local is focused on selling mead related products, including alcohols.
But ordering food is a 50/50 chance...
I'm disappointed and wouldn't recommend to fellow travelers.
The portions are too small in my opinion. But it was good

Best place to eat if you want Authentic Ukrainian food on a higher level. Top notch varenyky and mushroom soup. Also shout out to the staff and especially the waitress Akseniia that did her job well. Thanks üôèüèª

On the hop from Sydney, spending a few days in Lviv, this cafe/restaurant was very close to my hostel. It's delightful. A theme restaurant decorated with bees and sunflowers serving a variety of flavoured  honey mead as a specialty. A warm and cosy atmosphere. Food and coffee are very nice. Service is attentive and friendly.

I like the decorations so that, time to time making a quick stop to sip a tea when I passing buy. Food menu is not so interesting, but I do love their cranberry and rosemary tea.

Service is slow but nice.

The place located in very old building with so thick walls, that there is next to zero mobile connectivity inside. Wi-Fi  works OK in the first room only. It also often creates a problem to pay by a card.

Kryivka in Lviv offers such a unique and unforgettable experience! The atmosphere immerses you completely, blending history, culture, and a touch of mystery. The entrance alone sets the stage for an exciting adventure. To enter, you need to say 'Slava Ukraini,' which means 'Glory to Ukraine.' Once inside, you're greeted with a shot of alcohol, setting the tone for an exciting and welcoming visit. The ambiance transports you to another era, with decor and atmosphere steeped in history. The staff are friendly and engaging, making the experience even better. The food is delicious, hearty, flavorful, and authentic, leaving you fully satisfied. Kryivka is not just a restaurant‚Äîit's an experience you won't want to miss in Lviv. Highly recommended!

What an incredible experience! Absolutely loved is! And the food is amazing. The place itself has a very cool story behind it. It‚Äôs actually a museum-restaurant with a very interesting theme. I don‚Äôt want to spoil it! Just come and see yourself üòç

Attention All Adventurous Tourists in Ukraine!
Welcome to Lviv ‚Äì the city of legends, cobblestone charm, and unforgettable flavors!

If you‚Äôre lucky enough to wander into the historic heart of this magical city, make sure to uncover one of its best-kept secrets ‚Äî a concept restaurant unlike any other.
Not just a place to eat ‚Äî it's a quest, a story, an experience steeped in tradition and surprise!

Find it... and you‚Äôve already won.
But that‚Äôs just the beginning.

Step inside and savor the soul of Ukraine with authentic recipes passed down from our great-great-grandfathers ‚Äî hearty, homemade, and made to be remembered.
Drink like a local, eat like royalty, and don‚Äôt forget to behave ‚Äî or don‚Äôt, depending on the vibe. Just make it unforgettable.

This is not just dinner. This is Lviv. This is legend.

When you‚Äôve found it ‚Äî tell us how your adventure went. We want the full story!

I was expecting to be a bit disappointed, as usually places like that with tens of thousands of reviews generate a lot of unmatched expectations.

However, I really loved it! The prices, dim lighting, shot at the entrance, food quality and portions, and just the overall atmosphere. I would come back for sure!

Incredible atmosphere with a bold Ukrainian resistance theme
‚Ä¢	Delicious local dishes and a great horilka tasting flight
‚Ä¢	Friendly locals made us feel safe, welcomed, and at home
‚Ä¢	Unique experience with a small shooting range in the basement
Excellent foods and good service, but not too fancy. The place is beautiful and the atmosphere is real good.
It is most amazing and beautiful place to stay in Ukraine!
Classy place with reasonably priced a la carte breakfast. It also has a nice rooftop view of Lviv.
Expensive but high quality restaurant. Tasty nicely served dishes. Wine selection could be potentially improved
Probably the best view of all the restaurants in Lviv. Good service, and the Blue tuna I had was excellent!

Lovely restaurant with lovely interior design and atmosphere. There was a live music as well which was a nice compliment.
To dine in this place we were waiting outside for half hour to get sited. Initially we were taking to the room downstairs and were surprised as several tables were unoccupied. The question is: why they didn't invite us to sit sooner but left us waiting outside on the cold?
The basement hall had no internet connection and less nice than the main one, so we asked to be moved as some people left. That was ok. We were permitted to stay on the main room.
We ordered for 4 people. First arrived one dish for one of us, 30 minutes later arrived another one and 30 minutes after that arrived other two. They were simple dishes. Why should we have waited for an hour??? We probably were forgotten.
The 'pork meat Gutsul stile' was nice as well as 'oven baked vegetables with cheese' but the 'oven baked chicken potatoes under chees' was rubbish.
Overal experience: tried it once. It was okeish but wouldn't come back.
Service and food were very average as well as the price.

Wonderful lunch
Waitress didnt new english but she took good care of me.
English menu

Great place for traditional Ukrainian food!!! I come from NYC and love to eat! This is my go to spot for everything Ukrainian. I had their mixed mushrooms, mushroom soup and dumplings. Delicious!!!  Will definitely come back.

Good morning üåÑ !
Lovely restaurant in a great location,  Rynok square, famous place downtown in Lviv
The Interior is well decorated, you feel like you are in the woods as  wood ü™µ is dominated inside
The staff there is friendly, kind & above all the welcoming smile is present with force.

Nice local food. The vegetarian Borsh was amazing, especially after the outside  cold. Dumplings are good too. The staff are nice and trying to be helpful. Prices are good here too.
Food is delicious and very authentic. A great dining experience for those wanting a real taste of Ukraine

It's tasty, cozy, and ‚Äî what's especially nice ‚Äî you can choose exactly where you want to sit. There are more secluded areas, and there are tables closer to people. You can come with a large company ‚Äî the space allows it.

My culinary wishes were taken into account without any problems: they prepared without salt, everything was served quickly and attentively. A nice place for a leisurely meal or a work meeting.

The only point: the toilet stall lacks a hook for a bag or backpack. A small detail, but quite important, as it turned out)

And in general ‚Äî a big thank you to the team. A very pleasant experience.‚ù§Ô∏è

Finally, today we came here for lunch. Very cool interior, friendly staff, convenient menu and payment by QR code and really very tasty dishes at affordable prices! Everything was very tasty, and the dumplings with gravy, and the dumplings are extremely tender, and the khachapuri, and the shish kebab from the neck is also very tasty, but unfortunately there were a lot of veins.... Well, the restaurant is a little cool ((((
A pleasant establishment with Ukrainian cuisine. Came for lunch, there were no people. The food was brought quickly. The menu is very large, so there is something to choose from.
Ukrainian McDonald they say. But food quality is 17738487473 times better!

We came for breakfast at 9am when they opened. Had an amazing breakfast. Balanced and filling. Many options. Highly recommend.

Home style cooked food all day long, the best place to have lunch. They have wifi, you can work from here. Also offering soups, cakes, dessert, coffee and salad. A true stylish Ukrainian establishment.

Not transparent way of pricing (it seems the workers offer you the less amount of everything, while it is counted the same by cashiers). The music is too loud in the place, while the prices are quite high. Also the shelves are empty after 16 PM

Really good food, and pretty cheap. It‚Äôs like a buffet/cafeteria type of restaurant. You‚Äôll see a lot of students eating here because of this. It‚Äôs usually always pretty busy inside. Food is upstairs, and dessert and alcohol is downstairs. All around a good place, I go there every few days and the quality is always decent. I recommend.

I don‚Äôt speak the language so had to order with Google Lense and pointing. Tried for pirogies with sweet cheese but served regular potato style. Tasted 100% like Cheemo Brand frozen in Canada. Served with a lot of water so the cream got diluted.  Not home made like photos. I cook much better from commercial frozen back home. Interesting decor though.

Food was O.K., clearly homemade, not frozen, but nothing out of this world. When we ordered meal they ran out of different things (oranges to make a fresh juice). Table service was a little bit lacking.
Good place for a quick bite.

Just a bit outside of the touristic area. So i'd recommend it as a cheap and local restaurant. We tried borch soup and varenyky. They were okay. You can't find English option on the menu so get your phones ready for the translation mode :) they dont speak English as well. I like local places so it wasnt a problem for me.
Excellent food, amazing decor, lovely staff. Highly recommend if you want to taste amazing local food

No english menuü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
vareniky potato + shrooms 2 die 4!
While the guy at the cashier was far from talkative or able 2 speak üá¨üáß, female chef showed up asking me in some way if food was good and where I was from.
That rescued the worn-out service-thing generally found in Ukraine .. good job chef!

Absolutely amazing place. The atmosphere and authentic design adds specific charm to the time spent in this restraunt. The menu is reach enough so every taste will be satisfied. It seams that this place is included in top 10 of best authentic places with Ukrainian theme. Also there is a small watermill inside, really cool. Small jokes on the walls and inside the menu is also something worth highlighting. Strongly advised for a visit.

This was a truly awful experience. I tried to communicate that I was a vegetarian, and they served me a bunch of fish in a crepe. How truly horrible. Then, the menu at the table would not work, so when I went to pay FOR FOOD I COULD NOT EVEN EAT. I was charged 290 UAH.
