Very friendly service and delicious food. They have a great wine selection with reasonable prices. Everything is cooked to order so some things like steak or veal might take longer so don't be in a hurry. Plan to hang out for awhile. If you want a fun show order a Sambuca!

This is a perfect place for tourists.  Really lovely traditional decor, amazing Ukrainian cuisine and live music.  Private little seating areas which are great for groups of 5-6.  Amazing staff - English / photo menus.
Good Ukrainian cuisine, friendly service and Ukrainian music live played at the tables. We visited the restaurant 2021 before the war. I hope it could continue as it was.
Interesting interior, delicious food,  friendly staff. Highly recommended for simple and local food lovers.

The deruny in "Derun" is not tasty at all, I would even say one of the worst in Lviv. I have been there three times, at different times of the year, I ordered different deruny each time and each time it is not tasty. There are a lot of rooms inside and there are no people at all, even a girl stands at the entrance to the establishment handing out leaflets so that people come in - don't get lostü•¥ I have stopped visiting this establishment for myself. I do not advise anyone.

It's very difficult to call it a derun...
Incredibly strange, not baked consistency in the form of a derun. We took derun with mushrooms, there were mushrooms like a cat crying. But there is so much onion, salt and pepper that the onion continued to bake even when it was already cooked in the derun. In short, it's a disappointment. If not in short, then a complete disappointment. The impression that I ate grated raw potatoes with onions...

The heaviness in the stomach after the miracle of derun accompanies me for hours. And unfortunately, I'm not the only one. It's really worth the owners to taste this variation of derun before allowing the cook into the kitchen...

From the restaurant "Deruna" you expect to eat deruny seeds, what they serve can hardly be called deruny, it looks more like pancakes. And it does not match the image on the menu (I attach a photo). Also, instead of white wine, they brought red wine without any remorse or apology, the waitress ignored my remark.

The place is very cozy, I really liked the food (we had dumplings with sour cream, with mushroom gravy, "Galician-style" dumplings with meat, mushroom soup, bograch, baked chop with cheese crust - EVERYTHING was incredibly delicious).
The environment was nice, in general it was an okay lunch. I would recommend to go during spring or summer to enjoy more the outdoor seating.
Beautiful setting. Everything was tasty but the meat dishes we tried I felt were tough and overcooked. Rather dismal alcohol selection.
Never crowded, cosy but spacious, in a very quiet place with a nice pond just outside. Food is fine, though not exciting.

Very nice place with traditional Ukrainian food.
Food is tasty and place is beautiful... there is a lake.
Everything was tasty except the chicken BBQ , it has no taste at all.

Looks like the entrance of a museum and is this slightly hard to discover.
It is a comfy restaurant in a basement with masonry vaults and rustic decoration.
The food is tasty and made according to old recipes. Not everything may be in season and available. We enjoyed lamb in pomegranate sauce, fish in horseradish.

Dont recomend this place for whenever its a hot sunny day outside, since it gets a bit stuffy inside, but the food is preety awesome for the most part ! Takes a long time to get served however, and waiters were not exactly the friendliest bunch ! The ambience inside is great too if a bit too dark

Most delicious local Galician food!
Though not very easy to find (just go to the exhibition and take the stairs down), it's absolutely worth a visit! They have a wonderful menu of local specialities of Galychyna (Lviv) region in excellent preparation.
The prices will pleasantly surprised you, so will the menu card incl. the "dictionary".
Don't miss out to try great local food! Their borsch is the perfection itself /

It's located at the back of a monastery and you go through a shop to be able to enter to the restaurant. There is a slight smell of humidity inside. The atmosphere is nice though: renaissance era music with the matching interior design...

The staff speak English enough to take orders. But the menu here is -with all due respect- terrible! It's not categorized well and doesn't explain the dishes clearly. Eventually, you find yourself asking things about the menu.

I went this restaurant because of a recommendation of a friend. I've been told how good the food was, so my expectations were high. However, it didn't match it. The food was barely average and service was slow.

I believe there are much better restaurants around the same prices in Lviv. If I were you I would have chosen one of those.
Perfect ‚Äúbanosh‚Äù, good beer and sweet price! If you don‚Äôt have mood and time to get up early and have a breakfast come here directly at the opening at 11:00 and have your dinner ;)

I had a salad and pizza, both were excellent. Service was fast and polite. I had some wine which was also good. All things considered it would be hard to ask for more.

(Visit Mindchampions org for online chess science, and English classes -ESL Science and reading on Facebook and YouTube)

Walked in for a breakfast on a Sun morning and was impressed beyond believe! A lovely platter with salmon, eggs, crostinis, butter, soft feta, olives, and a verity of vegetables. If you are in Lviv, put this place on your list to dine- the atmosphere is the loveliest. And I as a coffee lover- their Americano is one of the best I have tried in the last  seven day. Bravo Dolce Vita!

My wife‚Äôs sea bass was good but my lasagna was terrible. I visit Italy often but the version of lasagna was worse than any other I‚Äôve had. So i guess the lesson here is you have to be careful.
The seating was crowded and the Pinot Grigio was sour. The service was somewhere between poor and average. The server never showed up after delivering the food to check on us. I think expectations must be low for the high rating most give.

Service was very slow and poor.

Nice decor but seating was very cramped.

The wine tasted cheap and had a sharp stinging acidic feel, diminishing the taste of the meal instead of enriching it.

The pizza was slightly underdone, the tomato sauce used was fantastic but not enough cheese was used.

Tasted good not great. Wouldn‚Äôt go again.
Very surprised at Dolce Vita having such a high rating.

Had better pizza & pasta somewhere else. Steak not available on my visit on Sunday night. Delicious fresh apple juice üëåüèº. Smoking üö¨ smells inside coming from the seating outdoor i guess, tight seating areas.

Nice Italian restaurant in the top of Lviv Forum. They have nice pizzas. I tasted Pizza with Tuna and I like it. I recommend this. There was no tomato soup in the menu. It should be in Italina restaurant. I suggest to add it. Prices are a bit higher than usual. They have nice terrace.

Not recommend as far as there is the same chef
1) slow cooking
2) tasteless food
3) overcooked pizza
4) low quality of ingredients
5) high price

By the way, waiter was nice and pleasant. The atmosphere is also fine.

I have visited a lot of restaurants in Lviv, Europe and Asia and I can say this is the case where prices don't correspond with quality. 4 cheese pizza was 3/5, I wouldn't say I want to go back there for it again.

The avocado salad was horrible, the price was 200 uah and I got just a plate of seasonal veggies with no taste at all. They were super watery and tasteless. I mean when you charge 200 uah you can at least make sure veggies are organic and homegrown.
Staff were nice and professional, food was delicious, atmosphere was nice.. we tried both pasta and pizza. I only wish the pasta portion was better..

Great Italian food with big wine selection. The Lasagna was great. Never had white sauce with mushrooms Lasagna before. Tasty
Dessert was really good as well. Very well put together by the Chef. Plate decoration was great and unexpected. Maybe higher than others but worth every UAH. Atmosphere outside on the rooftop made our evening. Will go again!

Had a fantastic breakfast meal here. I got the "breakfast with beef and hummus" (that was the rough translation) and it was fantastic. The portion size was perfect for me and everything tasted great. The atmosphere and decor were nice as well.

Sorry about how pink the photo is, I was under a decorative light.

(From Texas)
I really enjoyed the breakfast. It was really fresh and tasted great. The waitress was really nice and spoke English which helped me A LOT.

The inside of the restaurant is beautiful and very very clean. Service was very quick and professional.

Highly recommend!

We accidentally found this place walking by it last night. Decided to get a couple slices of pizza for a snack, later.  The pizza was so good we came back today for lunch. Recommended semi sweet red wine with pasta.  Everything was so delicious.  This was our first true meal in Lviv.  We definitely will come back before we leave.

We get quick as hell service but it was due to closing time, I suppose.
Red Borsch superb, but not warm. The same with spinach cream aka soup from Shrek üòé
Pizza on very flappy cake, not very tasty
Very small Cezar salad with shrimps (many).
Typical tourist place. Not really worth the money, even if looking good from outside...
Delicious food served by the most friendliest personnel

A great find down a quiet side street, with a lovely mix of modern/industrial decor for a low key atmosphere and solid food options. It skews a bit upscale but that also means you can choose from a decent wine list and lots of cocktails.
I‚Äôve gone twice, once for lunch and once for breakfast and both times service was excellent. Prices are higher than average but I felt the quality is worth it.

The fluffy omelet with salmon was my favorite.

–ß—É–¥–æ–≤–æ!
Lovely lunch, good pizza even if it‚Äôs not Italian it did meet my expectations so quite happy and good service.

Front of the restaurant staff were on their phones too much not paying attention (use your phones on break out of sight). Worse was the pizza cook. I ordered a pepperoni with chicken (I also asked for mushrooms and they said they don't have fresh mushrooms just mushrooms that come prepared in their white sauce). The pizza cook refused to add chicken as s topping, flat out refused after being asked. Claiming it doesn't make the pizza look good. Never in my life has a chef/cook insist they will not take special orders from a paying customer. Honey on the pepperoni pizza had an off flavor, probably not needd. Super awkward when the chicken was brought out as a side dish along with the pizza. There's a first time for everything.
Not recommendable. Restaurant looked clean and orderly otherwise.

The cheese melt was the bomb. It‚Äôs made in their own special sourdough bread and the quality of the beef is always top notch. This is one of my go to meals at Teddy.
Can‚Äôt say enough about the chef and her staff. The same goes for all the servers that make the experience extra nice much higher level of service than any other restaurant in Lviv

I keep meaning to go check out the back patio but the front patio is so nice I never make it past those tables. The pizza was great, I also had the cheese easy I think it was called it was delicious the other pic is a breakfast dish that I can‚Äôt remember the name of but I loved it! Friendly staff and great service on a quiet but beautiful street. Bike lock rack out front and plenty of vegetarian options.

Wow, the reviews do not lie. Had to stop by to check out the hype and I was not let down. Honestly one of the greatest pizza‚Äôs I‚Äôve ever had, the dough is so airy and fresh! Would make the trip back to Lviv just for their pizzas

Wow. Little Italy on the streets of Lviv. Everything is made from the scratch. Love   Margarita and Bolognaise. Fresh and crafted home made food. I strongly recommend you to come in the evening and to enjoy the vibe of old town  and taste this delicious food.
When I came to Lviv I promised myself to try only Ukrainian cousine. Life wanted that during first night everything was closed but not Porco Marco
Delicious pizza, one of the best. You have to try their housemade lemonade, that's something ü§§
Super cute, probably smallest in the city. Very unusual pizza and many other Italian features. Must visit.
Very cozy and delicious. Excellent serviceüëç
A wonderful institution. Cheburek with apples is a real competitor to strudel.
Wonderful Restobar

A nice place to sit out and enjoy the lively street. Good service and cute art. But, I don‚Äôt see the point of the place. They service similar food to places around them just a little worse. It‚Äôs a similar price but just not a good by a significant margin. You can literally go across the street and find better places selling almost identical food.
The portions are too small in my opinion but the food was good

Great view into the square from the outdoor seating.  Good service with English menus available.  They were out of pasta the night I visited which was a disappointment. The calzone I had was very good.  I would go again.
Super cool restaurant I eat pizza was very delicious üçïüëç persnl are friendly and helpful the price are OK I recommend every travelers to visit this restaurant

The pizza was disappointing and the base tasted as if it was from the supermarket.
The staff were the least enthusiastic waiters I‚Äôve ever seen. The outdoor chairs were old sagging and we had to swap them with some newer chairs so we were high enough to eat at the table.

The mushroom soup was pure paradise: very thick and creamy; the pumpkin soup was edible, however a bit watery; the prices are reasonable; the service is adequate but only if you leave tips; in case you don‚Äôt tip the waitress, don‚Äôt expect any ‚Äògoodbyes, have a nice day!‚Äô When leaving:)
Friendly staff, great location, good tasting but overpriced food. Overall, mediocre place and I can‚Äôt see it surviving tough Lviv competition in the long run.
Very tasty place with home made ravioli üëåüèª
Good and taste meals but something overpriced.
Great interior , good wine

I won't lie if I say that this is definitely one of the best pizzas I've ever tasted!

The establishment itself is unremarkable, you would not immediately guess that behind these steel doors on the corner of the building, such excellent pizza is being prepared. The atmosphere inside is peculiar, probably not everyone will like it, but I liked it - it is pleasant in its own way, but there is room for growth in this regard :)

Pizza is just great!
The price, of course, is appropriate, not cheap, but, in my opinion, what you get for it fully corresponds to it. While walking home with my pizza, I fell in love with the aroma wafting from the box. The combination of ingredients is perfect, the dough is wonderful, in a word: beautiful.

If you are reading this review and thinking whether it is worth coming here, it is definitely worth it!
At least to support small business.

Thanks to the owner for my lunch today - he made this sunny spring day even better =)

Good luck and prosperity, and goodbye, because this is definitely not my last visit
An unexpected find, friendly staff and the feeling of being in a trattoria somewhere in Italy.  Very tasty Margherita pizza, I recommend it

The pizza is very tasty, the service is friendly, the prices are great, I will definitely come here more than once to order a pizza at home) There is no sign, but you can find it immediately on the Google map, it was not difficult for me to find it) I wish you prosperity!)

Private business as it should be.
Will accommodate your scoreboard of pizzas from cheap consumer goods for stupid money to healthy craft items at a reasonable price.

I very rarely leave reviews, but I can't pass by here) The pizza is very tasty, I don't even know if I've ever eaten better, there are no analogues yet!) Cheesecake also deserves special praise. Dear people, I will come to you again! I am very glad that I found such an institution! Prosperity to you and many customers!!!
A very charming place for a cocktail. We were served by Christina who did her best advising us on the choice of drinks. Haven't tried the food, but the cocktails and service was excellent.

While the interior of the restaurant is undeniably stunning and clearly a lot of effort has gone into the design and presentation, unfortunately, the same care hasn‚Äôt been extended to the food itself.

As someone who loves Italian cuisine and has high expectations, this experience sadly did not do it any justice. The focus feels far more on aesthetics than substance. The dishes looked beautiful, but the flavours were underwhelming and the portions were shockingly small ‚Äì especially considering the price point. I'm from the UK and even by our standards, the pricing felt excessive for what was served.

The main courses were closer in size to starters, and we actually ended up going to another restaurant straight after as we were still hungry. Disappointing overall. If you're after a visually appealing spot for a drink or a quick bite, this might work ‚Äì but for authentic, satisfying Italian food, I‚Äôd suggest looking elsewhere.

Such a wonderful place. You rest your soul hereüëåüèª The service is excellent, especially thankful for sommelier Dmytro! He not only told us about the place but also shared with us our first experience. Food is delicious and wine is 100 out of 10. Great time and experience.
Recommending it to all)
Had a pleasant dinner with very authentic and tasty food. Personal was friendly and ready to answer all the questions I had
All great! Many thanks to Roksolana and your professional approach)
I liked! There was tasty steaks and interesting serving. Steaks were on the boiling stone.
Great staff. Good food. Recommend! We got business launch here every day.
Despite the long waiting quite cute and good place. Beautiful Italian cuisine
Delicious food, good prices. Friendly staff. I recommend this place.
They have amazing pizza! And the staff always remembers you!

Delightful restaurant!  We stayed at the hotel for 3 days and each time the chef never ceased to admire his skill.  Cherry strudel and roe deer are especially memorable.  The staff is attentive, professional.  This restaurant is our favorite in Lviv!  Recommend!

A lovely place to have dinner at! I enjoyed the food very much. The personnel are very professional. The view is stunning!
Costly but I think it's worth it.
Will come back for sure.

Small but cozy terrace with a beautiful view of Lviv.  Very large breakfasts.  The portions are huge and consist of at least 4 courses.  This is essentially the breakfast of the champion.  The price is 200 UAH (7.5 euros).  I recommend this restaurant.
Risotto was terrible. Too salty and it wasn't prepared in the right way. I wiil not come here again. Only the view was nice. Prices are above the average.
Here I drank the most tasteless Americano from all over Lviv.  Also the cheesecakes were tasteless.  Otherwise, great views and good service.

Excellent place, just opened. Beautiful atmosphere, very tasty food. We had to wait a bit longer than expected but I'm sure this will be improved soon! We'll definitely visit again. I also advise to indicate better how to get there, there's no indication in the main entrance at ground floor so it's not evident to find the right entrance.
I love it)

Visited the Misto restaurant ‚Äî was satisfied. The atmosphere is pleasant and cozy, I especially liked the summer terrace ‚Äî an ideal place to sit with friends in the warm season. Service at a good level: the waiters are polite, attentive, work quickly.

The food is delicious, I especially recommend the steak and pizza. The prices are average, for this level of service ‚Äî absolutely justified.

The only minus ‚Äî a limited selection of beer, I would like more options. Also keep in mind that parking is paid.

Overall ‚Äî I recommend this establishment.

Very nice establishment.
Lots of space, nice interior, convenient location (there was a lack of such in this area) and delicious food.
The staff is also very nice. The waitress Alina is just ü§åüèº, she was very friendly and attentive to us.
Definitely recommend!

Visiting the restaurant "MISTO" left incredibly pleasant impressions! Cozy atmosphere, stylish interior and friendly staff create a feeling of real comfort from the first minutes. Dishes are impressive in taste and presentation - every element is thought out to the smallest detail. I especially liked the author's items in the menu and the large wine list. Service is at a high level: attentive, fast and professional. An ideal place both for a romantic dinner and for meetings with friends. Will definitely come back again!

Beautiful place with nice decor and smart design. Love the hall with private niches - very relaxing! Great service - just enough attention (not too much, not too little)! The food is delicious and on time! Each visit is so much worth it!!

We ordered steak Medium Rare - it was definitely Medium well. Salmon very far, really too far. Salad Olivie with salmon - nothing special at all..

Mussels with pumpkin is quite controversial dish. Not recommended.

Dessert are good, but not classic. Which is better to warn your clients about... For example, tiramisu you should gather from ingredients.

Service is charged separately - 10% of main bill. Still we were not told about it in advance, and got cheque for almost 1000 UAH quite unexpectedly.

This is considered one of the rather fancy places in Kyiv, but I don‚Äôt think it meets the expectations to the fullest.

Not too many staff representatives speak English.

As for the food - it is good, but really not special. I was impressed with the presentation of Farshmak (sort of herring pate - see video), and it was delicious.
But the tuna steak had to be retuned as it was not even close to medium rare - it was well done. Besides this tuna steak was tiny.

They have only 2 bears on tap, and those are not the best ones out there.

Atmosphere and the service in general were rather good.

Note that they include service in the bill.

Great restaurant which worth trying out for sure. Their menu is a bit unusual. I highly recommend Forshmak which they prepare in front of you. Beef Carpaccio with a story of 16th century. Anyways, go ahead and try it.
Great food, great service, reasonable prices ... what more can you wish for.  The cold borsch with strawberries was amazing!! And they serve delicious homemade teas!!

This establishment is on track for a long lasting future. From the moment you walk in, you feel like you just travelled into another world. The service staff were extremely professional and made you feel like a real guest. Compliments to our server and especially the bartender for making me a pisco sour which was an off menu drink. It was awesome and tasted better than my own at home. The menu has a wide variety of options to choose from and does a great job of showcasing the level of skill the culinary team possesses. The Chef here is clearly skilled. The food was not only delicious but comforting. Thank you for an amazing experience.

Excellent beachfront restaurant with amazing dishes to choose from. I had a delicious pineapple sour with Zacapa rum & clear ice/hand cut cube, tiger prawns and Black mussels in a white wine, cream sauce. So fresh and flavorful! I highly recommend!

What a gem ,,,, yes its not cheap if you want cheap go to McDonalds , service is phenomenal, everything is so so tasty , you can tell that the products they use is A+, cheif also seems to know his taste buds , you got to try the Tom Yam soup best ive had possibly yet in my life ,, but everything thing else is also so so so good . Highly recommended, will be definitely visiting this place once in Odessa !!!
Very beautiful place. I did have a few dishes and I have to say it is all very tasty

We wanted to visit the beach and eat some fish. Check on google we find this place and right away headed there.
It‚Äôs seems to be the only upper level fish place in  all  the Beach area.
We had some Tatar‚Äôs, soup and fish.
It was good service and food was quite good.
With 3.500 for 3 people it wasn‚Äôt cheap but fair for quality and service.
We definitely recommend that place.

This restaurant is beautifully situated in what seems to be an old sanitarium. With the option to sit and eat outside in a beautiful garden setting or inside a house that is a blast from the past (1800's-ish). We sat in a room that could have been a bath house with a fully functioning tub. The look was incredible. The service staff was kind and professional. They did not shy away from sharing their recommendations. This made everything so easy and comfortable. The food was delicious and expertly prepared. This is a great place for celebrations or just spending time with that special person in your life.

This was sooooo good ü§© the food is delicious, even the herbs in early May taste like it was July.
I‚Äôm genuinely impressed and in love with the place and cuisine.

The legendary center of Odesa cuisine. The feeling of a real dacha in the atmosphere and in the dishes. A large territory, a bunch of cozy individual tables scattered around it. Truly delicious home-cooked Odesa cuisine for adequate money. I recommend it to both tourists and locals.

Great food, amazing mushroom soup (seasonal, though) and a great environment.  All of that at a fairly reasonable price, too, makes this an easy recommendation.  Order some of the more traditional dishes, not just the kebab!

Only minor issue was with wasps.  They should really use wasp traps rather than just trying to distract them with more food a little further away.

Truly inspired decor, great service, perfectly cooked dishes to the highest standard. I went here with a friend and then also ordered delivery - both were perfect experiences. I had ordered the head chef's cookbook all the way from USA (Seattle) as he is the only one I could find who wrote down some of the traditional Odessa dishes - not Ukrainian, not Russian, not Jewish - special to Odessa. The restaurant itself perfectly captures all the beautiful parts of soviet children's summers at the "dacha": summer home with garden. Freshest ingredients, cooked with love and perfect balance of seasoning (often lacking around Ukraine). Amidst choices of poor impressions of Thai, Japanese, Italian and French cuisine abounding in Odessa, do not miss this gem of a restaurant cooking the food that Odessa and Ukraine does best!

Beautiful sea-view location with tasty food but slow, cold service. We visited Yug in Odessa today. The location is lovely with a fresh sea breeze, and there was live music (a bit too loud for my taste). The food was extremely delicious ‚Äì every dish we tried was tasty, and the kitchen is worth visiting for the flavors alone. However, the service felt cold and was very slow. We waited 25 minutes for appetizers, and then everything arrived at once with the main dishes. Our baked vegetables never came after 45 minutes, and we had to cancel them. Also, the wine prices were surprisingly high, though food prices are average. Overall, I recommend coming here if you want to enjoy the kitchen and sea view, but be ready to wait.

Went for lunch with my wife. Restaurant is right on the beach, so a great view. Food was really tasty and good value, except we ordered grilled vegetables which after 45 minutes never arrived so we cancelled them and the starters and main course were all brought out at the same time. Also the wines are extremely over priced.

Strikingly beautiful restaurant. The patio is gorgeous and right on the calm waters of the sea. The actual restaurant is gorgeously designed and decorated. The food is also exceptional and delivered by a terrific staff. I look forward to visiting this place in the future.

Lovely place, interesting vibe and amazing sea views!
We've tried salmon and beef tartars - so good!
Apple tart wasn't tasty, but their smetannik was fantastic!
Hookah was great.
Knowledge and friendly staff.
Would visit again!

Our waitress was very nice but when we asked a wine she forwarded another lady to help us for choosing the right wine. We have already chosen a wine from California (a rose one) when she arrived our table she said there is no option from California even though it‚Äôs already on the list and she did not say any apology words for that. Also she suggested another wine for us and added ‚Äúit‚Äôs not expensive‚Äù! How dare you said to us it‚Äôs not expensive!!! It‚Äôs not your job, lady!!! And the worst thing when she was saying that she has a bad & weird attitude and approach. We changed our mind and ordered a cocktail for us. It‚Äôs obvious she is not happy to work there or she has fought with her Mom or her boyfriend! It‚Äôs not good to have such an employee for such a high quality restaurant!
For information the owner or HR department of this great restaurant!
It is such a great view
The location is good, the food is good, the bar is not much assortment. Advised.
Behind the magnificent interior lies a long wait and stale food.
Very tasty beer is brewed))) 5+
Was one of the best restaurants in the city a couple of years ago

Still my favorite place serving the best coffee and breakfast in Arcadia! My 2 year old and I eat here often.
Everything on breakfast menu is amazing my favorite being the taco omelet and an amazing Bloody Mary, also the best I. Odesa!

Today I tried the avocado toast and it was super fresh and delicious!!  You can‚Äôt miss for breakfast here, or lunch or dinner!!

Staff is amazing, speak English and very knowledgeable and attentive. It‚Äôs always a pleasure to sit here for a coffee and/or delicious food!!

My favorite place for coffee and food in Arcadia. The pumpkin soup on deck is fire!! The best breakfast!!
The Mexican omelet is hands down the best breakfast meal in Odesa!! Complete that with a Bloody Mary and yes they will add bacon if you ask!!! Love this place, service is great. They speak English! Do yourself a favor and make a stop here. Everything is delicious!!

The food is OK, a bit overpriced but this is acceptable for this location.
Stuff could be friend, but could also be absolutely unpleasant - it depends.
Tables are often reserved but they are empty - it feels like the stuff is waiting for you to pay them to make the table available.
Interior and overall atmosphere is modern and nice, but nothing special.
It is a popular place for Tinder dates.
This cafe is  definitely not suited for kids.

A very classy restaurant with a noble retro interior, lovingly designed down to the smallest detail. The staff is very professional and friendly and has good English skills. One of the best burgers I ever had: the ¬´The Roastery¬ª signature burger with extra cheese. Absolutely stunning! Thank you!!

Great place for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Lemonade is fantastic, all the food have great presentation. But sometimes is just too much, its not too user friendly. Still a best place to visit before or after swimming at Arcadia beach.

A Restaurant with very nice interior...very relaxing atmpsphere, nice backround Music which was not too loud as in many other Places.
My Burger was a little dry and I missed a sauce or more sauce on the Burger. The Fries could have been more crispy. I am not sure if I would return for Food. I would come back for a Beer or Cocktail,  I guess. The Wine List looked tempting as well.
I have no complaints. Great place for a private dinner, business meeting or gastronomic experience.

Beautiful rooftop restaurant.  What a shame there service is so poor.  The food options are large but the taste is just ok. It seems that everything is covered in a ‚Äúsweet‚Äù sauce including the cocktails. I would come back for the view and a hookah but not to eat. The prices are good the food is not so good again it‚Äôs just ok.

Nice view from the rooftop.
The food is not so good.
Nothing special, usual Ukrainian cousin.
Don`t expect too much.
Toilet is  amazing. U will do your private things observing pink clouds on the floor)))

Quite an enjoyable if somewhat unusual dining experience. Think first time have had a fusion of Asian, Ukrainian, European and Italian meals in the same menu. Nice internal surroundings overlooking all aspects of the City skyline. Service a little slow at times but as it was busy, only to be expected but seems plenty of service staff. Prices about average, maybe a little on the high side but not exceptionally so. Stand over the 9th floor glass flooring over the Atrium for an "experience".

Three floors for beautiful photos.  Mega-beautiful views of Odessa.  It is easy to book a table both on the terrace and inside.  A huge selection of dishes, Italian, Ukrainian and Chinese cuisine.  Wide selection of alcohol.  Prices for such a place are democratic, as in the usual place with burgers and so on.  I really liked it

Nice place for breakfast, good and fresh assortment, and menu flexibility, but we faced not pleasant staff who reacted to our claim quite arrogantly. Last our visit (on Fri evening), the waiter showed the box where we can get paper and pencils for drawing by ourselves; this time we came again and took pencils again by ourselves, but got an aggressive reaction from the staff without any explanations.
The administration managed the case effectively, but the morning vibe was spoiled.

Great place to visit.
Delicious meals, we tried shakshuka(Israeli traditional dish) and salmon Benedict (Canadian version of it) - very satisfying!
Cacao was a bit too sweet, but it's just my preference. Amazing coconut latte. Profiteroles were the best ending to our visit.
Definitely would recommend.

-
We are back!
Tried few different meals and were happy that we chose this place!

Very good place! I came back almost every day for a week to try all their different breakfast. Everything is so good. Cosy atmosphere; nice and attentive staff; good food and the latte was something! Definitely recommend this place.

A fantastic place for breakfast (and more). The food is very tasty, well-served and the portions are relatively big. Very good value fo money. The sofas and chairs are comfortable, the desing is niceand cosy - you want to stay there a little bit more. Service is excellent

Very pleasant place for breakfast. You can choose typical breakfast from different countries - USA, Germany Azerbaijan and lot more. There is very nice and helpful service and reasonable prices. Good coffee and tee.

If you want to experience true local cuisine, then this is the place to be. Entering inside you instantly feel like you have traveled back in time to a seemingly quieter way of life. The service staff was kind and very helpful when explaining the dishes. As the food was placed on our table it was obvious that the culinary team took pride in every plate. The smells, textures, seasonings, and presentation were all a powerful statement of who these people are. They are a proud people with food and hospitality that are unmatched. Very happy I got to experience it.
If you‚Äôre looking for traditional food, this is your place. The dishes we had were outstanding, so delicious and fresh.

I'm from Polandüáµüá±, it was the first time I ate such delicious borscht, suffice it to say that I didn't like borscht but this one was wonderful plus warm bread with garlic, amazing.

Dumplings, I don't eat them at home either, they were great here. And that fresh, homemade kvass üòã

Kumanets restaurant rocks! A true taste of Ukraine. Huge, scrumptious portions - you won't leave hungry! The interior is like a cozy Ukrainian village. Highly recommend for a delicious and authentic experience! üá∫üá¶üç≤

An excellent and authentic Ukrainian restaurant. The serving staff wear Ukrainian folk costumes, and serve delicious, freshly-cooked national specialities and Ukrainian wine. The prices are very fair for the good quality of the dishes, I paid 580 UAH for 2 (non-meat) courses and a glass of reserve red wine.

Great concept to pay by weight with good selection of hot/cold dishes, soups, desserts, beer/wine/juices, and unique decor. One of many locations spotted around the city to enjoy the self-serve experience for dine-in or for a small fee with takeaway containers. 30% off before closing was an interesting surprise.

Places in the very centre at the first floor with an view on the beautiful City Garden. The interior is welcoming and interesting and have and projector showing old short-movies! The diversity of food is huge and they have a lot of vegan-friendly alternatives. They serve up to 5 different soups every day. Very affordable pricesüòÅ

A lovely spot in the heart of the town with a very tasty food at reasonable prices.During my last visit to Odessa I had my meal thrice there and I must admit that for what they charge the quality of food is great, except may be some of their patties that could have been more fresh. The raspberry tea along with a slice of their Zachertort are worthy of trying.The cashier girl was really nice and helpfulI.The place have been nicely decorated for an upcoming Christmas season .The interior is another thing that would make me come again and again.
Highly recommend.

This a great place for breakfast, lunch and dinner in the center of the city (Odessa).

Prices are very competitive and affordable.
Big selection of food for any taste. Plenty seating to accommodate many people.
Also, it has nice views on Deribasovskuyu street from the window.

I would definitely recommend it to visit!

Good place to have a fast and a really the cheapest meal in whole city)
And it‚Äôs very atmospheric and comfortable.
Really recommend!

Nice park view. Food is good, but I've had much better in Odessa. Skip the meze platter. Tasty soups & caviar, though! 3 stars for food, an extra star for the park view. My favourite thing about this place was the vibe dining al fresco when musicians started playing in the park. Lovely experience of Odessa in summer.
We had a wonderful experience here. The meze set was nice and pork chops were excellent. My only recommendation for the is to stop serving the quinoa salad hot, the flavors just don't blend well.

Fantastic place - delicious authentic food excellently served in well-designed interiors (and a nice spacious outside patio area). Daily catch makes a nice add-on to already well balanced breakfast menu. Strongly recommended all day (or year) around.

We really enjoyed this restaurant: first of all it's very romantic (even with our 18 month old joining us), and the food was beyond tasty. The salads were amazing, the mussels and steak super tasty, and the Napoleon is a unique take on a dessert classic that is worth coming here on its own. We'll definitely return again if we come back to Odessa.
Best restaurant ever! I am a regular guest from Switzerland. Very good kitchen, nice service - but also the historically furnished rooms are unique. I can highly recommend Klarabara !! Alexander
Friendly attentative service. Delicious food. Very cool castle-like atmosphere with deep house music and antique art on the walls. Had the whole place to myself. My new favorite restaurant in Odessa.
Been here the first time, not bad at all. Food was good, the interior is beautiful, but maybe we came at the wrong time, it was completely empty. Maybe its more alive in the evening.
Most of the items I've tried do not worth the printing space on the menu.  From expired beer to the beef I had, all tastes worst than a quick meal in the airplane (budget).
Very short menu, but all dishes which wehave ordered were very testy. Thanks
Perfect food and serving!

The food was plenty and tasted awesome. The starter platter with "tartinades" was really good, and had fish fillets as well as fish-based pates. You can get fried fish of various types, of 100g portions each: it was great as well. The waiter seemed a little uncaring of my order, and at the end of the meal outright asked for a tip. This aside, I recommend the place.

Very nice restaurant.  July 7, 2020 were here in the evening. Here they prepare food for residents of southern Ukraine and the Black Sea coast near Odessa.  Many seafood dishes on the Black Sea coast.  Prices are not high for such a restaurant which is located in the historical center of the capital.  The waiters are fast, service is attentive and correct.  Here they can treat you with a compliment from the establishment (usually alcoholic fruit tinctures, I recommend it)
Deliciously cooked clams-raps in a creamy sauce.  This dish is similar to Julien but without cheese.  I recommend this restaurant.
Food is simply, great for lunch. Coffee was not the best one. But fish was quite good. Overall great experience

I fall in love with the interior. Everything is done with attention to even small detail. Natural plants all around, which is fantastic.
As for administration and staff, there is room for improvement. The food is simply ‚Äùok‚Äù, nothing fantastic. Probably just not my place.

Visited the place in 2023, price are ok, food is fine as well. We took lunch with mushrooms, salad and pancakes with meat. If you like uzvar - go for it, it was really nice one. So nice place for even family dinner. 4 out of 5 üëç
What a cool place! Nice medieval themed restaurant but not outrageously over the top. The waitress was very nice and welcoming, and the food was grand.

Medieval restaurant very well made. The food is good and plenty. I recommend going there if you are passing by Odessa. There even are costumes that you can wear to make the place look even more awesome ;)

Lovely place. The meat was amazingly tasty, the waitress was a sunshine, always smiling and helpful. I do not speak the local language, so we used google. The decoration is very nicely done in a medieval manner. I recommend at 100%!

I brought my wife here for her birthday dinner. Everything was good. Lots of interesting options on the menu. She had a mushroom soup in a bread bowl and I had venison with a corn porridge. Great decor.

Must visit. Unique atmosphere, medieval dress up, great service and nice food. Owner himself at bar making the expierence even cozier. If you are tired of regular restaurants and bars, come taste something entirely different.
Had a wonderful and relaxing lunch here today while taking in the views of the Black Sea as we feasted in the treasures that cake from inside of it.  Prices and quantities were very good

I totally LOVEDA this place! It never closes and it is right by the beach. You can have dinner or drinks and go right to take a swim and come back just to find the waiter have a nice blanket ready for you to warm up and keep eating or drinking üòä. Will def come back!

Took almost 1 hour to get the food. The food itself was ok, a bit tasteless. But the bill was sick. And their menu is so confusing. Definitely one of the most expensive restaurants in Odessa. And with that said the food should at least be better than this. I live in on of the most expensive countries in the world. And for the same price there I could get a super fancy dinner. The limit was reached when they asked us if we wanted to pay the tipping in cash or card. At least they could give us a bread or something while waiting for the food - or say sorry for waiting. I tip if the service is great. Not if I'm forced.

We had a post wedding party for eighteen guests. The meal and service were at the highest level. We liked traditional dishes with modern twist to please our foreign and local guests. We were delighted to see that their expectations were met. Special thanks to Larisa, Katerina, Alexander and Alina for making our celebration special and memorable!
Great place to spend whole day on the beach

Good place for breakfast. I had omelette and dessert and food was delicious. Price are really nice, so much cheaper then in Arkadia alley))) Staff was polite, attentive and nice. But you don‚Äôt have any view because location is inside office building. People who went out from office for smoking will annoy you with smoke. So if you are not smoking it s a little bit annoying but you can choose then place inside restaurant.

Went to the restaurant for a coffee and ended up getting some food. I had the mushroom soup which was delicious, we also had an omelette and cheese balls. Would recommend this place for nice food. Location is a little bit weird inside the courtyard of the office block with the workers coming out and smoking beside the tables.
Nice view on the sea, interior is stylish, food is delicious and along with live grand piano music it feels great üíï

Nice location with sea view.
Food is good and multiple selection from salads, meat and sea food
Great food. Love their omelettes and croissants. English speaking staff. 5 star service literally.

One of my most favourite restaurants for the incredibly nice staff, beautiful outdoor patio and fantastic menu. They truly perfect the dishes as a mussel bar - every item I tried was deliciously flavourful. I especially enjoyed the deep fried mussels and eggplant soup with mussels, both of which I‚Äôve never had before. The portions were generous and filling which made it an excellent value. I also adored the staff, particularly one sweet, young girl who was so kind and attentive. The overall experience was so exceptional I went two days in a row. Had I stayed longer, I would have dined there everyday.

Nice place, friendly atmosphere, in the quiet part of the old centre of Odessa city. Mussels are just delicious. In the daytime finding a place to park may be a quest. In the evening the place may be packed.

WOW! It's one of the best seafood restaurants I've ever been to! The food was soooo delicious, there are no words to describe it, you need to go and try it in on your own! We ordered mussels with garlic sauce which was served with white bread and french fries (I advise you to dip that bread in the sauce so you can understand what is heaven on earth :D),  besides that we had a salad with clams which was AMAZING. And to make your evening unforgettable, I highly recommend you to order red sangria which tasted like it was delivered right from Spain! If you are up to go there on the weekends' evening, you'd better off booking a table in advance, we were lucky to catch a table at Saturday's night!
I visit in Odesa with my friend. I like this restaurant. Food, service and amazing atmosphere. Reccommanded.

Our rating *4,7

The ratio btw price and quality was great (good value for money) and the service was good.

One of the best drinks we‚Äôve ever had drink! Bartender is a wizard there. Wide variety of signature cocktails and drinks.

The food experience is 4.6. We‚Äôve had a pot of beer mussels, fish soup and deep fried fish (which for our taste was too salty).

Great place with tasty food not far from the Opera. I had a pizza with different kinds of meat and a lemonade. Next time i also want to have a dessert because they looked great. Prices are average and service is efficient and good. The atmosphere is really nice both outside and inside. Outside there is a lot of green plants.
Great place, tasty food, good service, worm atmosphere. Best Italian restaurant I've been last few years. Prices are reasonable. Enjoy!
Beautiful place, delicious food, but a bit slow service.

The service in the beginning was friendly and we really were looking forward to visit this restaurant with our family. Although during the visit it was definitely not smooth, our waiter was nice but not very experienced and , which we can totally understand. We had to collect and literally handle him empty plates and cups to organize a space for new dishes he had brought.
There was more to add.
Overall impression was broken and we felt embarrassed as we invited our family for a special evening there.
Sadly, quite disappointed with this experience.

This place is delicious and the waiters are nice, so I‚Äôm not sure what the grumpy reviews here are about. The waiters are on their phone as that is where they write the order down, also the place is popular and packed so yes the staff have to run around (and up the stairs!). We were there at rush hour on a Saturday night and had zero problems. In fact we found this place amazing. Dishes generously sprinkled with truffle and spot on. We were with several well travelled foreigners and they said it was one of the best pizzas they have ever had. One-star reviews here are just a sign of obnoxious, sheltered character

Food was delicious and very original but unfortunately service wishes better. Our server brought 25min later pita bread and I told that I don‚Äôt want it and he didn‚Äôt even said sorry anything I had to ask to discount from the check.
Nice place to stop on Derybasivska for a nice craft cocktail and some Middle Eastern / Greek Food.  Very good service,  also has terrace
my absolute favourite in Odesa. great atmosphere with live music the ambience stylish the staff very professional very good cuisine and outstanding cocktails

Among few stylish drink places to go in Odessa especially in winter time. They have two different concepts(dark vs bright) with entertaining DJ performances as well. Good for after dinner drinks with small group of friends. Service and door crew are all welcoming.
very fancy interior decoration, friendly staff and delicious food and cocktails to die for !

I wanted some washed while I was in Odessa. Did a great job on it. Prunes on the side sour cream on the side. Two potatoes. Also. The rest of the family had the food you'll see in the photos. The salmon sushi was outstanding. Every like the varinky. Our server was excellent.

The restaurant is one of my absolute favorites! It is average priced amongst the better restaurant in Odessa. I come back year after year and i can still recognize some of the staff and the chefs. Seems like the owner prioritizes teaching and keeping his employees. The roast beef is super tender and the sauce delicious. I have often enjoyed hummus with chicken liver and i find the berry-smoothie amazingly good.

Situated in the heart of the old city. The hotel is both beautiful and convenient with decor and design that speaks for itself. The food in the restaurant downstairs is incredible with some of the best sushi and oysters I have ever eaten, as well as being open 24/7. The cocktails are top quality and the staff are very friendly and helpful! This place will definitely be my hotel of choice every time I return to Odessa. Thank you!

Very nice atmosphere. Are outside under the nice lights. Excellent service. Waiters were constantly prepared to help. Excellent food as well. Each dish we had was outstanding. It was my birthday as well and they also even brought a cake and constantly gave well-wishes. Great place! Highly recommended!

Well. I was very impressed about this place. Service is great, location is fancy, food is simple and tasty. Prices are fair. I was existed about cheesecake, and believe me, I have some background to compare. You should check it out! Thank you, for this awesome cozy atmosphere and unbelievable dinner. Will definitely visit again.

It‚Äôs not your average coffee shop. It‚Äôs a unique place with a history and antiques inside. Every piece is carefully kept and placed for you to enjoy your coffee ritual by yourself or in the company. Our five year old daughter could not get enough of this place! As well as us. Coffee was great too, btw. Did not check the desserts. Good service.

Super cool cafe. Very delicious cakes.
Klass. But there is no WiFi.

The best Cafe I have ever visited. Atmosphere, cakes and coffee are very special and so great. 100% pure old Odesa interior design, a lot of nice small things from Odesa former times and nice quiet music make atmosphere so local and romantic. Cakes are the most delicious I have ever experienced. I would recommend to try "Kiev cake" - that is my favorite. You can buy the whole cake or order it in advance - it is very good idea in case you are going to visit your friends. My honest mark is 7 out of 5 :)))))
Good and atmospheric place, you will need some time to wait the order, but very tasty desserts

I love this place, it is very comfortable, drinks are cheap and music is not too loud so we can work easily + good wifi. Staff is also very nice, reactive and speaks ukrainian :)

So far, the best coffee shop I have been to in Odessa.

Great coffee shop, bumblebee coffee made from fresh orange juice and espresso was great and refreshing. Lady who took order was very sweet and nice. Very cosy atmosphere, highly recommend üå∏
Very pleasant cafe with great service and great food, as well it‚Äôs very comfortable and the music is very good)))

Great croissant and!
Super service!
The waitress is super nice and caring!
Five star all the way!

Everything is great, they cook quickly and deliciously
Beautiful breakfasts and coffee, I'll be back for dessert!

My evening at Hola Lola was a real pleasure.
The service was top notch. The staff was very attentive and friendly, always ready to answer any questions and help choose the perfect combination of dishes!
The atmosphere in the restaurant was really cozy. Every moment was full of aesthetic pleasure.
Overall, visiting Holla Lolla was an unforgettable experience!! I can't wait for my next visit to try your entire menu fasterüòç

Came here for the first time today and were impressed. There is no feeling of a large open space - very comfortable and thoughtful zoning. You have created a cozy island in the middle of a shopping center. Thank you very much for the impeccable service, delicious food, beautiful presentation. A nice bonus is branded chocolates for a cup of coffee. It's a pity that you open at 10 - I'd like to come for an early breakfast. HolaLola, you are my new gastronomic passion!

Having visited the restaurant, I was impressed by the quality of service and the taste of the dishes. The atmosphere was very cozy, the interior created a feeling of comfort and elegance. The staff was very attentive and friendly. The taste of the dishes exceeded my expectations - each dish was prepared deliciously.
I will look forward to visiting Hola lola again ‚ù§Ô∏è

Splendid place! Food and Coffee is amazing!!! They have Vegan and vegetarian options. Waiters are very kind people! Vegan desserts are yummy!

Great place! Food is really delicious,  waitress was very friendly and fast. Atmosphere inside giving some positive vibes. Even tho it is quite small Cafe, it wasn't overcrowded or noisy.
Keep it up! üòä

Definitely like this place!
It's great to come there for delicious breakfast or meal.  Also very good atmosphere for work & coffee visits.
Very nice and friendly cafe. All products are of high quality and I enjoyed my time there.
Place which makes you happy with their atmosphere and healthy delicious foodüí´
Excellent spot, fantastic view, would have loved some more vegetarian options, but the staff in the food was great

Giving it 5 stars for the beautiful views ‚ù§ The food was good, cocktails - great! But the menu is very worn, should definitely print new ones. The table on the terrace that we were given was shaky - the wooden floor is uneven, but nobody seems to care. We had to place a plastic bottle under one of the table legs to prevent it from moving around)))
UPD: One more visit in July 2018 turned out to be much more successful - adding some photos üòä

Great location and fabulous waitress ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

They have and outdoor sitting area, which is divided for non smoker and smoker. Unfortunately, if the smoker dining table is  near of the non smoker area, you could still breathing carcinogenic smoke from the cigarette.

The indoor sitting area looks great, but it's too warm and too many flies which is gross, because they could carry diseases to human.

Both indoor and outdoor have beautiful sea view, outstanding for a romantic dinner!!!

Salad temperature and taste was good. We ordered pasta in two different days: first time pasta was hot and delicious; second time pasta was cold when it should be hot and we developed stomach ill.
We ordered chicken and it was hot, tender and juicy!!!! Beer was refreshing and very cold, which is perfect.

Good food and great views over the Black Sea. There are Shisha smoking and non-smoking areas. We shared the Odessa fish platter between 2 people which was definitely enough for the both of us, albeit a little salty!
They were out of local beer and could only provide the fairly expensive Paulaner (120 UAH) which was unfortunate.

Overall very pleasant experience with yummy food.
Wonderful view, delicious food. Only Russian menu they have. There is a terrace which is located 20m above the sea and other 4m above. Everyfood i tried was very delicious.

I found this place by accident and was instantly impressed. The service is friendly and efficient (I speak english only which did not matter here) the staff make amazing cocktails, different from the ordinary and I compliment the food, great menu and value for money
The food is good and affordable and Alisa is the nicest waitress ever. What else? Too bad their coffee machine was out of order and they serve mo cocoa.

Super-friendly service and flawless kitchen within reasonable pricing.
The mussles with cream sauce are waaay too sexy here. Try it!
Nice place but poor service. Ordered an omlette for breakfast got it at lunch.
A place filled with great taste and soul. And very romantic

Good place! it was a rainy day so we went there because it was close to our appartment. Anyway food was good, original made and the environment was cozy, inside and outside. There was a simpatic black cat with us as well ;).

We ordered dishes we only saw in that place so because of that we enjoyed it. Service was very kind so is recommended to go and try by yourself!

One of the most ambient places in Odessa. Even if you are here for the first time you should definitely visit this place. Expecially if  you are here to try something special and not trivial. Located in a historical center. Authentic menu, unique interior and an option to sit both inside and outside distinguishes this place.
P.S. I've have never thought that I'd post a photo from a restroom but just look how cool is this one.
P.P.S.We had only 5 days in Odessa but we've collectively decide to visit Gogol Mogol twice. It means something üòâ
Coming for seafood - was not disappointed. Friendly staffs and tasty cuisine. They also offer english menu :)
Gogol mogol restaurant intererior was superb while chilled music in the air made atmosphere even better. Menu is wide and prices is very reasonable. In addition, the service was great and quick.

Absolutely mind-blowing deliciousness!
Odessa is a great place to eat. But out of the 3 excellent restaurants we've gone to in Odessa, Gogol Mogol takes the palm: fresh, clean authentic tastes, very hearty dishes that all seems straight out from the books of different Grand-mas who would have shared their own special secret recipes to create the epitomy of Eastern cuisine.
Even better: our waitress Tatiana was just... Perfect. Kind and extremely effective, good recommendation in English and very patient with our kind, the touristy "what's this what's that" kind.
Thank you again for this amazing experience!!!
We will come back to Odessa just to eat there.

A must-taste.

Very cozy place, weather you seat inside or outside. Wide variety of exclusive desserts. Breakfast was absolutely amazing, very flavorful and fresh! Definitely recommend to attend for a business meeting or a relaxing break. Not really suitable for families with kids. Parking is quite busy. Street is loud.

Amazingly good coffee and knowledgeable staff. It was a big surprise to find such a good coffee place and roasters. Beans are roasted to almost perfection. A great variety of choice. We tasted multiple kinds from Kenya, Ethiopia, Salvador, and Honduras, all very distinct and powerful. It is great to see the coffee taste notes, the names of the individual farms/farmers, altitude, and taste score on each bag of coffee you buy. We‚Äôll be definitely coming back and ordering coffee from here.

This place is great! There is a large selection of dishes and the food is really tasty. The coffee here is amazing, one if the best in the city.
If you are going to order the pancakes you should know they take up to 35 minutes to prepare.
Overall l, really nice service and again, excellent coffee ‚òï ‚òï
We had desserts and breakfast here. Orange cake was delicious! It was really tasty! Service is perfect, very friendly stuff! Thank you so much! Definitely will come back üíØüíû

Nice place! Very cool interior design. Good coffee and wide selection of it. Tasty pastries. Plus they have food - you can have breakfast and lunch.

Plenty of space to sit down with your laptop and get some work done!

Cool chairs! I found them comfortable. However, if you have a bigger ‚Äúbehind‚Äù you might find them a bit limiting. üôÇ
Amazing breakfast, really nice servise. Location and everything. The food was yum yum..!

Highly recommended! Great place with delicious food! Very attentive staff! Deliciouuuus food and drinks. Avo Toast on banana bread, taste different not to crunchy, but I like it. Cottage cheese cakes -  amazing. Will definetly be back for Oatmilk Cacao!üòã

Amazing food! Coffee here is an absolute masterpiece, which everyone should try. Without hesitation I can call this particular cafe one of the best coffee places in Odessa. Prices are pretty reasonable and service is excellent. Totally worth checking out.

Nice but quite specific atmosphere. Friendly but quite specific personnel. Tasty but quite specific deserts and drinks. And this is a review from normal but quite specific client). Anyhow you should stop reading it and  come to explore it by yourself))). Enjoy!
Love this place! Wonderful food and wonderful servers. Also they are so kind to animals and for me that's always 5 stars!
It‚Äôs cool cafe
Delicious! The straw is like from childhood, and the coffee has a pleasant aftertaste. My mood immediately improved by 100%!
Very nice little coffee shop. The coffee is made delicious and served quickly.
Our favorite cafe. Delicious lemonades, coffee and goodies. And my son likes to watch Tom and Jerry on TV!) üòäüëçüèªü´∂üèª

I'll start with the positives: cozy, pleasant barista, decent prices and of course delicious coffee.
Cons: There were no muffins advertised on Instagram... it‚Äôs a pity, I was going just for them. Not having the first ones, I took a pumpkin muffin, but... it turned out to be too hard. Perhaps it needed to be warmed up? Or then not keep it in the refrigerator... I don‚Äôt know... but please, if you have already announced your additions to the menu, then I would like them to be available, especially for morning coffee. Maybe next time I'll be lucky üòä

Great place for a romantic dinner. Food consist of a huge variety of Ukrainian and international dishes. Its located with in the park and infront of the small cinema. Prices are affordable and food has a good quality. Around 15 euro per person.

Great place with a lot of Very large selection of dishes
Good service. We eat outside, good distance between tables.
Only minus no menu card on English
But food was very delicious
Good place for relaxing , family with children .
That's nice place. Not so expensive. Good atmosphere.
not bad

Nice place,  The prices are not the cheapest, you can find cheaper places nearby than this place, but the place is good and covered, I sat outside, it's nice to see the whole street and the atmosphere is good.

I really loved the place and will definitely go again when visiting Odessa!
There are multiple reasons:
-The mood of the restaurant is very welcoming
-Their menus are very pleasant and look like a high quality magazine
-All the food that I tried was realllly good (Tom Yum, Shrimp Tacos, Cheesecake, Latte).
Beware that they are super full all the time so it is recommended to book a table in advance - yes, no matter the day or time - considering that they are open 24/7.
When I am back, I'll have to try the rest of the desserts, especially the cheeeesecakes!

Was surprised by the place itself  - very cozy and warming. Their patio is another thing to mention.
Had a breakfast there, very tasty, portion of breakfast benedict was smaller then I wanted, but wasn't the case for deserts - napoleon cake was enough for 2 people.
Friendly stuff and one of the best coffee, great healthy options and amazing carob cacao.
Would recommend to visit.

If I could give this place 10 stars I would!! I went here twice in two days and I wish I could go every day!! Anastasia was a lovely waitress and was super friendly. Highly recommend the chicken waffles and the cheesecake with salted caramel sauce...thank me later!

Cool place, average price for coffee shop if we take into account option for takeaway which gives you 15% discount. They as well work long hours. I wasn't ordering a food here but it looks delicious but a pricy for me

Great place to have a lunch! Delicious food and affordable prices, there are some vegetarian options like salads. I wanted to charge my phone, but staff couldn‚Äôt find any cables. Maybe you can get some for the future.

Great place to grab some vegan food. Most of the food in this high class canteen has meat or dairy products but there's enough veggie options for even a hard core vegan.

Impressive interior, but the staff are a bit surly.

It's the poshest canteen I've ever seen.
really friendly and good choice of food Ivan üòÇ at my choice of food was funny.

Great place recommended by a local.

Innovative and creative dishes lovingly presented in a beautifully decorated restaurant. Very friendly and attentive staff. The pineapple "ravioli" dessert was absolutely amazing!

Very nice breakfast! Great selection of meals, also very healthy bowls even vegetarian! Kids menu is lovely.

i ordered fish , but they served only 50 gr fish .how it can be ? it doesn't suit for Olio pizza.who ate my fish in the kitchen ? very shameful situation.
Perfect place. Food is very tasty and affordable. Staff is really nice and helpful. Also loved the interior. Visit this place!! üçâüçâüçâ
Tasty food, good prices. One of the best places to eat in Odessa.
Great place. Great dishes. Very nice service. I recommend it for breakfast and dinner.

The food itself was fantastic and seemed to be authentic to Italian cuisine while certain dishes had a more innovative and modern twist to it. The ingredients were of high quality, both in main dishes like pizzas and pastas as well as side dishes and salads.
The location of the restaurant is also ideal because it is in the heart of the downtown Odesa and in particular, it is located within Passage, a significant architectural landmark of this city.
The service however, was mediocre at best.
The particular day when my family visited the restaurant was a day when there was a citywide water outage.
This no doubt creates difficulties for a restaurant but there could have been workarounds that the restaurant could have taken but did not.
For example, there is no water in the restroom to wash hands. There could have been pitchers with water or at least antiseptic sprays or wet wipes placed there for guests.
Same goes for tables where there is no means to clean one‚Äôs hands before eating when the water is out.
Furthermore, the waiters seemed unenthusiastic and preferred to hang out outside when we were dining inside and we needed to go out to call them on some occasions.
So while the location of the restaurant, the interior and decoration and of course food was good or excellent, the subpar service and attitude of staff let down the experience.

Visiting Uyava is not just a trip to a restaurant, it is an immersion in a world where Ukrainian quality takes on a new, extremely high level. This establishment does not just meet expectations, it exceeds them, creating a holistic and unforgettable experience.

The interior impresses with its thoughtfulness and aesthetics. Every detail, from the choice of furniture to lighting, works to create an atmosphere of comfort and modern elegance. It is not just beautiful, it is harmonious and inspiring, which allows you to feel like you are in a special place where beauty and comfort are respected.

Hospitality is felt from the first steps. The staff greets you with a sincere smile and willingness to satisfy any wish. This is not intrusive, but soft service that anticipates your needs and imperceptibly takes care of your comfort. Such an attitude creates the feeling that you are not just a guest, but a desired visitor who is appreciated.

And, of course, the main emphasis is on the aesthetics and taste of the dishes. Each dish is a true work of art, where visual presentation is an integral part of the culinary experience. The exquisite taste emphasizes the mastery of the chef, who skillfully combines traditional Ukrainian motifs with modern culinary techniques. The highest quality ingredients, original combinations, and, of course, the passion with which each dish is prepared - all this creates a unique ensemble that leaves a pleasant aftertaste and a desire to return again.

Uyava is truly a vivid example of how the Ukrainian restaurant business can rise to a new level, offering not just food, but a whole range of emotions and impressions. This is a place where harmony and perfection meet.

Incredibly delicious dishes and exquisite desserts take your breath away and excite your imagination, while the cozy atmosphere and friendly staff invite you to visit this establishment more than once to taste the entire range of the author's menu. 4.3/4 I had the cheeseburger with marbled beef and sweet onions and the curry chicken with pineapple for 640 UAH. Super expensive for only 2 dishes. In general, a very cozy place, friendly staff, there is even live music on weekends.
