Warm, cozy interior, comfortable sofas, fast service, waiter Kirill is competent, pleasant. Pizza with prosciutto and stracciatella is delicious, cake is fresh, chocolate, coffee is hot. Asked to bring coffee at the same time as dessert - it worked, they did. Overall, a pleasant experience, we haven't tasted better pizza in the area.

Regarding the atmosphere: Very loud because of the children who run around and shout at the entire establishment (parents for some reason don't see the need to educate their children to behave properly in public places). Despite the fact that we were placed in the farthest corner, it was loud, audible, because they were running around the entire establishment. This somewhat spoils the rest.

For me, this restaurant has become a part of my memories. Very polite and wonderful staff, delicious food from which I received incredible pleasure. Cozy atmosphere and place, great music. I want to visit it more than once. Thank you for the wonderful service, I really liked everything hereü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ I advise you to visit this restaurant to get incredible emotions

A great family restaurant with delicious food, friendly staff, a fresh exterior and live music and steaks on weekends.
Very polite staff, good open cooking of specialties of the week (month).
The pasta is very tasty, but the bruschetta is not great. Prosecco in the assortment and beer on tap also lift the mood.
I will definitely come back here again.

What a beautiful and delicious place! Italian and Greek cuisine with interesting dishes. We liked everything we ordered. Interesting execution of dishes that are in traditional cuisines. And zucchini chips are just bimba! The prices are pleasant. In terms of the amount of food, the two of us ate about an elephant (and took some home) + alcohol and it came out to 1400 UAH. I highly recommend it!

Good impressions. Very tasty pasta, brought hot, in heated plates. It would seem like such a base, but not every institution, unfortunately, can cope with such a base)

Portions are not small, good amount of sauce.
Pretty fast, attentive service.
There is a menu, it is possible to pay by QR, but if necessary, they also have a paper menu.

Prices are satisfactory.

The atmosphere is pleasant, very in the Italian spirit)

At first we were seated near the kitchen, literally next to the food counter, although the table was reserved a week in advance and with a deposit. Thanks to the administrator - we moved him to the veranda. Salads and appetizers are super, very tasty! But the steak was served to us literally raw... we didn‚Äôt finish it, although we ordered medium. They apologized with a portion of Napoleon. In general, the impression is mixed. "Peppers" were better

I really liked the food and atmosphere, delicious dishes and friendly hosts, there is a children's room and a large screen for watching events. I recommend you to visit, have fun and have a good time.

This place has quite the atmosphere and ambience. We sat on the patio and it was like we were transported into Rome. It has the makings of a Michelin star restaurant. The pasta was fantastic and very customizable. The food was beautiful and the dining experience was exceptional. Also one of the best lattes I've ever had. The service was fast and staff catered to us. The waiter also spoke a little English which is also a plus for any travelers like me. Very much recommended.
Beautiful food, attentive and kind hosts, and a lovely interior. I could not have asked for a better experience than the one that I enjoyed at Monica's. Highly recommended if you are in Odesa.

Cozy and fun atmosphere, delicious food and kind staff! Absolutely loved the ‚Äú4 cheese & truffle‚Äù pasta and strawberry lemonade. Pizzas are good too. The tiramisu was a bit too creamy however.

Overall, great spot for dates & company hangouts! Would definitely visit again. Keep it up Monica!

Delicious pasta and desserts üçÆ Pasta is more tasty than in Italy.
Cocktail were nice as well üçπ Especially Sicilian sour
Friendly staff and relaxing atmosphere

Such homelike Italian restaurants. Like a lot of to spend time there,frankly speaking you lose all time counting there.üòª Huge plus to interior and details to decor and furniture,special place take a rest room and unique washstand. üôÄ
Only ‚Äúask‚Äùüôèüèª,please turn on some Italy üáÆüáπ or summer jazz/folk or just make music more quiet, it‚Äôs hard to hear each other during conversations even when you sit each to other in one tableü§≠
Everything is perfect. Try the baked camembert with rose jam.

I really liked this establishment, last year we celebrated all our birthdays in Felice. It was always tasty and cozy.
But since the first boss Maksym left, everything is getting worse and worse. Changes in the menu are not successful at all. I used to have a delicious shrimp risotto, actually tastier than Italy. It was replaced by a Seafood Risotto, in which a couple of large, unpeeled prawns float among rice and mussels in the shell. You will have no chance to eat this dish aesthetically. Because all this must be cleaned by hand. As a result, the enjoyment of food is zero, only a mountain of waste on the plate.
Before the new year, they still ordered and sent a recommendation to the kitchen to return the previous version of risotto with shrimp, a couple of months have passed, nothing has been changed.

I used to adore risotto with meat in wine. Today I did not understand at all what was brought to me. The price is about the same, but be prepared that the portion is twice as small. As an example in the photo, I ordered the risotto before the New Year and today. The taste is also not very good, it was tastier.

In general, it is very unfortunate that good establishments lose taste and quality over time, and do not listen to customers. Because I am not a hater at all and defended this establishment among all my friends who had a negative experience and categorically refuse to eat here. Now I don't want to come back here either.

The best institution in Arcadia ‚Äî without exaggeration. You can feel the love for details here: aesthetic interior, gentle music, fresh flowers, nice little things like hand cream in the restroom. The atmosphere is like home, only betterü§≠

The kitchen is a separate love. Vitello tonnato is perfect, every bite gives pleasure. Coffee is fragrant, rich, perfect for taking a break from the hustle and bustle. It's a pity that I can't rate the wine, but I'm sure that everything here is perfect.

And service... it's not just service, it's care.

Special thanks to Olena and Vika for their sincerity, smiles and feeling as if you have known the staff for a long time. It is thanks to such people that you want to come back here again and again.

In this place, you can not only eat delicious food, but also breathe out, collect your thoughts, and find your own little island of peace.

Very Instagrammable and cozy, delicious coffee.
Service once in a while.
Overall not bad ‚ù§Ô∏è

Wonderful service, excellent table arrangement, pleasant atmosphere. We ordered main courses, cocktails and desserts. I liked everything very much!
Sono stata felice di essere qui!
I wish I could add Italian music, it would be great!

What a nice restaurant for lunch time, especially if you can enjoy the terrace which is quiet and peaceful.
It's a new menu I think, Italian oriented.
We took the pasta with seafood, and I was impressed by the quality : perfect dosage between pasta, sauce, ingredients. Cooked like in french / Italian restaurants.
A good surprise with good prices.
Waiters are not insistant, which is good for a place like this.
Good choice of desserts, wine, coffees and teas

Wow!! Great Italian food, honestly, much better than many places we visited in Italy. The atmosphere is great, food delicious, service is amazing.
The place is also child friendly, there is a separate room with toys, games and sometimes with nany too )).
We always come back to Fratelli when visiting Odessa, and every time it keeps the high standards.

Highly recommend!!
I really liked my experience in Fratelli. Attention was very good, the waitress had a perfect English and was also very friendly. It's a must, if you are in Odessa and enjoy Italian food.

nice place to have high class italian food. hidden away from the street. not a reasonable place in terms of pricing. but outstanding quality and service. better be strict with the very nice waiters. as they love their recommendations and sometimes try a bit too much to influence you. scallops are a must. foie gras also. biiig wine list. excellent coffee.

Great athmosphere. With a little breeze outside, it feels italian all over.
Waiters are kind, hardworking and also english speaking (thank god).
Food was excellent. I tried shrimp + black caviar ravioli it was perfect.
A piece of my wine glass unexplainably broken from the middle, never seen that before :)
Prices were really good considering the quality of the place.
Amazing place in the center of the city, very good cafe, and very tasty cake
Fantastic place with perfect service. Must visit!

I always come here when I'm in Odessa, I just love this place. I'm one of those people who never likes anything, but I really love this restaurant.. And everyone who was there with me was also delighted! The pizza is very tasty (I recommend the cheese and mortadella), the service is good, the hall is very beautiful (especially these paintings and the chandelier), and this toilet is just awesome

Everything 1000/10üíó
Have been many times before, but for some reason never left a review. As always, great food, cocktails and great service. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è

In the Top 3 most favorite pizzas in Odessa. It's amazing how many times I've visited and never made a photo or review. I am correcting the situation, I will definitely add thematic photos. As for pizza, it's a work of art. The Italians will have to try very hard to impress us after the Odessa gastro-masterpieces. The dough is very tasty, so much so that you eat the side with no less pleasure than a tortilla with filling.

The service is pleasant, as are the prices. The bistro is cozy and warm.

This place is such a gem! The ambiance, service, food - everything is on the entire different level! I was fortunate to meet Roberto Armaroli¬†- the heart and soul of this restaurant. No wonder the dishes and flavors are unique and creative - he cares and delivers the best quality and Italian warmness in every bite.
Steak tartar with parmesan ice-cream blew my mind! Shrimp and octopus with burrata was so creamy and well-balanced , it hit all the right taste buds, i almost felt like I was in Italy.
Already planning to come back and cannot wait to try other dishes!
Thank you to my waiter - Danis- for his knowledge of the dishes and best recommendations.
Unforgettable experience!

My first visit and i had a great time even thou i was alone. Outside there was live music and inside there's an atmosphere of an old vin cellar with painted ceilings. Service is efficient and waiter was very helpful with what to choose. Prices are above average but matching the quality of the food and drinks. I enjoyed every bit of the experience and will certainly come back!
Amazing food and service. Anyone who wants to have and enjoy a high level in any area of ‚Äã‚Äãa restaurant should definitely visit this restaurant.
They took 40 min to make a lemonade and it was disgusting. I would recommend to eat at home but not there.
An exquisite experience of an underground Italian cuisine. The food, the presentation, and the ambiance are beyond expectation.  So good that it feels like it should be illegal.

A double feeling. Either a cafe or a restaurant. Or in the center, but there is no sign. We work until 23:00, but at 21:45 there is already some lack of enthusiasm. The food seems tasty, with a claim to haute cuisine, but the portions are not quite adequate. You can eat your fill with an appetizer, but not with a main course. A portion of pasta carbonara is like for a child, as is the risotto for duck. The interior of the cafe-canteen. But the dishes are beautiful, and the taste of the dishes is excellent. But then we bought pizza from neighbors, and went home to satisfy our hunger). In general, we came based on reviews on Instagram. We will not repeat the visit for the second time soon...

This is a great place with simple yet sophisticated food! The waiters are simply wonderful!!
And oysters for 29 hryvnia are always fresh and tasty! Regarding drinks, there is cool kravt beer, cool cocktails and of course wine üç∑!

I also visited this already sensational place ‚ù§Ô∏è Piccolo is love at first sight! The interior and kitchen are simply magical. Insanely tasty, stylish and finally no pizza in an Italian restaurant ‚ò∫Ô∏è The service is top notch! The guys are positive, they will help you with your choice and, as they say, ‚Äúlick you from head to toe.‚Äù Good luck and prosperity to you!

On Saturday evening we spontaneously wanted to have a small celebration. There were no seats in the restaurants we had checked, so we went to the restaurant "Piccolo" we found nearby. The restaurant's design is quite decent, without any special claims, there are few visitors - practically empty. And this is on Saturday evening. The menu claims to be close to Italy, and so do the prices. We liked the "Beef cheeks with polenta", but didn't like the other dishes because of the strange combination of the main product and sauce. The salad was made "based on" the description we received from the waiter. There was no draft beer, and the homemade wine slightly smoothed out the situation. In general, we didn't want to sit for long, and given the local prices, this restaurant went deep into PicE in my rating :(

Good menu and prices
Quite tasty
Very friendly guys working
Unfortunately not very crowded

This was my first time ordering delivery from this establishment. I chose cream of mushroom soup and pappardelle pasta. I liked that the food was delivered hot and it was delicious. But the food was too salty, at first I thought it was just pasta, but then when I tried the soup, it was also too salty. I think if you fix this moment, everything will be great üòå

Nice establishment, delicious food, friendly staff. Typically not many people.
The downside is that it can be noisy here.
The calzone was slightly burnt
We had fun))

I was pleasantly surprised with the food quality and especially with Cesar's pizza - unbelievable sauce along with tasty chicken, made me want to drive here again, just to eat it again. Staff is the only disappointment here. Waiters are slow and unhelpful, even though there weren't many people at the restaurant, the time we've visited it. Usually o would give three stars for that, but the food made it all üçïüçïüçïüçï

Nice restaurant, always crowded. Very delicious pizza, though it used to be better before, but still very tasty. What Im absolutely sure about that the vegetarian pizza (Melanzana) in here is the best I ever tried in all the places I've been and traveled.  Give it a try guys. You may consider it as home made option as well.

Nice and quiet. Food was very nice.
Didn't have dish we ordered. Refused to take payment by card although we confirmed it before by phone.
One year later we had the same problem - they accepted cash only.
The food is always excellent and the prices are very reasonable. Great value.
Fine, lovely place, very cute and creates feeling, as being at home)

I loved the menu!!!!! Fully photographed menu - u see exactly what you order and it should be a standard in every restaurant!

Additionally this menu is really well made :)

pizza in 4 minutes maybe because there were not many people, but still, kudos, congrats and thumbs up!

PIZZA was just perfect! The italians would be just proud of it :)

Very close to the park, brilliant location for park goers :)

Highly recommended

Ordered two pizzas, a Tornado (spicy meat) and a Quattro Formaggi, a sun-dried tomato salad, and, as an afterthought, a couple plates of sushi.
The Tornado pizza was fine, cooked well, ingredients seemed ok but a bit lacklustre.
The quattro formaggi was dry and tasteless and we ended up only eating one and half slices.
The salad would have been fine, being composed of feta, fresh vegetables and some sun-dried tomatoes, but, unfortunately, the chef had the bright idea of drowning the dish in a dark, sweet sauce, which was kind of overpowering.
The sushi was, well, let's say, don't order sushi in an Italian restaurant in Ukraine.
Lesson learnt.
Can't recommend.
Try their soup and pizzas, all is fine and delicious, excellent crew , price are quite well , most clean üöæ please üôè

The toilets didn't work and the toilet bowl was full of piss, blood and paper. There was no WiFi. There was two of us and we got only a single menu in English. Waiter didn't learn manners at all, however it was probably he didn't speak much English.
Nice place but it can take FOREVER for food to arrive at your table after you order.
Nice place. The dish was tasty.
Nice place to eat. There is a kids room. Good selection of pizza, salads, pasta, etc. Everything was very tasty.
Great food and exelent service! They made specially for me fresh juice mix, even it wasnt in menu.
Good mid range food without too many trimmings or fancy settings or decor, at a decent price with OK service. Worth the visit.
Good quality of meals and drinks, kind service. Kids friendly, cosy.

Pleasant, comfortable and tasty!
Yevhen will make you feel at home thanks his kindness and care about customers
Wonderful place, very cozy and the food is awesome! Thanks to our waitress Iryna‚ù§Ô∏è She was very nice and caring.

Nice place, interesting interior and exterior. Food was tasty, service wasn't so good, waters were slow.
And kids were running and screaming around, we couldn't hear each other.  And one of them even broke a glass. I think it would be better if they will make a separate room for kids where they can play.
Good place for dinner with kids, kids menu, soups, cartoons on big screen with headphones, especially good outside when weather is warm enough
Tooo looong. And could forget your order...
Delicious food. Nice place to have a family dinner

Food was decent.  Management like money vampires though.  Wait staff required to upsell relentlessly.  Mandatory service added to the cheque, which would be okay if it went to your waiter, but it goes to "administration".  If you want your server to get a tip, that's additional to the mandatory service charge.
Delicious food, the breakfast served here from 8:00! And a very pleasant staff ‚ô•Ô∏è totally recommend!
Good french food and duck leg and duck breast.
Lovely 3 course breakfast. Very nice staff, friendly and attentive. Cosy design. Well recommended.
We relaxed and had an excellent dinner and dessert on a rare quiet night.  The steak was amazing, and the service was fantastic. High international standard

Wonderful atmosphere, great service (waiter knew all the dishes and drinks (how strong, weak, sweet, ect)), very attentive service. The food was all delicious (even if they did not use real udon noodles), over wonderful!
Best restaurant in Kharkov. Ramen duck soup as well Thai coconut soup was delis with superb service
The atmosphere and food was nice. Upscale. IQOS promo is everywhere though, and the music inside was very loud. Sitting outside was much better.

Absolutely amazing! The food is so good and the atmosphere and service are just as good. I have eaten here 30+ times and never had a bad experience. I crave it even when many thousands of kilometers away. Best ceasar salad I have ever had. Amazing steak. Amazing duck. Everything is perfect

Nice place with an Italian touch. The menu is inspired by Italy and is pretty good. The staff is cheerful and helpful. Nice outdoors seating, where they can organize parties for kids (see a pic). Food is tasty, service is prompt. Cards are accepted. Definitely recommended.
The cocktail was nice, so was the brownie. Waiters were quite polite and helpful. There were smokers just not far from us, so that spoiled the atmosphere, but all the rest was quite nice.
Excellent choice of tasty meals. Great atmosphere. The best lemonades.

A small but quaint little Italian restaurant. Food selection is quite good. There is no menu in English but you can still get by. Prices are reasonable. There is a large patio for eating outdoors, mid April is still to early to be able to enjoy dinning outdoors. Friendly staff here to help you enjoy your dining experience.

Splendid unbelievable cozy place! Extremely delicious food! I can recommend it you definitely will not regret!
As for me, the best Italian food you can find here. You can find here standard Italian dishes like pizza, pasta but their taste is not so standard as their names - it is much better. You can taste here first dishes.  For main course apart from delicious pizza and pasta you can choose even more delicious dishes with meat like tender veal loin divine medallions or gorgeous juicy steak and many many more.
You can order any dish and you will stay totally satisfied.
In addition you will meet here the top level service. Friendly smiles and care of waiters will make your evening.

This restaurant is very surprising.  It is unexpected to see a high-level restaurant in a quiet area of ‚Äã‚Äãa big city.  Such restaurants are common in the city center.  Nice interior and great ventilation.
There is very good management and the right staff.  The waiters and receptionists are very professional and attentive.
The dishes are deliciously prepared and beautifully served.
The prices are great, but the service and quality food justifies it!
The restaurant is suitable for celebrating significant events.  Highly recommend.

Fast, tasty, kind service, live music on Saturday, kids area and private. Comfortable chairs
I love this place
I'm a costumer
But very expensive!‚ù§üòòüòé
Great steaks. Very friendly service. Clean.

Beautiful place, nice atmosphere. The food is great together with the prices. But that not reflect the quality of the service. Must be improve .. took me tome to get my bill .. and more than 20 minutes to pay my bill ..

Went their on the opening day as it looked good from the outside but a disappointing inside as it would fit in well at the Eco park, the meal we had was not bad but nothing to write home about, the real downer was when the bill came  and was charged 10 uah for a spoon full of milk to go with the coffee so don't forget to check your bill as you might be surprised.

The food here is amazing. Came out in a timely manner.  Attentive and courteous staff. As you can see by the pictures this is the place to eat in Shevchenko Park. Usually busy. But be careful at night. The restaurant will close early if there are no orders or customers.
Delicious food, refined atmosphere, intelligent service. You will love it! Cook is a god! ü§£üòá
It‚Äôs been almost ten minutes since we‚Äôre entered the place and sat. No waiter/waitress showed any interest in attending us.
Lovely place , food is good . Great location!!

Great fresh baked Neapolitan pizza. Very nice coffee in a relaxed atmosphere with great non intrusive service. A big plus is where it‚Äôs located too
Thanks
Appreciated the place. I ordered hot cocktail and grilled vegetables, it all were quite tasty. Also the staff is friendly and easy to talk to
Their service is in a high level. My friend and I came late on Saturday night. However, they took our order and prepared an amazing tasty burger, called New York. I definitely recommend this place.
Absolutely in love with this restaurant. Premium quality products and unbelievably delicious meals that worth every cent. Also very kind and friendly staff.

Best American burger place not only in Kharkiv, but Ukraine! Tasty, delicious burger with salad and french fries. Wonderful lemonade, very natural taste. Friendly staff, nice atmosphere. I was gently but happily amazed.

Tasty! Delicious! Not very expensive! F.e. two burgers like on this photo + salad  (greens) + berry tea for two - $17!
Recommend! :)

Great vibe. Huge selection of desserts and menu.

Outdoor seating with a good view.

Iced latte was OK. Aroma Kava quality, but everything else made up for it.

Service is unfortunately #terrible.. Waiters are so friendly, food is very #tasty, but if they forget to bring your #food, or bring wrong, then nothing makes sense..

Detailed information: we visited to have breakfast for 3 people, one of my friend's order didn't arrive and he left there hungry, because also our omlette orders took ages to come. In another visit, another order was false, it was OK which arrived, but again, having such experience is not nice. Our local friends said that's what you get in everywhere in Kharkiv, but this is still the best one in bad ones, sadly..
Absolutely fabulous place! I love service, amazing cuisine, delicious cakes and stylish design. Atmosphere is absolutely positive and pumping you with good energy for all day. Hardly suggest!
Great variety of delicious food and drinks; cool ambience; friendly & professional staff. Vegan options are limited but my raw vegan cake and Bumblebee coffee were amazing!

One of best breakfast spot in Kharkiv ‚ú®good coffee ‚òïÔ∏è beautifully decorated ‚ú® nice indoor and outdoor seating ‚ú®friendly staff and they speak English ü§çbut a little bit of slow service üòï

Nice place with a classy wooden interior, decent jazz playing. Their menu is in english and their servers speak english, a great luxury for a Russian-Ukrainian challenged like me. Prices are great, too.

I visited this restaurant twice during my recent stay in Kharkiv. As a vegetarian, I was thrilled to find such delicious vegetarian-friendly food! I had lobio for the first time, which I loved! I've been to Ukraine three times and this was the best varenyky I've ever tasted. I had both cabbage and mushroom & potato. The service was friendly and quick. I highly recommend this restaurant if you have the pleasure of visiting Kharkiv!
Ukraine saving grace for eating good food is their abundant supply of Georgian restaurants.  This place is really really good.
good food & drinks. Nice atmosphere. Must visit at least once. Meat is awesome

One of my favorite places in Kharkiv!
I adore food and service!!!

Adore this place, the best one for me in our city. Should I want to have a breakfast, lunch or dinner, meet friends or spend time with family - this place fits well. Everything is great here: tasty healthy food, friendly and helpful waiters and all this for such a good price. Luckily, they have a to-go option, so I frequently use it as well))

Excellent food. The place was packed. I suggest reservations. The maitre de. Seated us even though it took some table jugglingon his side. Food was beautifully presented and savory.  Portion size was plenty, although not overwhelming.  I will go again. English menus available.

Once, I was in Trattoria Sicilia by recommendation of my friend. That was Saturday day, and the restaurant was full, and a lot of tables were reserved, so the waiter checked which table was free for at least one hour for us (this shows a level of very good service).
The atmosphere was very lively, the music, what was playing, extended atmosphere inside. Service was also good because even with a full restaurant, we got our food very fast. The staff was helpful and efficient.
The food was tasty and delicious. Also, I liked how dishes with food were presented.
We got only 1 negative note. The waiter forgot to add one position to our order, but after a reminder, we got what we wanted.
The price was reasonable and a good value, also we didn‚Äôt forget to leave a tip.
Definitely, I would visit Trattoria again.
Excellent service, great quality food and very convenient location.

This restaurant was exceptional, the food was excellent, the menu had a variety of food to choose from. The prices were very reasonable. I will be coming back for more good Italian food. Our party had pizza, I had salmon and desert. Everything was good, barely had enough room to finish the cheesecake.

Very long service. Even when few visitors can not submit a menu for up to 20 minutes and then do not accept the order for another 20 minutes. This negative trend is observed for a long time, almost 5 years. Portions of dishes are small. Prices for local categories are high. The interior is beautiful. A company may not come here more than once a month.

Good place but a little dark. They dont have English menu. Staff does not speak English. Tables are too high in compare to seats. They serve hookahs after 5pm which l did not understand why. I did not try the food as they did not serve mu hookah. Just had a coffe and left.on a saturday noon time place was nearly empty...
Excellent. Would definitely recommend. One of the best steaks I've ever had.

Avoid at all cost.
The cutlery I was given was dirty, the pasta carbonara made me sick for a day and the hinkali simply broke apart as soon as I picked it up. I still tried the meat and it wasn't remotely tasty.
The waitress was quick to pick up my plate and though I barely ate it but didn't even bother to ask anything.
The menu was a mess. 7-8 alcohol menus and not 1 complete food menu with pics,  description,  and prices.  Everything else was good.

I rarely come to the same place twice when I am visiting a new city so visiting this restaurant three times in five days speaks volumes üòÅ
I totally love the place. The decor is modern and cozy, the staff is amazing, very friendly and attentive, and the food is delicious! Everything we tried was awesome.
The overall ambiance is warm and relaxing.
This is my favorite place in Kharkiv!

This restaurant realy amazing service. Good taste, verys friendly and very knowledgeable staff.
ƒ∞m here second time. Thank you for everybody for good qualty.

Super nice place and perfectly kind service üëçüèªüòÉ And the food was awesome!! Not so big portions, so for people with big appetite, they should order something more - the taste is super good and the diversity of choices very nice

High quality food, with fantastic staff.  I ate here multiple times for both breakfast and dinner during my stay in Kharkiv.  Healthy and fresh options, and sitting outside on a summer morning is very enjoyable.  Breakfast consists of a large range of coffee options, smoothies and multiple hot / cold food options,  poke bowls available at lunch and interesting options for diner available, the lemon cheesecake is next level!  Highly recommend.
One of the best restaurants in Kharkiv ‚ú® great food ü•ò nice indoor and outdoor seating area ‚ú® great service ‚ú® friendly staff and they speak English ü§ç but it‚Äôs a little bit pricey üòï

Was in Kharkiv for business for just two days and "Paris" was a place that nearly every local recommended. The place is extremely popular, so you might want to make sure to book a table in advance (especially for a company larger than two).
The interior is very nice, although the place indeed is very small. The menu is diverse and creative, wonderful fondues and good wine selections. My colleagues who tried desserts, complemented those, too.
The bathroom is probably the tiniest I have ever  seen and it is located just opposite a table for two, so visiting it might get awkward.

Small and cozy with little room but more than they have in the actual city of Paris so I think this is a nice touch.

They have different themed rooms and I now want to go to each of them.

You should definitely try the fondue and remember that it is very filling due to lots of bread and cheese.

We also tried the soups which were delicious. A nice bonus was the nonalcoholic summer drinks served in beautiful glasses üòç

If you want to test France atmosphere, try to visit Paris cuisine. One of the very attractive places in Kharkov. Very romantic place with very tasty food and reasonable price. By the way, they claim that dogs are welcomed there. Besides the tasty food you will enjoy with interested movie. Also, on the top floor there are a greenery with lots of flowers.Very strong recommend place especially for dates. No access to disabled. Parking place along road, so there is parking difficulties.

Amazing idea performed with upscale taste resulted in a fantastic restaurant. It represents 5 level dining where each level is decorated with its own twist keeping the general idea though. It can allocate a lot of visitors, however the majority of seating are 2-, 3-, maximum 4- seaters, which makes Paris fantastic place for dates or intimate friendly chatting. Generously decorated with live plants restaurant litteraly fills you with fresh air. Their menu deserves its own line: impressive wine cart, separate desserts offerings (not just a last page in main menu) combined with non-alcoholic drink, and main part that is strictly a No fast-food menu. They are very mindful about healthy eating which is vividly presented in their meals selection. Some meals comes in a generous portion, and they have specific sign next to its name in a menu, so that the guests can understand what to expect. There are free apples for kids next to the entrance, and free fresh juices for pregnant visitors. Prices are very adequate to the quality of the good and the level of the place itself. Would I come here again? Definitely!

On January 12th I celebrated my birthday with my friends at the Kohana cafe, to say that I had a blast, that this was my best birthday is to say nothing ü´∂

The atmosphere of beauty around, beauty in every detail, in the presentation of dishes, in the dishes themselves, everything is so beautiful, my friends even noticed that each dish has its own plate, or rather the shape of the plate, glasses for water, cups for tea, everything is so beautiful ü•∞

There were three of us, me and two of my friends, each of us ordered what she liked and we were satisfied, the first time we didn‚Äôt guess with tea (I don‚Äôt remember the name, but something with sea buckthorn), it didn‚Äôt go down well with us, but the second one was very tasty, with mango. We also ordered different desserts and each of us had a delicious one üòã
One of my friends switched to a special diet and doesn't eat flour or sugar. When choosing a dessert, the girl told her in detail which desserts fit my friend's criteria and she made her choice (in the photo, it's completely covered in chocolate) ü´£

We were very pleased with the table service. Our waitress (unfortunately, I don't know her name) was very polite and tactful. When we first arrived, we couldn't stop talking and couldn't think of any order. Then one friend chose what she wanted and my other friend and I couldn't decide for a long time. The girl calmly waited and took the order. We never felt pressured to think for a long time or sit for a long time or not order anything. Everything was so wonderful. At some point, the girl came up to me and asked whose birthday it was. And when we were about to eat our desserts, the girl and several other waitresses came up to me to congratulate me on my birthday. I felt so nice, I was so happy üíó

I am incredibly grateful to the cafe "Kohana" for the aesthetic pleasure, for every thoughtful detail, for delicious food, desserts, quality service, for making this day, this time with friends special, bringing a little magic and sorcery üôè

P.S. A year ago I was already in this cafe, but was not impressed, but I am happy that I chose to celebrate my birthday with my friends in it.
I told this to the fact that if you had an unsuccessful experience with this cafe, like me, maybe you should try again, maybe you were with the wrong company, in the wrong state or just at the wrong moment.

Thank you again and sincerely recommend üôèü•∞üíê

If I could give Felice 6 stars, I would! This Italian restaurant in Kharkiv blew me away with their pizza, which shares the same name as the restaurant. Having traveled extensively through Italy and indulged in countless pizzas, I can confidently say that Felice‚Äôs pizza is hands down the best I‚Äôve ever had. The flavors were incredibly authentic, the crust perfectly crispy, and the toppings were fresh and delicious. We decided to celebrate one of the most important days in our family - an anniversary. We wanted to do it in this establishment and it was a MISTAKE

Yes, there are no questions about the food, everything was delicious

But there are a few important BUTs because of which we will not return to this establishment

1. Service. The waitress (a young, friendly girl) tried to serve us well, but throughout the entire time there was a feeling that she was afraid of us

2. It was an anniversary, that is, a birthday. On the website, Instagram and on the menu page there is a tab where it is written that on the birthday there is a DISCOUNT for the customer -15%.

But we were refused this. Apparently this discount is valid ONLY for a company of 6 people and if the check is more than 6 thousand UAH (there were 5 of us, if anything).

Interesting, right? Because there is NO such information ANYWHERE (please note the screenshots, where there are no explanations with exceptions). I'm sure this is a fabrication of the waiters, so as not to make any discounts.

3. The establishment has a promotion for pizza 2=3 and a taco combo. We asked the waiter about the tacos, but she couldn't give us an answer and went to the admin. It turned out that the establishment doesn't have a promotion for tacos. But this information is also NOT AVAILABLE ANYWHERE! (there are also screenshots).
To which I asked: "does the promotion apply to pizza?", to which the waiter answered me: "yes, for pizza"

Interesting, because then when paying it turned out that the promotion DOES NOT APPLY, supposedly only for delivery.

I visited the institution solely because it was the closest to me and had the highest rating I had ever seen. But after the visit, I'm a little disappointed :(

1. I didn't like that they only serve breakfast there until 12:30. I didn't like anything from the breakfast and I wanted to order carbonara, but I was refused. I had to order at least something so I wouldn't be hungry.

2. The breakfast itself tastes very ordinary, nothing special. For the price, absolutely not worth it (in my opinion).

3. Service. There was no noticeable concern from the waiters, the mood was gloomy. I was with a backpack, but I was not offered a chair for a bag (although there is one). After I ate and drank coffee, no one cleaned the dishes, and they lay there for 30-40 minutes until I left. I gave it 2 stars because they made the music quieter at my request. In general, if there are many people in the establishment, I understand the waiters, but during my stay only 2 tables were occupied.

On the plus side: very nice interior and furniture. Many non-standard menu items.

Conclusion: I do not recommend visiting the establishment if value for money (taste) and service is important to you.

If you need a good "Instagram" picture for a photo, then this is it. It is also suitable for introverts who want less attention to be paid to them.
When we booked a table in advance, they gave us the worst one, but we changed the place ourselves. The food is delicious.

We had breakfast there. It was delicious, original and not unlike anything else. We will 100% come again, it is interesting to try other dishes. Plus, a comfortable, cozy atmosphere and excellent service. I definitely recommend it!

I visited the establishment, I liked the interior.
I ordered mushroom soup, they brought soup with seafood, because the waiter heard "fish soup", I said that I would not eat it, they offered me to remake it. To my surprise, it was redone. I didn't like the soup, it had a specific taste, and I didn't like the presentation. I ordered their signature dessert, I was delighted with it, very tasty.

The place is decent. The food is very good. White mushroom julienne has been a highlight of the evening for me.
At the same time, it's hard to overlook the mediocre presentation. For example, the frog legs (pic attached) were cooked reasonably well but the serving looked like homemade rather than restaurant grade.

Last night was my our 3rd visit. Unfortunately it did not go as well as the previous 2. Limited attention to service, more time spent on gift wrapping and photographing their own food. While the food and atmosphere is great, sadly the ridiculously long wait time for our bill after asking twice will make that our last visit.
Food is ok. Lil bit overpriced. Nice quiet location on the Main Street. The service could be with more smiley faces. Couple vegan options.
French-oriented restaurant offers quite tasty food to fairly good prices. Desserts especially recommended.
Great food and ambience
Authentic Georgian restaurant, great variety on menu- although not many gluten free options. They have homemade wine. Quite expensive. Make sure you book in advance- it gets busy at the weekend.
Tasty Georgian cuisine. I eat there frequently and sometimes order to go. Keep in mind that last minute reservation in the evening is almost impossible, they are very busy.

Food in nice, but service is not so good. The place is positioning itself as a restaurant and prices are on the upper side.In any reputable restaurant you can get a jug of fresh water,  but not here.You can get a glass only :).Of course it is not the only thing that affects choice of a restaurant , but it's definitely shows the service level - more "soviet" than European.
great taste of Georgian cuisine with affordable prices, good service. Would be great to have a bit bigger üç∫ choice

Horrible service. I had to literally wave my arm to attract attention despite sitting next to the counter where all the waiters stood. I was completely ignored as they thought I was a foreigner and I don‚Äôt know the language. Even if the waiters noticed me they would just pass the buck saying oh it‚Äôs not my table; oh I don‚Äôt know the language! The waitress assigned to my table was the rudest I have ever experienced in my travel all around the world!! She didn‚Äôt even bother to ask for a repeat glass of wine while taking my empty glass. One doesn‚Äôt need precise language to communicate. There was only one waitress who knew English n communicated but she wasn‚Äôt serving my part of the restaurant.
I have been to couple of Georgian restaurants in Kyiv n Dnipro and they were really courteous n good but this one was pathetic.
Food is very average. Bread was so hard n stale. I ordered chanakhi. It was super salty. Eggplant roll with cheese n mint was good.
Ambience is good.
But if this is the attitude of the staff, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place to anyone.
Good atmosphere and tasty fish
Vry good servis and food
Good
The restaurant is wonderful, it was delicious, many interesting dishes, nice atmosphere, friendly waiters, fish fire, I recommend visiting

My boyfriend and I celebrated graduation, we were choosing a restaurant and settled on this one, everything was great, the waiters were smiling and kind, the food was delicious and the atmosphere was just awesome.

I really like the food and service here. I think they also managed to create an authentic atmosphere within the restaurant.
We ordered 3 different kinds of shawarmas- which in their interpretation is not a roll, but a plate with all the ingredients. It was just delicious. I will come back there.

Another great find in Dnipro. The variety is great and the quality is really good. They have enough options for veggies and a wide range of meats as well.

I ate the hummus and beans with a side of Fallafel - highly recommended it. My party ate great meats with great sides and breads. Their in house beer is great as well.

These guys has one of the worst service.. even after clearing several times the order, they still forgot to bring one dish of the order and then coming to apologise that they forgot aftet waiting 30 minutes... the waiteress was not even knew what is in menu... but the manager helped and the food quality was good.
Just an amazing place! Very kind staff, delicious food, every meal that we ordered was perfect! Highly recommended üñ§

We love laffa and pita here, also they have awesome falafel and french fries with cheese sauce. Ayran greatly accompanies  those dishes.
The staff is friendly, polite and attentive.

Nice interior, modern design with attention to details. The music was a bit too loud for me. Toilets are very clean and nice. The food well served. Taste is just a matter to individual preferences. It wasn't marvelous for me, but it was OK. Staff friendly and very polite.

Great restaurant. Lovely decor, linen on tables with cloth napkins. View of the Monument of Glory and Dniper river. Sushi menu and fine dining menu available in English. Wait staff speak English. I ordered the grapefruit lemonade and Dorado fish with grilled fish. Delicious üêü

Seems this place isn‚Äôt really a restaurant or something, tried to have dinner 3 times and we were turned away for one reason or another. Very strange. If they are trying to be a restaurant they need some basic concept of what a customer is.
Nice place to eat. Polite staff.
Good service, great dishes

Food is tasty and nicely decorated. As for the service, I can say that waiters are polite and not intrusive.

However, waiting time for the table to free is unrealistically high. Still, I consider waiting is worth the time because you get awesome experience in return.

This is an excellent restaurant.
I came here on the advice of friends and did not lose. Thanks, very thin pizza, lasagna with spinach and shrimps, compote from blueberry and lemon and dozens more dishes. I would eat the whole menu, it's very tasty here. Prices are very nice. For example, pasta with seafood for $ 7

I strongly recommend eating here.
The staff here are excellent and the food was delicious. I'll be glad to visit again.
Delicius international food, cooked with love. Best cusine on the town of Dnipro.
Taste really good but on the pricy side .. this dish  can't remember the name but it's just avocado with 6 shrimps .. .. that's about it but it was really tasty and rich n the shrimp was perfect . .
Definitely recommend, food came in a grill stick, was very good with good spices. Ordered pork ribs and mushrooms. Nice view, friendly atmosphere.
GOOD!

Everything is good, tasty, good service.
Beautiful views from the terrace of the Dnieper.
Very cool staff!!! The prices are nice, the borscht was a hitüòã But the interior should be updated. On the second floor, the walls and windows are very dirty, the atmosphere itself needs newness.

Very fast service and everything is very tasty, reasonable prices!
But something really needs to be done about the spiders üòÅ

The most delicious burger in Dnipro. We tried two and they were amazing. Huge portions, delicious dips. A bit weird view featuring tanking station, but food beats it all.

Terrible service.  If there are free seats near the window, offer to take a seat in the corner without windows.  The girl at the service is rude, the food is spoiled.  Mussel and salmon soup got worse.  gloves were not served with the burgers.

Really nice, good-sized burgers with a large variety of different types on their menu. Haven't had a chance to try their BBQ items yet, but if it's anything like their burgers, I'm sure they're delicious as well. Also, their cream sodas are also quite tasty. Definitely recommend! üëç
Spacious, clean, good service,. delicious pork ribs

I could not say something bad about this place. Yes, it's kind of burger pub, but... They have great cocktails, the Miami is awesome. Their beer very tasty. Burgers maybe the best in the Dnipro (at least it's what I heard). And try their grilled maize - it's incredible)))

I recently visited Na:Chasi and was thoroughly impressed. Their borscht is simply divine, bursting with flavor and served with a unique and creative presentation that truly sets it apart.

The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making the dining experience all the more enjoyable. Special mention to the administrator, who was exceptionally responsive and ensured that all our needs were met with a smile.

Overall, Na:Chasi offers a delightful dining experience that combines delicious food with excellent service. Highly recommended!
Unreal yummy ü§§üòã

The "Na chasi" establishment attracts attention with its decorations near the entrance, which makes its location popular for photos.

Regarding service. Nonsense, but the young man served in the language of the occupier, so a fat three for the service. Although it would be worth putting a unit.
I am not saying that this is a violation of the language law, and not just a tone of voice. Sorry, so no tip on the check.
Food - I ordered cabbage rolls. For four. I would not order a second time.

A wonderful establishment with a good atmosphere and delicious food.

And the prices there are very loyal. Potato pancakes with chicken cost me UAH 190 (April, 2025).

Very nice, tasty, great breakfast menu, especially since it opens at 8 am. The staff is a bit passive and not very friendly. The prices are a bit high for the same level of breakfasts. Wonderful summer terrace and a good selection of desserts.

A very pleasant place to eat. Part of a nationwide chain.
Good, Georgian food, well served, in a pleasant atmosphere.
I have also tried the Kharkiv, branch, and it is comparable. Altogether, a good introduction to Georgian cuisine.

Definitely a place to go in Dnipro! Especially if you never tried Georgian cuisine. Ah‚Ä¶ it was so delicious. The only downside- we couldn‚Äôt stop ordering and in the end it was very painful to walk :)
By the way, they have options for vegetarians, so I felt that I had a lot of options to try.

Plus, restaurant stands with Ukraine and Ukrainians, what make it even better üôèüèº
Madloba üíõ
The waitress was awesome however the host of the establishment ( the old gentleman ) was rude .

Food reasonably good. I had a lamb kebab which was well cooked with a very nice sauce to go with it. I had to ask what dish might compliment it and was advised to try the potato dish. The service however is atrocious, not from and efficiency perspective but just incredibly unfriendly and I felt it was almost like he was doing me a favour to attend our table..I'd say if he ever smiled, his face would crack. Having read similar reviews, it appears to be the same guy. My advice, if he isn't happy..get a job somewhere else as he is harming the business.

Generally good food, but horrible service. The waiter and the manager were super rude, I don't think they even know how to smile.
One of the customers in the restaurant was extremely inappropriate towards my friend at the table and the waiter did nothing, even after we complained. I mentioned that after service like this I expect a discount. Obviously, no discount was provided. I persisted that I expected some sort of concession, and with poker face the waiter left and came back 10 minutes later with a $2 bottle of wine.
Ok, just ok.  Fish a bit bland, t-bone is unevenly seasoned.  Service is a bit off-beat.
Quite good to very good bistro, and Cafe with good kitchen and good cocktails.
Too bad. Gave it several chance, but each time the food was very bad quality and not tasty
nothing special, but cozy place and delicious cuisine
It's ok place, but customer's services is a terrible bad...one star only
Nice place to stay, delicious food, good service, beautiful design.  The only thing I didn't like was artificial flowers, but otherwise everything is fine

Nice restaurant, the price is fare enough you paying for the view and for a good food . Recommended

Good Place to spend Evening
Friendly Staff and hot served Food

Wonderful restaurant... Outdoor and indoor seating. Pastas, pizzas, steaks and salads with homemade desserts on the menu. Delicious and service was amazing. The manager speaks English and was very welcoming. Will definitely go back again :-)

This place is an incredible spot if you look for Italian food in Dnipro! Cosy atmosphere, welcoming staff and one of the best Pavlova desserts I‚Äôve ever tried - just so fluffy and light! Must visit. Also, they make great espresso macchiato:)
Nice restaurant, friendly staff. Food good, but needs a bit more of taste. Temperature of wine was not the ideal.
Anna Pavlova is delicious but lemonade with honey is pretty much ordinary . Also it would be better if they have more options for sweets.

Absolutely loved 19/20!
Such a cool spot with amazing vibes ‚Äî the music was on point, the cocktails were incredibly tasty, and the atmosphere was just on a top level. Huge shoutout to the bartender Artyom ‚Äî his service was exceptional! Super helpful with choosing cocktails and just great to chat with. Definitely coming back!
Beautiful, cosy, comfortable and tasty at that. Perfect place for breakfast, dates, evening cocktails and more.

Super nice and beautiful place, amazing decoration! Very delicious cocktails and food‚ù§

The coffee is absolutely beautifully prepared with professional latte art if that's something that you enjoy of course. There's a wide range of teas also which are freshly brewed including fruits. The selection of cakes and pastries are minimal so don't expect a huge plethora of options. The price point is average and therefore affordable.
The decor is sublime and the high ceilings make for a very pleasant and open environment.
There are plug points at almost every table and there are two public toilets so all amenities are generally covered.
The staff are courteous and will carry out your instructions without imperfections. They could be a little bit more friendly as an improvement point though my experience was just fine.
The location is beautiful it is opposite the river which you can actually see from the windows.
The real gem of this coffee shop is the artwork. Beautiful paintings of astronauts and a general theme of space travel. Oh I'm sure they'll change this from time to time so expect the unexpected.
This was our favourite coffee shop in Dnipro. Delicious coffee, modern warehouse vibe decor and a small art gallery in the back. Great stop when you are are out on a walk on the embankment!
Seems like a nice place, coffee is good but such a terrible and slow service, I used to like this place but politeness is not about them

I came here several times and it never disappoints! Delicious food and classic European outdoor cafe vibe
The cold soup was amazing!
Friends suggested this place as alternative to cafe ‚ÄúWhite‚Äù. I liked their coffee, it‚Äôs very good! And very nice wide windows üòç
I had herbal tea, cake, and pastry at the caf√©, and they were all amazing, i am giving it 10/10. The caf√© has a cool vibe and lots of good choices. I really liked how it looks inside.

Alright, so this place decided to try to be everything for everyone. In the morning they are coffee shop with pastry, mid day they are a lunch place and in the evening they are a bar and a restaurant. But as you can guess, this is hardly possible to be all of those things on a good level simultaneously.

I went there for a dinner with my wife today and there are some pros and cons.

Pros:

Cons
- I ordered teriyaki salmon and frankly did not really like it.
- tomato soup with Mozzarella was average

A few days later I came back for a breakfast. And ordered a standard breakfast meal, I waited for 30 minutes, after that asked the waiter to check on it and they said it‚Äôs going to be another 7 minutes. It appears they simply forgot about the order.

Due to the above 3/5
Such a cute cafe! Perfect for studying and you always have company with teddy bears at every table ü§ó Subscribe to my YouTube Vlog @amyanna !

It's a nice place to go to: quite modern, with good choice of goodies both sweet and savory )) and a range of cocktails to choose from. There are also different coffee and tea drinks to all tastes. The prices are average for the city: it's neither too cheap, nor extremely expensive - good value for money. Amazing place for breakfast. Very good coffee, probably best in city.
Recommend Shukshuka with Chili (you can remove chili if you don't want to eat spicy foid). Also ecler was good (see photo)
My favorite place in Dnipro you‚Äôll always have a great coffee and service there, and now they have nice kitchen!

The best coffee place in Dnipro. Period!

People that are working there amazing!
Atmosphere is great! Music as awesome!

Place you must visit üíØ% if you are in Dnipro!

Thx for the warm welcome

Prices are above average
9/10

The Best Napoleon cake in town

No menu in English. Staff doesn't speak English. During the "business lunch", which is a time when people can get a daily menu for a fixed price, I was brought my bill and asked to move outdoors. It's a phenomenal spot I've ever been to in Dnipro. The beer and meat are absolutely splendid. We had a blast during my last visit. beer is good, cuisine is ok. it was our late time place and I would have given solid 4 stars even week ago. but last weekend at 00:30 staff refused to serve us couple of beers.

(edited after response)

oh, oh, one nice customer policy You DO have there! :D
Good place to watch football with friends. Fresh beer, good grill. But I'd wish some waiters to be more rapid than they are. Although not all of them.

Good place for watching football games and other noisy events.

Delicious coffee (the best one ever), favorite music on the background and hospitable baristas. I wish I had this cafe in my own city to come back here every day.

Love this place . Delicious coffee üôÇ

Came to Try Bobry this morning, read the reviews and thought as a coffee enthusiast I would give it a go.  I ordered an Espresso and a Kenyan pour over on V60.
The Kenyan came, it lacked flavour and was quite astringent, things you would not expect from this coffee, aftertaste was lacking and the brew seemed all out of whack, water vs coffee ratio vs brewing time. The female attendedant with the sleeve tattoo at the register was rude, no customer service skills, So ordered another espresso and paid again. Espresso was over extracted, cups to cold and really shouldn't have been ordered, so all in all, not worth starting a good day here, lucky the Ukrainian coffee culture is still young here, as anyone who knows coffee wouldn't drink what they serve and enjoy it.

Cake was the saving grace it was very nice
Very cosy place, tasty coffee with chill music in background

Lovely place with good coffee and interesting decoration.
A little bit overcrowded
Really nice place, cosy, with attentive service and great coffee.
The best coffee ever! Like this cafe so much. Delicious desserts, amazing coffee and beautiful interior. So stilish, cozy and feels like home place

I had a coffee latte with croissant , and on my opinion it was one of the best coffee in the city. In case of croissant I cannot say that it was best croissant in my life, but it was really good quality .
Exceptional coffee place, the best in the city

Delicious coffee and sweets! üòÄ

I'm very happy that new places like this one appear to bring life and joy to our city üëç

There are a lot of various cafes and restaurants in the place. But it is in Maemo that you will be greeted with smiles from the staff, they will tell you in great detail what exactly you will like from the menu. About super delicious coffee - that's a separate buzz.

And there is also a mystery in Maemo. This institution has another hall that can be rented. And it is this hall that I am in love with with all my heart.

There is an atmosphere of peace, friendship and love here.
Thank you to the people who create such a cool space ‚ù§Ô∏è

Atmospheric place, pleasant staff, delicious waffles and breakfasts, in addition to the cafe there are several halls for events. For example, business meetings are very cozy and comfortable. If you gonna to have tasted breakfast or lunch, come here and divine into good atmosphere;) especially for rest with children

English breakfast - delicious, large portions; Sirniki are delicious, there is so much chocolate that the cheesecakes themselves are hard to judge by taste, personally it seemed to me that without chocolate, the cheesecakes would be from the ‚Äúwrong‚Äù series, there is a lot of semolina in them and therefore the chocolate evens everything out üòâ. Came here because of Google reviews and was VERY pleasantly surprised. The owner is fantastic, speaks good English which helps a lot. The staff are friendly, too. The food is not expensive and is very enjoyable as is the pizza.  Very nice wine on the upper end of the list. The live music is a big plus. I think the music ends at 8pm. Came here 3 consecutive nights and then back to‚Ä¶work. This place provided a really nice interlude. Give it a go. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

My favorite among pizzerias in Dnipro! Always with a smile, well, VERY nice guys work there) Personally, I recommend any pizza with creamy sauce. pizza from veterans. sometimes live music in the evening

Nice place to have a lunch during working day. Pos terminals are available as they should be. Average, not expensive prices. Good food, same menu from month to month, mostly. Don't recommend pizza, though.

Basic AF
Nothing to it.
Pizza is mediocre at its best.
I was sick several times after eating here. So I had to find a different place to have lunch. Good variety, but lacks quality.
Nice Ukrainian food. Good value for money.
Rather tasty dishes for cheap price

Insanely nice staff. Very tasty pizza. I especially want to say a special thank you to the guy who works there; for the first time, when ordering pizza, they asked us if we were allergic to the ingredients :)) atmospheric and tasty :))

3.9/5 above average japanese restaurant that has lots of potential to be an excellent restaurant, but hasn't reached its potential yet. I had the Sake Maki roll (6 pcs), Udon with beef noodles, and Tyahan with teriyaki chicken for 795 UAH, or about $22. the dishes are overpriced a bit for the quality, in my opinion. The best dish I had were the udon noodles; they were done very well and tasted excellent. The quality of the beef was about average, not the best quality, but definitely not the worst either. The next best thing I had was the Maki roll; it was above average sushi. The last dish I had was the Teriyaki chicken Tyahan: the chicken was amazing, but the rice wasn't good. The rice was watery and not made like how traditional japanese fried rice should be. Overall, the restaurant has lots of potential to be very good, but hasn't reached it yet. Above average restaurant, but there is a better japanese restaurant here, so wouldn't recommend.

I often encountered the same problem: everything looks beautiful on the website ‚Äî bright photos of sets, appetizing descriptions. But in reality ‚Äî dry rice, thin filling and no taste. That's why I'm wary of new deliveries. But my friends advised me to try Kanagawa Sushi, and it was a hit. I ordered the Philadelphia set with shrimp and avocado ‚Äî and was absolutely delighted. The rolls are neat, with a rich taste, the shrimp is tender, the avocado is ripe, and the cheese does not interrupt the taste, but complements it. Everything arrived in perfect condition, as if it had just come from the kitchen. Now I know where to order when I want really tasty sushi without unpleasant surprises.

Honestly, I'm tired of being disappointed with delivery time after time: either the sushi comes in pieces, or the rice is overcooked, or there's no taste at all. At some point, I thought that it was simply impossible to find normal delivery in Dnepr. But I decided to give Kanagawa Sushi a chance - and finally felt that it was not hopeless. The rolls arrived in perfect condition, not in pieces, not cold. Everything - from the packaging to the taste - was top notch. Fresh fish, balanced taste, neat presentation. It is obvious that they work here with respect for the customer. If you, like me, are tired of "one-time" deliveries, where the food is in a hurry - try Kanagawa Sushi. This is the first time in a long time when I finished the sushi and immediately wanted to order again.

We were at the Bon Marito restaurant - mixed impressions. The atmosphere is cozy, the interior is nicely decorated, pleasant music. The staff is polite, but the service was a bit slow, especially with a large influx of guests.
